name: Dandelion Baby-Pink Brightening Blush
about: What it is:A cult-favorite powder blush in a baby-pink shade that gives a subtle brightening boost..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:This silky-soft powder blush feels ultra-fine, weightless, and creamy on skin. It‚Äòs blendable, buildable, and sweeps effortlessly onto cheeks for an airbrushed effect and a soft-satin finish that lasts all day. The iconic Dandelion Blush is a part of Benefit Cosmetics‚Äò WANDERful World collection..Clinical Results:In an instrumental test on 25 participants, results showed:
ingredients: Talc, Mica, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Polyethylene, Magnesium Myristate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Silica, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Squalane, Parfum (Fragrance), Lecithin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Lauroyl Aspartate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Limonene, Bht, Retinyl Palmitate, Zinc Chloride, Linalool, Aluminum Hydroxide, Aqua (Water), Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Citral, Eugenol. [+/- : Ci 15850 (Red 6, Red 7, Red 7 Lake), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6, Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 45410 (Red 27, Red 27 Lake, Red 28 Lake), Ci 73360 (Red 30, Red 30 Lake), Ci 75470 (Carmine), Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), Ci 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), Ci 77289 (Chromium Hydroxide Green), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)]...Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit Cosmetics product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Sweep this highlighting powder onto cheeks as a soft blush, or apply it all over the face as a brightening finishing powder.

reviews.review_title: An Oldie But A Goodie, Perfect for Fair Skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Good: This blush has been around for a while, to the point where I remember buying my first one of these probably over a decade ago now a young teen girl entering the makeup world. This product has one of those nostalgia factors for me. I stopped using this blush for a while and moved on to other things but recently I got a mini of this and I was reminded all over again why I used to swear by this blush back in the day. This is a fantastic and gorgeous blush for fair skin girls. It has buildable coverage and looking so natural on the cheeks. If you're going for a no makeup makeup look, this is for sure your blush. If you're looking for a beautiful blush to wear on a first date, this is your blush. If you want something subtle but naturally stunning for the office, this is the blush. I will definitely be rebuying the full size once I get done with the mini I currently own.   The Bad: This blush formula is excellent but it only comes in this one color on a consistent basis. Therefore, although this works for me I doubt that it would really do much for darker skin tones, which is a shame. This brand should definitely make a darker version of this to be more inclusive. Also, the packaging is paper and it stains easily, it's also clunky and takes up a lot of room unnecessarily. No blush should ever take up more room than loose powder.  The Ugly/Honest: The brush it comes with is unusable and that money should have gone into creative a more travel-friendly and durable packaging for this product. The lack of shade variety is honestly puzzling for such a staple product that has been around for such a long time. Packaging needs a revamp into this decade, desperately.

reviews.review_title: Best Pink Blush on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write many reviews, but a review for this blush is long overdue.  I'm 59-years old and this is the only blush I have purchased more than once.  Sure, I've tried other blushes throughout the years because I'm a makeup junkie, but I always come back to this one.  I'll be honest it is expensive, $30 bucks.  If you use this everyday like I do, it's well with the price of admission.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this on my face for my wedding back in 2004, and then stopped using it for a while. (no reason...just a makeup maniac out trying new things)  Well, I've now been using it again for over a year...the same box from my wedding. Lol! It is a staple that I'll never stop buying. I already purchased a new box for when this one finally runs out. This  product was the #1 reason that my wedding day makeup was a huge win.  This blush is NOT too dark for my snow-white skin...it brightens up my whole face without looking bronzer-y. Although there is a tiny amount of shimmer, it does NOT make my face look like an oil slick (like highlighting powder often does). It's a very subtle and tasteful shimmer. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a surprisingly long time to try Benefit‚Äôs Dandelion box o powder, and now I wonder how I ever lived without it. If you are someone who never uses blush, this is the blush for you!  This is literally a hybrid between a powder and a blush, almost a non-blush blush, if that makes sense. The color is very buildable and is the most soft, natural looking color of pink I‚Äôve ever seen. I have light olive skin and prefer a very natural makeup look, and in the summertime I can use this all over my face similar to a setting powder. I can use it all year round as a very natural looking blush that instantly perks up a dull or tired looking complexion.  I do understand that for people with darker complexions and women of color, this blush might just not show up on them. It‚Äôs always worth testing in the department store if you can; even if you don‚Äôt like it as a blush you might consider it as a brightening setting powder.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blush! It is the perfect color for my fair skin, goes on smooth and doesn't make you look too made up. Provides a healthy glow without shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great!   Just the right size for travel especially since it includes the mirror and brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color of this blush is very flattering on face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a blush topper and it gives my cheeks a nice finish without it making my face too glittery or shiny.

This is my favorite blush and the actually the first blush I ever started using (since 10 years ago!) I always seem to come back to this blush, despite the hundreds I've tried that were more expensive and higher end brands. I am fair skinned and found that this blush is the perfect and most delicate shade of pink. Absolutely no orange or coral undertones which tend to make me look flushed and irritated. Love this blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased was little bitty guy in Denver because I didn't have a blush when I was visiting my daughter. It's pretty good I'm just not a real color blush person but it's very soft and nice and did the job for me while I was there I'll keep it as by travel blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nicely blush. It blends well and the color gives you a dewy glow.

Just off the bat I am a very pale dry skinned girl so keep that in mind. For me this blush is as close the the ideal as it can get. Perfect sheer color that brings you face to life, and a long lasting formula that doesn't cling to dry spots. Magical!
I have porcelain skin and this blush is subtle and blends well with my skin. It's perfect for everyday wear. I love it! If you have darker skin you may want something a bit deeper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color... perfect for my fair skin!
Love Love Love!! Super pigmented and soft on the skin. The color looks wonderful on fair skin. I don't like the brush for the blush, but it works great for powder contour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this since when it was first released. This is my 4th box using this and you can't go wrong with this blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, which confuses me. I bought this because my very fair friend said it was hard to overdue this blush. She had used only this blush for years because others looked too clownish. I do not have that problem and can wear a wide range of colors, but am glad I purchased this subtle pink. It loos natural and fresh for a youthful, clean look. Great on sunny mornings!
This blush does not lie when it says it is the perfect baby-blush pink-- instantly warms up the look of my face and (if applied correctly) so subtle and sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is really my holy grail blush. It fits with every make-up look. The brush I find it's easy to use and blend well. I bought this also for my friends. They love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this looks so pretty on my skin tone (light-medium). I love how the colour is buildable. there's shimmer in the blush but it doesn't come through on the skin (at least for me).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for travel - lightweight, compact but still easy to get a brush in. Product just as good as regular size but better for traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to blush - it works brilliantly as either a light touch across the cheek for day wear, or as a buildable colour for night. Not a harsh pink at all
This blush is such a cute color! It is light and can be built up. It has some shimmer in it which I don't mind. It also has a great sent. The brush that comes with it makes it easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite blush. I am quite fair and find most blush colors too harsh for my skin tone. This one is fresh and pretty.
I love this but I wish it had a little more pigment. I feel I have to put a lot on before it's noticeable
It's a decent blush, It's not too too pigmented, but it smells like flowers or some sort of perfume.

I am very pale skinned and most blushed look way too bright and clown like on me. This is a very soft natural inner pink when applied. Definitely would need either a thick one application or lightly layered to achieve a deeper brighter and richer color. However, I stick with a light one or maybe two applications for a natural inner pink glow. Pairing it with a pink highlighter is wonderful. It's a smooth application that doesn't grip on the my patches of dry skin or acne.

I received this as a sample - I really didnt expect to like it, but I love it. Its so natural looking. Im very fair so a lot of blushes can look very obvious and unnatural on me. This is really subtle but adds a nice amount of color to look like Im naturally flushed. I will be buying when the sample runs out - but I wish it didnt come in box though, hard to fit in my every day cosmetic bag.

reviews.review_title: Does not show up at all
reviews.review_text: I have now had this blush for about 5 months and it never really did a thing to my face. It barely shows up on my fair skin. For me, there is no pigmentation whatsoever. I regret buying this product. I recently bought a blush from I Heart MakeUp and that one was sooo much more pigmented! I would never again waste my money on this Benefit blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: perfect buildable flush! this is now my favorite blush!
Perfect for everyday wear i had to layer it on a lil bit to see it but its such a pretty pink, looks even better with a bit of pink shimmer highlight on top
I have been using this for a decade and it's always been a go to product. Can't go wrong with this product.  Leaves a great finish for pictures

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush for daily wear. No shimmer, very natural and the brush provides the perfect amount of color.
its so natural and cute ! i love it so much !
This is a beautiful blush specially if you are of fair complexion
It's perfect! Smells amazing and looks great. You don't have to be super careful when applying it because it looks so natural. Definitely a repurchase.
If you've got pale skin and want a subtle blush then this is the one for you by far. Builds up beautifully too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The powder is soft and delicate. It's very good for novices to apply the blush as the color is very nature but not too deep. You can apply more times to make the color more obvious.

This is a cult favorite for a reason‚Äîit gives you natural baby pink cheeks without it looking gaudy. ^__^  Dupe: I found that Dandelion is extremely close in shade to NARS Impassioned. Love them both though.
This isn't my favorite of the boxed powders, but I still love it! The packaging is so so cute and the color is natural and soft. If you like light makeup this is great for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this is my HG of blushes, I have literally been using this since high school (2006 cough), I have used other blushes but always come back to this. It is a very natural and buildable color for porcelain ladies like myself. I recommend it to all pale tones, even bought my cousin some who LOVED the box. I do wish it lasted longer but that may be my skin... I am prone to oily skin.
Bought this when I was travelling. Perfect small size and light. The Colour is beautiful, like a natural pink. Made my face glow and I didn't need full makeup. Love it !

I was hesitant about spending so much money on a blush, so I bought the mini size. I love it! It's exactly what I was hoping for... a very natural flushed pink that you can build up without worrying about looking like a clown. I will be buying a full size when this mini is done.
I love this blush, my go to.  I threw the brush, it's hard to use and scraps the blush while stored.  I just love this color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite blush. The light pink color is very flattering and not super pigmented. You won't go overboard with this easily. It wears all day and feels fine. I've never had an issue with it.

pros:  sheer natural pink color that may work with most of the skin tones, easy to apply and very compact which has a mirror and a brush in the tiny box.  con: strongly scented and causing BREAK OUTS!!!!
Perfect for fair skin. Love the color and love how buildable it is. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a lighter toned soft blush.

I absolutely hate this product and would not recommend to anyone. This blush is very chalky, not pigmented, too light and it also has so much fallout. It has a little bit of shimmer which I like but you can barely see it once you swatch it or put it on your face. Do not buy this product, stay clear!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The blush is excellent, just the right amount of pigment for fairer girls, love it. But the box is very frustrating - the blush is inset deep inside the box, and unless you plan on using the tiny brush it comes with, you have to wiggle in your brush inside the box. So annoying.
Sadly this pink was much too bright on my fair skin. Also I thought it was extremely small for the price.
Looks nice on my light skin. I contour and it really makes it pop. Pretty light pink for spring and summer.
I like the pigmentation - bright and cute for summer. Looks great on my fair complexion.
Good pigmentation and smells great
very pretty but it didn't work with some brushes????? some brushes it works on but some just push the powder around while still just sitting on top of skin instead of blending idk it's rlly weird

This blush is perfect for summer, it's a warmer pink which is what I tend to wear when it's warm. I wear cooler blushes in winter. This blush has the slightest bit of shimmer that lifts my cheekbones and makes them look totally sculpted! The shimmer isn't noticeable like a highlight, it just looks like perfect cheekbones!!

I never ever wear blush but wanted to give it a go and of course I looked at every single blush out there and found this gem. It is so perfect! I am medium skintone with yellow undertone and this blush looks so natural on me. It is such a subtle pink, not over the top
This is such a nice, soft color. It has a light flowery perfume to it too, which i liked. Brush is interesting, applies the blush decently.

reviews.review_title: one of my favorite blushes of all time!
reviews.review_text: Usually I like more shimmery blushes, however when it comes to Benefit I LOVE their blushes! This was my first blush I bought from them way back in the day and it's my favorite I love the color. I love how easily it blends and how smooth it goes on. It's hard to overdo it with these. I feel they give the most amazing flush to the cheeks that's natural looking yet sophisticated. I own every color blush from this brand. That's how much I love them! But this one was the one that started it all and I just can't say enough good things about it! It was love at first sight!
It's my favorite blush. It's very natural. I used it for 3 years. I recommend this product for an everyday look.

I have pale skin, and I flush really easily, and this product is great. I apply it lightly underneath my eyes to blend my concealer into my skin, and I wear it heavier as a blush. It's a really nice color.
Literally didn't even show up wasn't pigmented at all
Daily Use Dry Skin Normal Skin Oily Skin Sensitive Skin
I have light to medium skin tone, actually it's more light than medium, and this blush is perfect, it looks super natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, the color is so lady-like and gorgeous on all skin tones. Personally, I don't like a lot of blush, so I get the travel size of this one and it lasts me forever. It stays all day and smells just lovely!

This blush us on the more natural end of the spectrum, but it is perfect for my pale skin tone! After using the travel size from a set, I immediately fell in love with this blush. I highly recommend this product for lighter skin tones!

Bought the trial size...as I am really not a blush person. Absolutely love this. It is the perfect colour with just the right amount of luminosity for a lighter complexion. Will buy the full size next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've loved Dandelion for more than a decade and still use it every day.  With very fair and cool-toned skin, this can be applied lightly over the entire face very flatteringly, and a second application on the cheeks makes a good blush.  I originally became a dedicated user because years ago most foundations were waaaaay too yellow-based for me, and this saved me from looking sickly.  Now, even though I can find numerous fine foundations, I still like how Dandelion freshens up my overall look.  If you are fair and cool-toned, you'll definitely enjoy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how natural this looks on my fair skin, and a touch of glow. It is a light pink and a little goes a long way. Easy to blend when contouring.
This gives just the right amount of colour to give a nice flushed look. Perfect when it's a light not to glam makeup day.
Two huge pros for this product -1) has a subtle shimmer that gives a great natural color to the cheek and 2) has a wonderful, floral smell. This is a true pink - less is more with this product!

I don't think anyone would use this as a blush.. though they probably could and look great which is a plus with this brand.  Benefit is one of my fave brands for so many reasons and this here is definitely one.  I use this as a highlighter or as a brightener... mainly as a brightener under my foundation and on top of my concealer.  It's absolutely beautiful and make look super light but that's how it's supposed to be.  You're not supposed to just splack it on your face and go.  I also love that for those who think they are supposed to splack it on they have hints on the back of the little box.  Finely spun with delicate mauves and pinks, this exquisite brightening face powder leaves a petal like finish.  And they're so nice about it!
I have very fair skin and this blush compliments it perfectly! My only complaint is that I find the color not lasting long on my cheeks even with a setting spray.

This blush is not just for fair skin. Mine is a little darker (I wear Makeup forever 118 Y325, and 49 neutral in the KVD lock-it) and this blush gives it the perfect natural flush. A little also goes a long way, and it does last on all day for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best blush for fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best blush for fair skin. I love the colour, the sheen, and the scent. Must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: loveeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
I love this blush! The color is just perfect for me (I'm light skinned) and it smells so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great product wrapped in great packaging. I loved that there is a small mirror included in this compact product, along with a nifty brush. The scent really caught me off guard but it's light so it doesn't bother me. I wish it was less shimmer but it is a perfect shade of pink.

This is definitely my go to blush, I've used so many and I keep coming back to this one. It's a perfect pale pink, pretty for a natural day look and buildable for night with a highlight and some bronzer. Not super pigmented, but in my opinion an essential to own.

reviews.review_title: Love all the Box o' powders
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've had all of the Box o' blushes and I love them all. They're easy to use, good for beginners, and last FOREVER. Dandelion is a neutral/slightly warm pink. It's a little more sheer than I prefer nowadays, but it's easy to build. You could throw this stuff on with your eyes closed and do just fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been meaning to try this product for years, and when I noticed a travel size while in line at Sephora, I grabbed it, and am delighted with it. I've been looking for a light pink blush for some time and this works perfectly as blush and highlighter. The packaging is very nice, comes in a cute box with a small brush inside. Highly recommend!
It's good for fair and light skin tones, it adds a subtle pink to the cheeks, however if you're tan it won't show up well.
I like the packaging and it feels nice to use, but it doesn't do much to my skin. Sad to return it, but I didn't want to waste my money on something that doesn't make a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with the fairest of complexions, finding blush can be difficult. This is the perfect pinky-peach color that adds just the right amount of color to the cheeks. The ONLY thing I don't like about this product is the packaging, as it is really bulky.
I am super super fair skinned and this makes me look like I have color without being a clown, it's super natural! It also stay on forever and blends out beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first heard about this blush fifteen years ago and have been in love ever since. I'm generally fair to pale (in the winter) with pink undertones and this blush looks so good with my coloring. Just a bit and I've got a very pretty flush with no obnoxious shimmer. I continue to love this product into my 30's.
Great product on my skin, and package idea is fantastic in my purse or desk at the office.  You never know when you need a bit of colour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this product a couple of weeks ago and love it already for everyday wear! I have pale skin and it just adds a subtle pop of colour. A little product goes a long way! Plus it smells nice! This might be my new go-to blush!
Heard great things about this blush. However I did not like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome blush and the packaging is the perfect size for traveling. I do not use the brush it comes with. Great pigmentation and lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the blush for five years now and its the best thing for my pale skin. It doesn't look too iridescent and it builds up really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to only wear Benefit Bronzers and Blush about 8 years ago but have long since changed to other products. I forgot what a great all around color this delivers! Great finish too
I love this color! I don't usually use it on its own though, usually over other blushes when I want them to look a little more pink. It's soft and goes on smooth, blends well and smells so good!
This is an extemely flattering pink on my light mediun skin with yellow undertone, why have I waited for so long to get this!
Cute pink. Always a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim since it has continued to get praise and high reviews for many years now.  I think Benefit makes quality blush products.  However, this pale pink shade just isn't right for my skin tone.  I didn't knock off any stars though because I think it is a very nice blush for those seeking a barely there, pretty pink flush of color.
This color is unwearable, and is almost chalky compared to the other benefit blushes. Pass this one and go for rockatour

I have light skin but tan to a light-medium skin tone in the summer. When I applied this to my face during the summer I really had to layer it to see any effect and this can look quite powdery. However, when I am my pale winter self, it is the most beautiful blush I have ever owned. Being a pale face, blush has always been a struggle as I can go straight from 0 to clown in one swipe. But this is such a beautiful, delicate pink shade with a hint of a pale gold shift that it just looks so pretty on pale skin.
Love this blush! Lovely light pink is flattering on my pale skin. Easy application with good pigmentation.
It's the perfect shade of pink for an everyday look. Long lasting and smells good. The packaging annoys me a little but the product itself is great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pink blush is perfect for fair skin. Most pinks are too deep for my light tone, but this pink is great for an everyday-light-neutral-touch-of-flush kind of blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i really enjoy this blush!  i like the colour a lot, its gives me a very natural flush of colour with a little bit of sheen to it. the formulation of this blush is also excellent, very creamy, blendable and quite long-lasting.  i literally have zero complaints.  * please be warn that it is slightly scented, but the scent does not linger on to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as an impulse buy at checkout but really love it! It blends perfectly on my skin and looks natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is just okay with my skin for everyday wear. I don't think I will buy again. It also has a fragrance which I'm not a fan of.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blush!! It's great for almost all kind of looks. Despite its lighter shade, I've found it looks great on almost all skin tones. I love the fact how it looks very natural when applied, but can easily be built up to look more dramatic. This blush never leaves my makeup bag!  In short, I would definitely recommend this product to anyone!

reviews.review_title: Didn't think I'd like it but I do!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went into Sephora looking for the Hoola bronzer & the sales lady showed me this & I tried it on & fell in lust! It gives my Indian skin a nice suttle but sweet glow. It's perfect for a more natural look.
It doesn't show up on my skin but maybe it's just too light for me
Amazing blush with a little bit of sparkle, just the right amount of pink and coral to go with any skin tone. Love this color, it also smells good! Highly recommend to anyone!
Smells SOOO GOOD and it's beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the travel size of this blush on a whim.  It is very  light and works well with my very fair skin.  The smell is lovely too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Average blush, but packaging is poor. The cardboard-like packaging gives it a cheap look. The quality is good, but it isn't too special.

i love this blush. I first tried this in a face set and it's the only one I used cometely! So I bought the cute little box. I've used it with the included brush but I find it too wide and dense so I use my angled blush brush which gives me a more controlled, consistent color stoke. The color is just subtle enough to make the cheeks pop without over powering the face. If you're looking for a drastic color this blush isn't the one. I wear it with Hoola under my cheek bones to contour and get tons of complaments on the pair. I'm fair skinned but I tan and I wear it with both skin tones alike. If you're looking for a natural yet chic blush you'll love this. I compare it to my Chanel baby pink blush. I don't notice a sparkle.
This is my FAVORITE blush. I am very pale, and love a natural soft look. Which this accomplishes so nicely!

I have very pale skin so many blushes end up looking poorly-blended no matter what I do. This one is just pink enough. It applies smoothly and blends well. I haven't actually noticed any shimmer in this blush so if it's there, it's very low-key.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use my own blush brush and I love that its sheer and a little shimmery. And I noticed the other night that it DOES actually have the light scent of dandelions and I find that rather pleasant! The blush is definitely meant for a natural look for a day, but does have buildable coverage.
Perfect everyday blush. Looks so natural and beautiful on the skin
This is a really nice pale blush, without nasty chunks on glitter in it. It really warms up the face. You can also use it as an illuminating face powder which is very cool and looks really nice.

I love the color but it does not go well with anyone with a slightly over medium skin tone it blends right in unless you pile it on. It doesnt glide on as smoothly as I wish it would, its slightly chalky and could be itchy once on your cheeks. The brush also doesnt help much especially on the small travel size, its hard to manage the brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was testy at first, but once I tried it on my face, wow!! it is a pale pink blush hence I was hesitant, but it gives just the right amount of pink to brighten your face and it doesn't overwhelm you.If you have an white, but a bit of an olive tone then it will look great on you.
This is a gorgeous shade and as a very fair skinned person it looked amazing but once I got a tan I really had to pack it on for it to be noticeable at all, would not recommend for darker skin tones.

It was pretty in coloring for my fair skin it just didn't wow me. It was pretty powdery and had shimmer which didn't bother me but if you are looking for a matte look this is not a good product. I think this would be worth the money if it was 20$ but not 30$ you can get much better products for the price it is at.

reviews.review_title: Color great for my fair skin
reviews.review_text: I love it and goes great with my fair skin.

reviews.review_title: not as great as I hoped
reviews.review_text: It's a gorgeous color with a fresh soft scent, BUT it doesn't last long. Almost as soon as I apply it, it wears off. It's such a light feel powder that there's no staying power. It's as if the moment a breeze comes along its blown right off your cheeks. I wouldn't recommend this as a blush. I use it as an eyeshadow with primer under of course.
It's ok seen better blushes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A very lovely color but a little too natural for this makeup crazy lady! That said, if you are looking for a softer finish, I would definitely recommend this blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My lifelong battle with blush finally ended when I purchased the travel size of this blush to try out. For those with a light to medium complexion like myself it is ABSOLUTELY TO DIE FOR. Pigmented but not overly so (I like a natural glow so this might not be for you if you like intense color), smells amazing, has a very slight shimmer to it, and oh my word the color is just the best! Benefit cosmetics is my absolute favorite and this blush was a great reminder of why I love them so much. Give this a try ladies!!!

reviews.review_title: Really good blush, except for the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like everything about this blush, well not the brush, that little thing got thrown out immediately. The color is great and it lasts all day. Only thing I don't like is the smell. Now I am very sensitive to fragrances, but this is almost too much for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For my skin color I will give it 5 stars. It comes with it's own brush and blends very well. I would recommend it for someone looking for a light and subtle pink blush

when I bought this blush I was really excited because it was a pretty light pink blush when I wanted natural looks. As soon as I tried it on my medium - tan skin , it didn't show up AT ALL. I was so disappointed it was not worth the money$$. although it  does work as a very natural face powder so that is why I gave it 2 stars.
For a blush that you don't want to give away is a blush Dandelion is a great, light, matte powder that gives you a forgiving complexion without dancing with intense pigment or color.

I DIE FOR THIS BLUSH!! I've finally found it, the perfect light baby pink blush I've been searching for for so long. I'm medium skin tone but this blush is seriously pigmented so it's like a ballerina pink that is gorrrrrgeous.. Since I got it I haven't worn anything else. I currently have the other benefit blushes in my cart. Xoxo in love!!
All time favorite blush, blends like a dream and lasts all day with a setting spray

reviews.review_title: Benefit Cosmetics Dandelion Box o‚Äô Powder Blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this product previously, it gives a subtle blush effect, goes on smooth as well.
I have a medium complexion and found the colour wasn't very noticeable and didn't seem to stay on. Good little travel size though with a brush in it makes it very convenient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the pink color on my light skin.  It's buildable and comes with a nice brush.

reviews.review_title: Dandelion Box O' powder pink blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is cute little box with just the right amount for summer fun in the sun at only $15! I like how it was so easy to ravel with. The color really looks good on my fair skin, even though I do have pink undertones and try and stay away this is the perfect color!

Absolutely love this blush! I can understand how people with darker complexions because it is very light which is great for my fair skin. I wear it whenever I'm wearing makeup because of its light and natural color!
Just the right touch of natural looking color.  Easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color for my fair skin. Its available in travel size and I can't live without it! As a perk, it smells great too!
Like but do not like the smell.

reviews.review_title: Not great for darker skin tones
reviews.review_text: I do like the color in the package, but it is so light it doesn't really show up on my tanned skin. You really have to build up to get any color. I will try again after summer is over.

I got this because I needed a new blush, and benefit usually doesn't disappoint. This is amazing! Very pigmented even on my tan skin and it smells amazing! It has just the perfect amount of shimmer too for a very subtle glow. I love this! I don't own any other blush. I bought the mini size just to try and it has lasted a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color for everyday use, blends easily and smells amazing.

Love this blush so much!! First off, it is NOT terribly pigmented, but that is precisely why I love it. It reminds me (pay off wise) of Tarte's Prim. It is a soft sheer wash of color that is lightly build-able so on your less intense makeup days you can run this over your cheeks for a simple soft flush without it looking like you're wearing blush. This may not be for everyone, so try the smaller size first.
This is my fav blush! Third time restocking
This blush is absolutely amazing and so versatile! LOVE it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I neither love or dislike this product, I am just confused of its concept. It says its a face powder, but when I use like that, it looks odd, and has too much flecky shimmer for the entire face. But when I apply it as blush, you can't see it. I think if the formula was a little darker it would be beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin and love the color of this blush. It looks natural and beautiful on. Never looks streaky. I wouldn't recommend for someone who likes a heavy contoured look because this is extremely natural. Light shimmer to it but less than an actual highlighter. Makes your skin look glowy without an intense sparkle!
Love this blush. The color is a perfect pink for fair- slightly tan skin. The brush may be my favorite part. It Puts the blush on in a perfect position.

reviews.review_title: Best Blush I have ever used
reviews.review_text: I freaking love this blush!  It's has a color that builds and it really brightens your cheeks. It also smells SO GOOD!!! It's very light and the packaging is pretty awesome as well.
I wanted to like this, unfortunately I'm more on the tanned side and this did nothing for my skin. Returned it after one use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had a lot of trouble finding a beautiful blush that I can use daily. My daily makeup consists of a natural face w/ light contouring, a simple cat eye with some white shimmer/sparkle in the center of my top and bottom lid as well as the tearduct highlight area. Since I use a shimmer on my eyes I don't like using a blush that is also shimmery. I received the NARS orgasm as a gift but I rarely use it because it is so shimmery. After talking to my sister about this she let me try her Benefit Dandelion Box o' Powder Blush and I fell in LOVE!! Not only does it have a beautiful, light fragrance but it also has a beautiful colour. It's sheer enough to look very natural but you can also build up the colour with more layers. The only downside to this blush is the containers design and the brush it comes with (hence, the four stars). I'm not sure which size I have but it is quite small which makes it a little inconvenient to use a kabuki brush which is what I use for blush. The brush that it comes with fits perfectly in the little box, however, it feels a little rough and I don't like the coverage it applies; it doesn't do a good job blending up and out. Overall, I highly recommend this blush although I would recommend to buy the larger container so that you can use the brush of your choice to apply it. It has such a lovely smell as well and as someone who tends to break out easily it hasn't irritated my skin at all. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!

This shade is really pretty for people like myself who are very very fair, however it is great for mixing as well. If you have a medium or darker skin tone this mixes beautifully with darker blushes to lighten and brighten and add a subtle sheen

the blush is great for a bit on pink of fair skin, after self tanning and going to a medium skin color you can't see this pink AT ALL! I am not disappointed in this product at all but I will not be repurchasing, this blush does not stay on for more than 2 hours TOPS! Also I know this is the brush you get with the Hoola Bronzee also, it's so rough; I and that's an understatement, had to purchase a blush brush that fit into the box. I love the color I just wish that Benefit would fix the formula to be a little longer wearing.
THIS. SMELLS. SO FREAKING GOOD. And it's super gorgeous. It's a light baby pink, super awesome for my fellow fair babies. Will be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is described as a pressed highlighting powder However, it's far from that it doesn't have the best pigmentation but when you build it up, it's blush. Not a highlighter as stated but it works as a good natural blush, preferable for fair skin as I'm not sure if this will show up in darker complexions. The pigmentation is not the best but I can deal with building it up.
Amazing color, not too pink. Very pigmented. It's overall an amazing blush and the brush is very nice as well.
Ive been using this blush for several years and it never disappoints me! It smells very good also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Radiant power is a soft finish that will look good on  younger skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled with blushes all my life, as I have very very pale skin and most blushers ate too rich for me. I tried this blush in the store and didn't think much of it, but I kept seeing glowing reviews from almost everyone and decided to buy the travel version.   When I first tried it on at home I fell in love with this adorable blush! It smells great and adds a perfect touch of pink to my cheeks. There is little to no fallout and is housed in a sturdy cardboard case. The travel size brush is soft with some firm bristles that pick up the powder perfectly and fits into the box, but my favorite thing about the brush is the size. I have a small face and this brush is almost perfect for me!  Overall, you NEED this blush, it is by far one of my favorite makeup items i own!

I would not call this a ballerina pink, nor is it shimmery, nor is it a highlighter. It's a light pink blush & that's about the only accurate part of the description. It's a warm pink, not a cool pink. It has no shimmer and no highlighting qualities. It's just your basic run of the mill blush. The brush is cute, but it's going back to the store.

reviews.review_title: I've used this for over 15 years and still love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would have never bought this blush on my own. I have light medium skin with olive undertones and black hair and tan very easily. I thought that this blush would just took pale and chalky, ashy with my skin tone.   A friend gave this to me for my birthday and I have been using it ever since. It is the most flattering blush I've ever used. I like it even better than Nars orgasm. If you just need an everyday blush for a no-make up fresh look. This is it. If i'm going out, or need a more dramatic look, I'll use it as a highlighter and just brush a little bit as a finish over the darker color. They say radiant and brightening. It's true. I think it's flattering because, even though it's a pale pink, it's not whitish, or ashy. It does't lighten, it just adds a dose of petal pink and maybe just a hint of gold shimmer.   I just saw that they have a liquid, too. I think I may get that to layer underneath. It looks like people have recommended it in the reviews.   Also, people with darker skin shouldn't be afraid to try this blush. It truly seems to work with all skin tones. When I'm in the sun, I get dark fast. It's just as flattering. Thinking about it? Give it a try. It's so pretty.
It's a nice, subtle, baby-pink blush. It is so subtle that I don't think it would show up if you have a medium or dark skin tone. It's also scented with a perfumey smell.
This is such a beautiful pale matte pink colour I love it! Looks gorgeous now but can't wait until I get a bit of a tan and it will hopefully show up a bit more pink
I believe that Benefit has a lot of good products. I am olive/medium skin  I really like this color, light and just the right glow.

I am very pale and unless I applied the blush heavily it was not visible on my skin. I feel like because I have to apply so much it is was to bright for red head and doesn't look as soft as I've seen on others skin.
Love love love love this blush. It smells so nice and its the perfect blush, its long lasting and it has a very natural luminous pinky color. Its my go to everyday blush.
This blushes is so pretty ! I love it . It is so cute and small blushes !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on and makes your face shine/glow but by no means is it overly pink.  Gives a very soft illuminating glow to your face. Definitely a good thing to wear for daytime when you not looking to actually stand out like you do when you go out for the evening!

reviews.review_title: very good for a natural look
reviews.review_text: Good quality , natural looking product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best blushes out there. Love the color and texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a light skin tone and this barely shows on my skin unless applied heavily.
I love this blush I have the full size and wanted a smaller version for traveling ....the color is perfect not too dark doesn't make you look like a clown....looks like a natural glow....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color on my cheeks! I like the texture and the result of this product. I have sensitive skin and it seems to not make my skin irritated or break out.  I'm going to start trying the Benefits line based on how much I like this product.

This is the perfect kiss of pink on the cheeks.  This blush smells delicious, and it's a great, light pop of color.  I don't usually wear blush, but sometimes I look a little more pale than I normally am, and this just brightens up my face and brings it the color I wish I had naturally.
This is a really pretty soft blush. If your looking for something sweet this a good one its not to over powering. I feel like it can be a universal blush for most sling types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I received it as a present and my friend got me the travel size because she wasn't sure if I would like it, but I will definitely be purchasing the bigger one as soon as it runs out. This color is perfect. I used to use a different blush, which worked fine, but sometimes it would be way too red and I wouldn't like how it looked. This is a subtle pink tone that makes such a big difference to how you look and feel, without feeling artificial. Benefit is really good at making you look sun kissed without looking like you've piled on a lot of makeup, and I would recommend this product to anyone with any skin tone. This is a light pink, but I have medium-dark skin and it gives the perfect amount of pigment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on impulse like many others did, although I got the travel size. I did not get this at Sephora, though. I got it at Macy's because it was $12 instead of $15 but I thought I'd write the review on here because it would be more helpful.  Anyways, I received it in the mail today. It is amazing. It is quite small, but of course it is the travel size. I read many many many reviews saying it was way too light. That is not true. Yes, it is not as pigmented as many blushes, but it definitely shows on my skin. It really brightens my face without making me look like a clown or too overdone. The brush with it works fine, but I prefer using my go to blush brush. This is the perfect everyday blush. Perfect for school, or those who don't have the money to purchase multiple blushes. It's great for youths who want to enhance their natural beauty. This is a pretty neutral color and I think would look great on anybody. Again, this is a NATURAL BLUSH. On darker skins, it could be used as a highlighter, but I don't recommend it. If you want to use it as a highlighter, it's way better to buy an actual highlighter. There is a slight shimmer in it, All in all, this is a great go-to blush, perfect for any natural look.

LOVE this blush! Picked up the mini version in store only because it was so cute but it is already becoming a staple in my makeup rotation. The powder formula goes on really well and allows you to build for more color or just lightly dust for a soft glow and the color is GORGEOUS. I have really fair skin in the winter and it's the perfect natural pink that gives you a pinky, rosy glow without being overpowering. It also smells heavenly which is always a plus! I also like that it wears well throughout the day; it probably isn't as long-lasting as something like the Tarte amazonian clay 12 hour blush buuuut it still holds up nicely over the course of wear. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a soft, natural-looking pink!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! I have pretty fair skin and it is a nice, sheer glow for me :) It goes on easily and who doesn't love Benefit's packaging?!

I cannot say enough good things about this blush. It goes on smoothly and I don't have to build too much to get a nice rosy color, although it is build-able. I have pale skin, but several of my friends, with different skin tones (olive and medium/dark) use this blush and look fabulous! Best blush I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a very hard time finding a blush that looks natural on my fair skin without making me look like a clown. This is the perfect shade for me!
This is my favorite blush. It is very subtle and not sparkly. It looks great on my fair skin and lasts all day.

This is my all time favorite blush! It's great for work or daytime, because it's a soft pink. It gives the perfect flush. Even if I use another blush for the day, I always reach for this all an all over, brightening powder. The smell is soooo good too.

I want to love this but can't. I am VERY fair. I should be able to see the color! It's also very dusty- I use tons of it to get a payoff, but it just makes my skin look dusty. Looking for the perfect baby pink still.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a bit worried after ordering that this would be too light. Some reviews say there is no color pay off.  I have fair skin with yellow undertones.  (3y02 typically matches me)  I am not the absolute palest skin, but I am definitely fair.  This color definitely shows up on my skin tone.  It has a soft shimmer that can only be noticed in certain light.  Because the color is soft, I think it is versatile for many looks.  I'm happy with this color.  If you have fair skin, I think this is worth looking into.
very eacy to make a natural daily look. love it

If you took a whimsical girly feel and boxed it up this is what you would have.  It is a fair pink shade, which is perfect for my very fair skin.  It also has this beautiful girly smell to it.  It's absolutely perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a perfect shade of pale pink! I use it daily as my blush. Adds just a hint of color for day time use. And it's got a slight fragrance of roses. I will definitely be purchasing this again!

I am very fair and this is the only blush that has ever worked on my neutral skin. It's very faint and realistic, it's subtle and gives skin a beautiful glow (not too sparkly). I think it would give a beautiful glow to most skin tones and it can be built up to a decent amount of color (on my skin) to be good enough for an evening out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color is really nice. The blush give you a nice natural look.
One more reason to love the Benefit line, I have used this product for 3 years.  love it more than my NARS! It's my go to blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this whisper soft powder sets on my face.  It adds color and a softness to the face and I use it during the day to refresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent blush! I usually use Rockateur but find this to be a nice light alternative. Very buildable. It is fairly pink so keep that in mind with the rest of your make up, but for a nice light look this is perfect.  Used it with high beam and it was great.

The packaging is cute, it includes its own brush too. The product has a nice soft perfume scent. It does have a bit of shimmer. It's easy to blend. It's a subtle blush. I really like it, but I don't looove it.
Love it. Nice light color. Blends easily.
this is very good and user friendly! I love it!
I was hesitant because I didn't think it would look good(because it's a pale pink) but I love it. It's just give you a soft cute look! Glad I purchased it. Oh and it smells great!

I love the blush and high beam. Perfect for just a sample if you are trying for the first time and don't want to waste 26$ on one bottle. I didn't personally like the blush tint but I have olive skin !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this blush for a year and the box lasts such a long time. I have an arsenal of different blush products and this is my favorite powder blush. It gives such a sweet and pretty natural color on my cheeks. I never look overdone. I also just bought the cream version which is wonderful! Sometimes I wear the cream Dandelion with a light dusting of the powder Dandelion on top.  The shade is so delicate and beautiful I will repurchase this over and over.

This product is amazing I rarely go through an entire products of blusher, but this one is a must-have! I'm almost out and will be purchasing another because the color is just so perfect to add to any look. Worn alone or on top of bronzer, in summer or in winter it is the perfect delicate pink blusher.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Girly ballerina pink blush goes on light and bright. I love the light fresh smell to the powder. Smart and compact packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product on a whim (not gonna lie, mostly because of the packaging) and I love it. I can use it as a soft highlight or as a blush. I find that it goes on a bit strongly with the included brush, but I usually blend it out with a fluffy brush or a kabuki to spread it out a bit more. I usually use it on my cheekbones and temples as a soft highlight/blush.
I love how this gives me a slight pink glow. I usually use bronzer on my cheeks, but I have switched after finding this product!
I use this as a blush topper for mauve blushes and it's perfect for an everyday face!

I have hoola, rockateer, and Dallas but I I've always wanted to try this blush! I tried it on today for the first time and fell in love! It's the perfect light baby doll pink! Perfect for a fresh and dreamy spring look. Light shimmer and very light pink. Really made me feel beautiful today!

Got this on whim during checkout, as I love all things travel size. If I own it, I want the miniature version to take with me. This was small to begin with, so I hesitated for half a second. But it's just adorable!!! It completes my travel beauty bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This offers just a touch of pink, I really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly became a holy grail product for me! It gives me a beautiful flush of color without looking too heavy. Perfect for everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for an everyday look, especially school. It is barely noticeable but there is still that beautiful pink flush. This looks amazing paired with the hoola bonzer as well. This is the only blush I really use.
I was really nervous when I bought this considering I have very pale and already kind of red skin. But I love it soooo much, it give my cheeks a perfect glow and soft pink tint.

I was looking for something I could wear to work and not look like I was going to the club and party all night. This blush is perfect-not too light, not too dark. It gives you a perfect pink hint on your cheeks and it smells amazing.

Love this soo much i have a medium skin tone and i tried it because my sister recommended even though i was a bit skeptical because it is so light. It gives off a beautiful glow even if it does not show up very much, if i want it to show i have to apply layers of it which is ok because i love the effect of this powder. I bought the mini size and will purchase a full size soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so flattering and the smell is devine. Just the right amount of pigmentation. The brush it comes with isn't my favorite, but who cares? This stuff is a must have.

I was checking out and saw this in the trial size bins. I had no idea what it was but I have used Sugar Rush and several other Benefit powders and I liked them so I thought I should go ahead and get it and if I loved it, I I could he t the larger size later and if I didn't like it I could always just use it on the go. I tried it the next day and it's awesome! I used it as a blush and got the perfect color! It's not noticeable, it's more like a light, youthful glow. I used it the next day as a finishing powder and my face has never looked so bright. I will be getting a larger box for use at home and keep the smaller box for use in the go.
This blush is perfect for my pale pink skin. Not too dark, muddy or shocking, just the right natural looking color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a really natural blush for the winter time when I have lighter skin, and this gives the most beautiful hint of ballerina pink. It's not noticeably shimmery, but does have a bit of a glow. It is also lightly scented.
I love this blush. I'm fair-light skinned and this blush gives me such a nice light flush. Love it!!! Great to have in my collection, plus the packaging is very cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super light coverage. I found that I had to add multiple layers of this for it to show up, then I found that it still didn't do much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found a travel size of this blush in the impulse buy section and I really love it! The quality is great, the color is a smooth light pink, perfect for fair skin. It's my first time trying any benefit powders and I'm impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. I have fair to medium skin tone and this really adds that pretty youthful glow. It showed up on me more than i expected. The description says you can use it as a brightening powder all over but I find it is much too pink for that. There is a tiny amount of shimmer but it really doesn't show up on the skin.  My only critique is that I find it a touch powdery and it shows up on my skin slightly.. I'm not sure if it's the mini version I bought but overall it's a very pretty blush. It's mildly scented and I really like how it smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my favorite blush when i want a really natural look. its extremely pink, so i only use this is i dont have much going on with the eyes. it gives a beautiful, healthy glow!

I was so worried this wouldn't fit my skintone and that you needed to be fair to wear this blush when I got it in a kit, but it's actually perfect! I have a medium beige skintone (usually a nc30 in mac if that helps) and this blush shows up as the most natural pink flush, it doesn't enterfire with the rest of my makeup and it's what I wear for my minimal, no-makeup makeup days. Also, I don't know why this is referred to as a highlighting powder because the shimmer is pretty nonexistent especially once applied to the face, just a natural glow!

Love it!! I am someone with light to medium skin and I love it it is very natural good for everyday. And they just came out with a mini one that is $18 in Canada and that is amazing because I didn't want to pay the full price for the bigger one and the mini is a good size. They also came out with a mini hoola bronzer and can't wait to get that next I love both. Good job benefit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: awesome product! it is my go to blush for an everyday look! i have a very light skin tone and this blush goes perfectly with my skin. LOVE IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best blush for daily use. I was worried if the color would not show up on my skintone since mine is in between light and medium, but it actually turned out good on me! Very natural, you don't have to worry about looking 'too much' no matter how light-skinned you are. But probably not gonna work well as a blush to medium or darker skinned people.
This is an all year round perfect blusher, I'm addicted! It adds the perfect blush to cheeks & I even brush it over my upper eyelids, it gives a healthy glow too.

This blush is AMAZING if you're looking for a pale pink blush to use on a fair skin tones. All other light pink blushes I tried still looked very bright and punchy and I was wanting one more on the pastel side and this one is the most absolute perfect ballerina pink. This blush would not show up well on skin tones other than fair though (I.e. medium or darker). The smell of it is nice too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has a hint of gold shimmer in it. It's pretty but doesn't show up well on my medium-deep skin tone. I still like it and will keep it but it's very faint. The box is cute and has a magnetic flip closure and little brush inside. If you're looking for a pretty pinky color, also try Hourglass in Luminous Flush or Dior's pink glow blush. Can't go wrong with either, imo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is nice but I'm not in love with it. I have to use so much product to actually see something on my skin - especially if I'm using it alone. it is mostly shimmer than color. returned it to the store
This is one of my favorite blushes, it is the perfect light pink with a little bit of shimmer. Would 100% recommend to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is incredible! It is quite sheer but I love that. I think its the perfect ballerina pink color. It's perfect for a subtle rosy cheeked glow. Kind of like you've just been out in the cold...If your on the fence about this you should definitely buy it! I have really fair skin so blushes can end up looking clown-ish on me but this didn't!

Took a gamble on this because a friend uses one of the other colored powders from Benefit. I was a little reluctant because if the price but, I must say, it was worth the extra money. Only took one swipe on each cheek to get the desired blushing effect so I expect this product will last for some time. Great color, too. True to the swatch. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this blush. I used to alternate between this and Georgia (cry!!!). I wear it almost every day. Lasts a long time, and leaves a soft, sheer glow that looks natural.
I purchased a collection from Benefit where this was included in a mini. This by far is my favorite blush to date. It's perfect for a simple pop of color that's not too overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to be scared of wearing blush because i thought it brought out the little acne i had. My friend got me this and it is sooo pretty. Just a very natural looking pink that barely has any shimmer. And it smells good too? Kind of like flowers, but it doesn't make your face smell. The packaging is adorable too. Minus one star because I don't notice it at the end of the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Benefit products for the last 5 years. This blush is perfect for my skin tone and last all day long. Worth the $$$$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite blush from Benefit! The shade is a very pretty pink -- it provides a soft, natural, and feminine glow to the cheeks without being too bright or candy-colored. The shimmer is not over powering, so I can easily wear this blush every day. The product comes with a small rectangular brush, which makes it easy to apply in an upward angle to the cheekbones. I really love this blush, but since it is so light and difficult to build up a rich color, I usually stick with a darker product for evening looks.
Really nice blush. It's nicely pigmented but it still looks really natural when you apply it, like you aren't wearing blush at all. So pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite and only blush that I use. You can swipe it on faintly or lay on several layers for a more intense pink. The brush is great and the set lasted me about a year of daily use.
I love this stuff to death!! It looks beautiful on fair skin (I'm a pale Irish/German girl) and on medium skin tones (makes them look more tan ) Give it a try! :D

I am Asian, light skin with yellow undertones. I really wanted to love this product but I just ended up giving it to my cousin as it failed to show up on my skin. No matter how I build it up, it just doesn't show on my skin. Not for me.
I am pale so this stuff works like a blush for me.. it leaves a natural pink flush to my cheeks.. it's my go to blush.

This is a gorgeous every day blush for me. My skin tone is light/medium, usually leaning more towards light. This gives me a beautiful, natural pink flush to my cheeks and it blends really nicely. It's pigmented but not so pigmented that you'll overdo it and end up looking clowny. It's delicate and feminine and I will definitely Repurchase this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to for everyday blush. I am very pale, and this brings back the perfect amount of color to my skin after my foundation and powder routine. I love that there is NO GLITTER OR SHINE. Perfect for simple, everyday. very easy to play up as well.  If they ever stop selling this I might cry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As much as I love the benefit box powders, this one isn't my favorite. I am as pale as they come and this doesn't do much for me, it looks a bit flat and isn't too pigmented

If you are pale like I am, try this powder. I apply this more generously to my cheeks for blush, then I lightly sweep my forehead, bridge of my nose, and dimple in my chin. This is beautiful. I am looking forward to trying Benefits other blushes.

I was looking for something that would give me a natural looking blush without being over powering and without making me look like a disco ball. Dandelion fit the bill. It's rosy, feels light, smells lovely...perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is gorgeous for fair skin! Works well on it's own, or to set a cream color in a similar shade for a little extra pop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over ten years now and it is absolutely the perfect powder. Use a big fluffy brush and use it after you apply your make up to set it so it lasts the day. It is particularly nice to use in the winter as here in Toronto, skin gets pretty dull for five months.

reviews.review_title: Natural looking for pale skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is a great natural looking blush for pale girls. It looks like you are not wearing anything! It is also a great beginner blush as it's so hard to over apply! One star off for its packaging. I prefer something smaller and easier to carry with, like Nars blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PERFECT colour for light skin. Most blushes look ridiculous, and too pink, too orange, etc, on me, no matter how muted in the pan. Wears well, I wish it didn't sparkle.
Looks very natural on me and looks very subtle. It's perfect for my pale skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There are not many products in my makeup lifetime that I have purchased more than once, let alone, twice, this Dandelion blush I have now purchased three times. This product has been around for about 10+ years and every time I splurge and get this blush I use it to the very end. I am 53 and this color gives a nice natural-looking color to the cheeks. I think the price set is good considering you get a cute little brush too.

This blush is so pretty and subtle. It doesn't feel like you're wearing anything. I am pale and like how it doesn't overpower my skin - even if you build it on your cheeks, it still maintains a delicate finish (not clown makeup). Very pleased with this product!! Highly recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Great as an all over powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I initially bought this to use as a shimmery blush. The lasting power isn't very good and I had to build it up as a blush.  The box says that you can use it as an all over finishing powder and I discovered that I LOVE IT for this purpose. I put on a light layer of a matte powder and then finish with this and it makes my skin look so amazing without making me a reflective disco-ball.

I am a big fan of the Benefit boxed blushes and this one is no exception. I hadn't ever tried it out because pinks, especially cool pinks, don't tend to look very nice on me. They either don't show up or end up making me look like a clown. Something about this one is different though; it is thee prefect pink! Not too bright, not too pale, not too chalky...just a lovely ballerina pink, exactly as described. Smells beautiful and lasts all day.
This is a great everyday shade that works even on a fair skin tone. It was an impulse purchase I made while stuck in the airport, and I regret nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail, every day blush. I have a very fair complexion with warm undertones, blonde hair and green eyes. Most blushes look too harsh and distracting on my face, but dandelion is absolutely perfect for me. With that said, I'm not sure if this blush would work as well on other skin tones, but it would make a beautiful highlight on darker skin tones. This blush is also long lasting, even in hot, humid weather. The packaging is cute and convenient and I find the brush it comes with to be actually quite useful.

I originally tried this in Benefit's Feelin' Dandy Lip and Cheek Set and loved it so much I bought the full size! This color gives me the perfect hint of flushed cheeks and is very natural looking! Love, love, love!
I have porcelain skin and I use this as an everyday blush. It is such a light colour that it looks natural with my pale skin.
This light color is amazing for a hint of life in dull/ pale skin. Even now that I have a little tan/use bronzer it perks up my face and lols nice on top of blush too.

This is very light but for someone like me with porcelain skin it is perfect for the no makeup look when you need a little color. Even with no other makeup besides Urban Decay Deslick powder, this blush gives me a natural fresh look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this powder, and it's the first benefit powder i ever purchased. It works great on my skin in the wintertime when I'm at my palest, but in the spring/summer and I become more tan (medium shades in foundation) I can't even notice the difference when I put it on, even if i do it multiple times (so really I can only use this effectively for 4 months of the year). I have a feeling this is one of those products that works better for people who have paler skin year-round. The formula was lovely, but I wish it was more versatile for my skin tone. I found that because my skin tone changes quite a bit the Dallas powder from benefit suits my skin tone much better than this one, and it's much more versatile!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product truly does transform your complexion from dull to radiant! The product is a very light pink, I would put on a bit more to use as a blush, and just a light sweep over my forehead and nose, in the mornings before I go to work. I usually skip foundation, but this still brightens up my face big time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if you have light skin i do not recommend this at all because it will not show one bit! it gives zero color whatsoever on someone whose skin is light.

reviews.review_title: I really want to love it
reviews.review_text: I am faired skinned and I have the hardest time getting this color to show up on me. I really wanted to love it but I don't think there's enough pigment. When I do pack it on, it doesn't give me a natural blush like I was wanting.... Instead it looks too cold and unnatural.  However, it does smell good.  Maybe I'll find a way for it to work and I'll grow to love it.
I really like the color, it looks quite natural and healthy.
I love this for everyday use. I use it as a blush/highlighter. It's a very light pink and it makes your face look glowing. I love it.
