Love love love this product!! I have been using this product for years and I can't get enough. No only does it give me just the right amount of color, it smells great! I'm very fair skinned so it looks great on very natural looking!!! It's a staple in my makeup collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For us who are pale but fabulous, Dandelion isn't a highlighter- it's an awesome blush! It's the most natural blush I've found on the market, and the small pan lasts forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dandelion highlighting powder is everything they say it is! I like it best just on my cheeks as a beautiful pink blush.
One of my go to blushes so natural and travel size that I can always just put in my purse

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in the Benefit Feeling Dandy set and when the blush ran out, I had to get full size. It really is pretty and sheer. Whenever I wear it, someone always says I look good in general, so of course, I started wearing it every day. Only issue with the full size is when you put the brush back in the box, it always gets powder on the handle for next time. Kind of a nuisance, so I leave the brush on top, which is a shame because the packaging is so cute! I would get this again though.
The color of this brush is so cute I'm obsessed! I love the pink glow it gives!
I'm so pale so this is a pretty vibrant blush on me but it is incredibly pretty and gives me a natural flushed look. And an added bonus is that it smells amazing.
Got my dandelion. Super love it. Gives me glow all throughout the day. I will definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use Dandelion as a blush, but you can use it as a highlighter. This product goes as a natural soft pink, so you definitely don't look like a clown wearing it. Just love it!

I've been using this for years as a finishing powder. It is not blush! Unless you have very very fair skin, you probably won't notice a color when you apply this. Use it all over as what it is described as - highlighting powder. I use it to set my cream eyeshadows, and all over for brightening and shine control. Even with heavy use, it will last me over a year. Great value for a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this color!! Beautiful soft pink that looks great on my skin tone. Natural glow, does not have a fake looking shimmer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so pretty. It is a very delicate pink and is not over the top. It is soft and blends very well. I also LOVE the brush that is included with it, I usually hate the brushes included with blushes but this one is awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can see why others have issues with this product, but i personally love it! It is very sheer and gives a subtle natural color. The scent is actually very nice, it is kind of strong and you will be able to smell it for a while after applying, which doesn't bother me, but could be an issue for someone else.
Maybe just my skin, which is light, but this is like no-color on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this blush - I find that it's just the right shade of light pink for my fair skin. I brush this on after putting on Tarte's Park Ave Princess bronzer and it gives my cheeks a nice, natural pink sheen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: its a ok ok kind of product, nothing special. doesn't last on my combination skin.
I'm pretty young so I just wanted a nice light pink to wear. I love the smell of the product and how it is a sheer blush.

There is a small amount of sparkle to the powder, but it's very sparse. The pink itself is pale, and hard to apply too much of. On fair skin (like mine) it's very subtle and just adds a nice, light, even pink colour. On anyone with darker skin, I could imagine that this will really brighten the complexion, since it's so light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to this product because the colour is the absolute perfect natural flush for my skin tone. It requires touching up if you plan to wear it from morning to night, and the packaging is the main reason for losing a star -- after I hit pan, it becomes a daily battle with the corners. If they ever change the packaging to something more sensible, I'll add the star back.
This product gives such a great color to cheeks and it has a nice little shimmer. I totally recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: its very natural pink and a good value cuz u get the mirror and the brush. but it would be better for fair & light skin tone.

I use this as a blush on days when I just want a light color and it's beautiful. It's perfect with my skin tone, almost ivory, and it's super long lasting. You can also use it all over your face to give you a glowy look.

I've always loved benefit blushes, but this one is especially great for my pale skin. It's a natural yet luminous color and brightens up my complexion instantly. Application is pretty foolproof because of how light the color is - I can apply quickly without worrying about putting on too much and looking crazy. I would recommend this to anyone - especially those with super pale skin like me! - looking for a pretty, natural everyday blush.
very easy to use. and smells really nice.

I have been searching for a blush which matches my natural flush that I have on my cheeks. I was worried when I initially ordered this product that it would be a dusty light pink that would look cakey on my pale skin but since I am a fan of Benefit I thought I'd give it a go. I was pleasantly surprised that in person this blush is more of a light rose color which perfectly matches my natural blush shade! It's long lasting, never looks powdery. I also like the included brush which is very soft and picks up this blush nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has been my favorite for years. I would choose hourglass or Nars for a full makeup. This blush is perfect for everyday with light makeup. Very natural on cheeks to finish your look when you are not in the mood for a full makeup.

reviews.review_title: The perfect day to day blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the blush I use almost daily, perfect light pink, great for those with lighter skin tones.

reviews.review_title: Great if you have light skin
reviews.review_text: I have light skin and mild rosacea, so obviously I search for light blushes. It is very creamy and lasts all day. Do not purchase if you have dark skin, because it is so light it's practically a highlighter. Cute packeging as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i'm super pale, basically a ghost, so most makeup is too dark on me. this blush is a bit too light for me, which is insane, and i have to build it up to even see it. however, it is nice that it's matte and a lovely shade. plus the brush is really nice to contour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am very fair, so for me this is the perfect blush. Granted, I'm not big into blush and I tend to go for a natural look. However, I use this daily to add light color, brighten and occasionally contour. This is the only blush I use, except for occasions when I am feeling especially pale and I will turn to the red blushes in my makeup palettes. I just love this. It's appropriate for daily wear and it never looks overdone, but is very pretty.

reviews.review_title: give the best glow of healthy looking skin
reviews.review_text: I like a little soft color added to my face and use this product to achieve that healthy glow.
Great for everyday wear! Doesn't take much product and love the brush...nice soft color for a pale face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: You need fair skin for this blush to show, it is a pale color but nice. It is a bit hard to get the color on your brush since it is set down too far into the box. Deduct one star for inconvenience.

reviews.review_title: A pretty good highlighter if you are very pale.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a paleface and have been unable to find a blush that I actually like in forever.So, I just didn't wear any. Lately, though, I have started to search again. Dandelion sounded nice, and, it is but, it really is very pale. I sometimes use it as a gentle highlight as I don't care to actually shine in the dark anymore. For a blush though, I am still searching.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is perfect for most any occasion. It goes on very softly, though it makes a difference no matter how subtle. It's very easy to build up the color, if a bolder look is desired. I love the scent of it, its clean and soft and doesn't linger for too long. The brush isn't the softest of the Benefit blushes I have, but that's not to say that it's bad.  That being said, this is quickly becoming my everyday color. The packaging is great for travel, I love the shape of the brush for application. I will most definitely repurchase when I use this one up, though I imagine that will take a very long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is very light and natural looking. I contour my cheekbones and I don't like a heavy looking blush on top. And I've used it on my friends and it's overall most flattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so natural, and perfect for a hint of color to brighten the face. I have this in a pack of 5 Benefit blushes, and this has become my go-to. It adds just the right amount of flush, but it's also buildable. Will rebuy!
My first purchase from Benefit and I must say this is the perfect shade for my fair skin tone!!!! I will be purchasing ore Benefit cosmetics products in the very near future!!!!

reviews.review_title: Natural blush for fair or light skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is very girly and beautiful for someone with a fair skin. It adds a natural glow, like you've been running (in a good way!). It feels like I haven't been wearing anything, and I should use lots of it to make it show on my light skin. It has a very subtle shimmer to it. The colour in my idea is rosey baby pink. The price is high but the price per gram is only slightly higher than other good quality blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush on my light skin. It just gives the perfect amount of color that looks natural and makes me glow.
I'm sensitive to lots of face blushes, including NARS organism. But this one gives no problem after two-months use. Get a very natural looking on my apple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush, it is my favorite pink blush next to an elf blush called tickled pink which is amazing and only three dollars. I have not been disappointed yet by a benefit blush and I have 6 of them! This color is very light, shimmery, and beautiful. great for spring.

I was so excited when I got this item for my birthday. I'm very pale skinned and I wanted a highlighter to add a pinky color to my skin. When I put the product on you couldn't really see anything but glitter. You have to build up the pigmentation. I think this product is over priced.
Love this product. Light and nature pink.
love!! the perfect %22little hint of color on the cheeks%22 shade!

reviews.review_title: Pretty in the box, disappears on my cheeks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a fair complexion with pink undertones, for startes. However, no matter how much I layered, could not see the product on my face. I'm someone going for a me, but a little better makeup look, so I do like subtle makeup‚Ä¶however really could not detect it at all on my face. Boo!
Great color! Light and yummy... Always my go-to pick me up... A must have!
Absolutely amazing. My favorite blush, applys beautifully, just perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so so so obsessed with this product, adds just the right amount of sparkle and flush while not looking shiny or oily. the brush is really soft and helpful.

I got the sample size of this in one of Benefit's many kits and after that I went out and bought the full size. I love this I have very very pale skin, it's a subtle hint of color and shimmer and I find is buildable. It's lasted forever as I prefer Bronzer over blush.
This might be great on porcelain skin or if you simply want a bit of subtle radiance, but doesn't do much for me.

This blush is very pretty, but it's subtle even on my blue-eyed, fair-skinned complexion, so I can't imagine it working well for those with dark skin. It's a very light, slightly shimmery pink that's good for a brightening effect. The blush also has a nice smell to it. The brush included is surprisingly effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I own three Nars blushes and I use this when I want something subtle. This blush is definitely more delicate than most. If you brush too hard it sort of crumbles. However, with the light color you really can't apply too much of this. It is very forgiving.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always loved this product...and perhaps it's been a while since I've bought it, but the fact that it has shrunk 3 grams/0.10 oz since I bought it and yet it's still the same price (if not more)... really? That's pretty lame there Benefit :(

Definitely better for fair or light skin; it does add some nice, natural color to my winter paleness, but I wouldn't be able to use it in the summer. It goes on smooth, lasts a few hours, and it has a really nice scent. Unlike Hoola, Coralista, etc (where a little goes a long way), Dandelion does require heavier application, so it doesn't last as long.

Received this as part of the Bronze and Dandy set and while the Hoola bronzer is amazing this product didn't really do it for me. Perhaps it suits a fairer skin tone, but for me it just didn't show up.

So I this over Benefits Majorette, which I love. I like the colour and how it looks like a natural flush. What I don't love is how little you get. I haven't had it more than a couple of months and I'm already down to the bottom. What? Blush usually last forever, not this one. Yes the packaging is cute but that's not a good enough reason for me to buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love it! Its delicate while giving you a polished yet soft, pretty and romantic feel to your everyday look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin, and this blush adds just the right amount of pink that it looks natural and not clownish. I have never worn pink and was hesitant at first; however, I am pleased that I took the plunge! A winner in my books.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i got this Dandelion from my friend. i think if your make up is light,this product may good to you. oh, i am a student in college.

I love Benefit products and have been a devoted user of them for the past fifteen years. This one was a total bust, though. I saw next to zero effect after applying this powder. It didn't seem to matter what brush I used or how many layers I applied. I ended up returning it and explained my issues to the salesperson. As a Benefit counter worker, even he was like oh yeah, this stuff is suuuuuper light. I have pretty fair skin (I use Never Settle Petal in Hello Flawless for a reference) so I thought this would give me a light, not overwhelming glow... Turns out I was totally underwhelmed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very subtle, but very pretty if you're fair skinned or just don't like too much blush.

This blush is a perfect pale pink. It has a slight amount of shimmer so you can highlight with it if you want or wear it for a subtle flush on the apples of your cheeks. If I had to use only one blush forever, this would be it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this because in the description it says it transforms your complexion from dull to radiant and fake awake. Well, this didn't do anything for me.  I'm NC20-25 and as a blush, it barely showed up on my skin as it is way too subtle. I had to put multiple layers on for it to show up. As a highligher, it's also too subtle as i prefer them with more shimmer, and i didn't spend money on this to just use it for an all over powder. I would've been happier if it brightened up my face as an all over but i didn't notice any changes.  I love benefit but this was a fail for me. I think it'll look good if you have a lighter skin for a blusher, and a darker skin to use it as a highlight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this everyday in place of blush. I am 59 and have to lighten up on my makeup now. This is perfect. It brightens the complexion and is so natural looking. I have very fair skin, and use it all over my face -- love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing! I have already read great reviews about this blush and finally got to try it! with its soft shimmer and the soft rosy touch that it gives you have a better complexion. I'm already using it everyday with no need to wearing make-up and still looking great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great color. A pale pink that's a bit brighter on than it looks in the box. The brush is great and works like a charm. The formula is long wearing and it doesn't change color at all. It has no shimmer which makes it perfect for mature women. Overall, it's a great product.
this looks very natural and smells like roses!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush really looks good on my skin and it looks very natural. Even if you are new to blush, this color will never go wrong. This product looks like it has a little shimmer but it is not very noticeable, in other words, it looks really really natural. I have tried so many different blushes and I always come back to this one. Definitely a rebuy product.
I adore this blush and have purchases many times over the years. Pretty flush to the checks. Wish it lasted a bit longer

reviews.review_title: best cheek color for pale skin
reviews.review_text: Don't even bother with anything else. Get this. I use it with the Kabuki brush from Too Faced. It's very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Can't live without it. I've been using it for over a decade and must have it at all times.
Great highlights for my light-warm skin tone. very natural looking.
This color is perfect for people with very fair skin like myself. Wonderful soft color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love dandelion blush, it is a radiant ballerina pale pink blush that comes in this adorable Victorian powder box. I have light skin, blue eyes, and blonde hair and this color works fantastic on me! So I pair this blush with my posie tint blush, first I apply the posie tint on the apples of my cheeks and blend back (doing one cheek at a time) then I sweep the beautiful dandelion blush/highlighter over my posie tint for a wash of radiant color. I also use the posie tint on my lips for a lip stain then after it dries I use the dandelion plush lip gloss over the posie tint. After I am done I have this angel pink glow look that I LOVE! I get complimented all of the time on this look, I am a college student and it is so fast and easy to apply in the morning and it gives me that instant perk me up look that brightens up my face. Will definitely continue to buy!
very natural blush for everyday use in office
Great for fair skin, but still not that pigmented. Slight shimmer. I use it as a finishing powder since it makes a pore less finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I would have known about this one earlier! It is now my go to every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I imagine that if you were exceptionally pale that this would probably do something for you. As for me, I am fair but not pale and I did not find this flattering on my skintone. It seemed as if I had done nothing unless I piled it on then it was a bit clownish. I gave it to my sister however who is what I would consider to be a medium complexion and she loved it. I am also dry complexion and she is oily She said it kept her skin from feeling oily. That is why I am giving it 3 stars.
I love it! Just the right amount of color if you have a pale complexion.

reviews.review_title: DONT GET IT IF YOU'RE TRYING TO GET A BLUSH
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is more of a highlighter than a blush. The light pink color was obnoxious and too shimmery. I returned it because it did not work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as my everyday blush. It works well for me because I don't like a lot of color. I use a small amount and apply it lightly to illuminate my cheeks and give it just the slightest hint of color. It is buildable, but if you want a lot of color, you have to cake it on pretty thick to the point where it just, well, looks bad. If you want a lot of color, you'd be better off with Coralista or Sugarbomb.  I do wish they'd just stop including the brushes, or that silly little mirror in the box. The mirror is just reflective film that can't possibly be useful, and I find the brush doesn't give nice, natural coverage. I use a blush brush instead and it works much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dandelion is the perfect blush for my super pale skin. It gives a sheer pink healthy glow without adding an orange tint, too much colour or too much glitter. I'm not a huge fan of the packaging though- I find it bulky and a pain carry in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For those of us with Casper-like complexions, this is just enough color and sheen to make you look healthy and perky even with a hang-over. It's sheer and blend able enough not to look make-up-y.
Great quality blush with amazing smell (it's made with rosewater!) great if you have fair skin. The packaging is cute but a little frustrating.

Benefit's Dandelion highlighting powder is a lovely blush/highlighter that adds a subtle pink glow. I have used this product alone or over a darker blush and, either way, it creates a natural flushed look.

I'm normally pretty fair, but in the summer I have fairly good tan and this blush looks awesome on me either way! I love how light it is but you can definitely see it! So natural! Definitely one of my favourite blushes!

i love this product. its great for school because you can tell that im awake and my cheeks have a hint of soft pink in them. Benefit is a great brand. i think everyone should get this it lasts all day too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a pretty color and it shows up on my skin really good. I am semi pale so it's not fun with make up. It's pretty and subtle.

reviews.review_title: The color is lovely but too subtle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light shade of pink... but it's way too subtle... I find myself having the apply several times in order to get any effect at all. The other thing is the brush. By far, it's the worst rough brush that came with make up I ever purchased.
Like the soft shimmer, but the color is too pale for me, sometimes i use it to add extra shimmer to my other blushes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like Benefit's blushes and this one is not a disappointment. I have super pale skin and this is just the perfect amount of pink in a blush. Same as other benefit blushes, this product goes on smooth and is easy to blend. My only complaint is that it's not as long-wearing as I'd like. It doesn't last an 8 hour workday. But it's a great color and it's definitely portable, so touch-ups are easy breezy.
Favorite blush/ brightener for my fair skin.

This is amazing to just add to the apples of your check for just a very light tint of color it's nothing dramatic but it could go with any look I have a pretty nice summer tan currently and this still works with my color year round
This blush is so pretty to look at it, but unless you are extremely fair skinned you won't see it. Its great for a very subtle glow, I mean very subtle on the cheeks but don't expect any color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a holy grail blush for me.  I am very, very fair-skinned with neutral undertones. I will repurchase this forever, but I don't think I'll need to! I've had this for about a year and have hardly made a dent--and I really get in there with a brush. This is NOT very pigmented (that's the point), so you could just use this as a highlighter of sorts, but I really love it as a blush.  This gives the nicest, most natural, lovely, sheer pink glow to the cheeks. Cannot recommend this enough for those with similar skin!

reviews.review_title: brightens and adds a little color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this for years. I am fair and don't like a heavy or dark color for blush. I also have a slightly sallow tone to my skin. This brightens, and adds enough color that I don't need to add a blush.

I use this everyday for school and it looks sooo pretty! It's a bit light for a blush so I tend to use this as a highlight instead since it does have the slightest amount of shimmer. I will def repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my mom got me this blush for my birthday, and I was somewhat skeptical because of the color and my skin tone. this is the perfect blush to use to create a natural radiant look! I use it almost everyday with benetint, they're a perfect pair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not usually a fan of shimmer in blushes/bronzers but the very light sparkle in this just takes this blush to the next level. A perfect baby pink that is pretty much universally flattering and very natural looking. Great for everyday if you need a little extra color!

I love this powder, so I also got one of the other colors, can't remember the name right now, but is more in the peachy range, they come in a cute little box you can carry in your purse without fear of it opening or breaking, I hate it when I buy a blush and the container breaks before I have used even half of it. The colors are not dark at all, they go on soft with a very light shimmer, so you don't look overdone, and they blend nicely, the little brush they come with is also nice, no complaints on this purchase at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush, it is by far the most versatile blush by Benefit. This is not only a gorgeous blush, but on darker skin tones this is the most beautiful highlighter.  Check out my video for swatches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this blush! it has a really pretty pale pink color that looks amazing on all skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A lovely shade of light pink with a hint of sheen... very pretty for all ages!

reviews.review_title: Wait, this is a highlighter? I love it as a blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a pale woman, I absolutely adore this as a blush. It gives a very naturally pretty flush to the cheekbones that is hard to overdo. I feel like the price is actually fairly reasonable for the amount of product in the box, however it is a bit high for my tastes anyways. 4 stars simply because it isn't all that friendly for anyone that isn't too creamy.

This is a pretty, natural, shimmery pink blush and looks great on fair skin. I use it from November to March and switch to a peachy color the rest of the year. The durable, simple packaging and included brush are nice to have around. My only beef is how expensive it is, but it's a good product and if I don't find a cheaper alternative I might buy again.

I love the shade of this blusher. It's a pretty pale pink and looks really subtle when applied lightly. I have used it for years and have tried other blushers in between but always come back to this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a nice blush, and it certainly works well with pale skin, but it's not outstanding for the price. I'd much prefer to spend $10 more for something like the Hourglass Ambient Lighting Blush. I do like that the shimmer isn't overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think a lot of people are confused about this product as they complain about the blush not being pigmented. This is a highlight powder, not a blush so its not meant to be intense. That being said, it is a great highlight powder that gives just the right amount of soft shimmer.
Very natural, great for everyday use. I'm not that fond of the brush though..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This pink highlighter is Amazing! I have fair skin and it gives me the prefect shimmery (without too much shimmer) refreshed look.
This is my all time favorite every day blush. On my fair skin, it looks like my natural flush, just enhanced. It's buildable too, which is great for a blush. Smells amazing too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the color, so I purchased it. It goes on very nicely, and the color is beautiful, I have fair skin and it's perfect.  Would recommend to someone if they had my skin tone or lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally got around to trying a sample of Dandelion that I received a while ago, and I love it! When I want a natural look, this product gives my fair skin a subtle, gorgeous glow. I've been using Dandelion as a blush, along with a little bronzer to contour (Too Faced Chocolate Soleil or Pixi Beauty Bronzer).
Beautiful blush for fair skin. Looks like a natural flush, and color is easily buildable. Lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the shade of this blush! It flatters my skin so naturally when I don't have a tan. It just looks like I have porcelain skin with a touch of color, just enough to add a beautiful dimension to my makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The reviews say it all so I don't need to elaborate-this is the most beautiful shade of blush on the market in my opinon. Especailly for you fair skinned girls, you need this in your life.

I received a sample of Dandelion a while back and didn't really pay it much attention then. Today I found its a new favorite, it is fool-proof, nude pink blush. I have fair skin and wanted to find the perfect everyday blush and this is it. It's so natural looking and build-able. I layered it x3 and it was great. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a full-size product in a sample kit and it lasted forever! I love the colour and amount of shimmer in this. At times, I use it as a blush and it looks very nice and natural on pale skin. I will also use it as a highlighter on top of my regular blush and find it helps to blend the other blush into my skin and gives just the right amount of pop to my cheekbones. I recently purchased it again and hope they never discontinue it since it has become part of my staple products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. It might be my favorite Benefit product. I got this in a sample kit. It looks great with my skin tone and is very smooth and natural looking. I also love the scent.

reviews.review_title: Soft color, Great for Pale Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Benefit's blushes. This one is really great on pale skin. goes on smoothly for a very subtle flush to the skin. Its my go to for everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm fair skinned so this works as a subtle blush for me as well as a highlighting powder.
Love this product, my skin glows with a soft shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, it's cute box packaging complete with mirror. Perfect color & very natural looking. I've tried many other products, but always come back to this blush.
I love this! Gives you a airbrush look. A lot of reviews say blush .... But this is a highlighting powder, beautiful color and just gives a nice finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like most of the Box 'o Powders, but my skin tone is weird and maybe it's just because I have an older one of these and it's not as pigmented, but it certainly doesn't show up as a blush and I don't really noticed it as a finishing powder. I feel like there are better things to spend my money on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I have pretty fair skin (NC15) and absolutely love the glow it gives me. Not shimmery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This give me the subtle innocent pink flush that reminds me of ballerinas. I didn't even realize it said ballerina pink until I looked in the description literally 5 seconds ago after I wrote my first sentence! Cool! It lasts a good long while on the cheeks and it's my go-to powder blush.

Love this. I use it as a blush rather than an all over highlighting powder. I have fair skin and it creates the flushed look without looking too blushy, and it gives my face an overall glow. Its very natural looking so I use it everyday. Smells good too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought this thinking that it was a blush, but it turned out to be a highlighting powder. I do have to build it up a bit for it to show, and I also considered returning it MORE than one time. I would not repurchase this because it disappointed me after all of the good comments that I had heard about it. It also is very expensive compared to its size and quality. I do love other benefit products, and this product was the first that I wouldn't recommend.
I just got this blush. The color looks nice on my fair skin. Pretty expensive tho...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for fair to light skin. Gives just enough color without being too pink.
I love light pink everything!! This was just a little too light for me though. I think this blush is better for people with fairer complexions.

Very well pigmented blush, totally worth the price and quantity lasts a long while( even in everyday use!) I have Full sized Hoola and Bella Bamba, i recently purchased Dandilion and I am nothing but impressed. Beautiful color, very natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush so much! It has a beautiful natural-looking sheer-pink tint. It looks fantastic when paired with posietint. It's definitely of my all time favorites, and the scent is AMAZING. If they had a dandelion perfume, I would buy it without a second thought- this blush smells beautiful!
Perfect color for me. I don't like dark blushes so this was great. Just a light flush of color and it looks great and natural. So cute.

reviews.review_title: Fake Awake could not be a a better descriptor
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best blush I have ever tried. Completely idiot proof as you can't go overboard with it. Lasts all day and makes you glow. Perfect for No Makeup Makeup and gals like me with very fair skin who have trouble finding an everyday blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really the best highlight on the market (at least for my fair skin tone).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super nice blush! Very sheer, cute colour that looks very natural. It looks very nice with high beam. I like coupling this with a darker bronzer :)
I love this blush by Benefit! Dandelion is the perfect sheer pink. Will give you that perfect flushed look that will have people wondering...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't use this every day, just when I look blah and need a little color. It's very light, finely milled, and I can sweep it on wherever I want and it looks very natural. I'm very fair; don't know how this would look on a darker-skinned person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a light pink color and has really pleasant scent. Really easy to use, especially for beginners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the very last step in my beauty routine. It gives me a soft and pretty glow! Also nice on no makeup day for just a touch of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it is a really nice colour, not overly done, but does dry my skin a little, so I have to use liquid foundation with it.

Finally...a blush that works on my super porcelain skin without looking too red, too peach, too pink, too plum, or just too much. I do think this color works best on pale skin or on someone who doesn't need much color help and just wants a nice finish. A reviewer below says she uses it as a finid

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love benefit items and was excited to try this, I bought it with the matching gloss. I find this does almost nothing for me, even though I am very fair colored.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a cute blush. I seem to have a hard time finding a soft pink blush that isn't neon or crazy sparkly. This is perfect, and I can easily see it going with any skin tone. I apply it with a kabuki brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush goes with every skin tone, its looks natural yet give the cheeks defining color. It matte so does not settle into fine lines and wrinkles like the sparkly ones so this blush is also great for more mature women. Would not leave home without it!
Love it! Beautiful light color and perfect for spring! Nothing bad to say about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own a lot of blushes, but this still remains in my top favorites after all this time! I am very fair and this is a VERY forgiving blush, gives me just the lightest pink healthy looking flush and glow. I love the light shimmer this gives to my cheeks. Color is very buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very soft pink blush that has a bit of shimmer- but not too much. I think it makes me look refreshed. I love the brush and the packaging with the mirror.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this girly pink highlighting powder. The powder comes in a square box with a built in mirror and brush. Its small enough to carry in my purse in case I need to apply more when I'm out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great choice for spring! Nothing too heavy or pigmented. Great choice to pair with a bolder lip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a replacement for the peach benefit powder (which I feel has been discontinues for years now). However, this product left much to be desired... and I returned it. It did make my skin look finished, but at a cost. It left my skin feeling very dry after putting it on (even though I use a cream foundation and moisturizer before that!)

I love this stuff. I wear it every day. People always tell me I look refreshed. I avoid shimmer because I am older, but I don't find that this is very shimmery. The box is pretty small, but that makes it good for travelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving it!!!!! This blush is simply amazing, gives ur skin what it needs a little bit of shimmer and just enough of color. I'm totally in love wit it!!!! Gonna buy it again for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color looks very natural and rosy. It's perfect for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy their box blushes but the color is just too boring for me and it doesn't really wow me. I also make sure to only use this shade when my makeup doesn't involve strong colors or contouring because it seems to disappear by comparison.
This blush gives your cheeks a very soft, rosy glow. This blush looks amazing on fair and tan skin! It also smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is very light and very sheer, not a lot of pigment. Perfect for when you want just the smallest hint of colour but don't want to look like you're wearing makeup. This colour would look great on someone with a natural tan, or with a very pale complexion. On my light to medium skin tone, it kind of disappears. There really isn't a lot of shimmer, but I see that as a positive. It's the prettiest soft, dusky pink colour... makes me think of ballet shoes. Lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting this blush for a while and I am so glad I got it! The color is so pretty it definitely adds a lot of dimension to my face especially since I'm ghost pale. The formula of it smooths out my face too. I love this so much I want to put so much on but know that I can't haha. I love it and the mirror is the clearest mirror ever. The brush it comes with is fine and makes it easy for fast application. I was worried it would be too big in my makeup bag but it isn't. I definitely recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. The color is great and makes skin look great. I am on my second box. It is one of the rare products I have purchased more than once. Glad there is now a mirror

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not particularly pigmented, but it gives a soft glow to your cheeks that will make you look refreshed and awake, even if you just rolled out of bed and rolled into work at 7 am.  I love the brush and the packaging design. I find you really can't apply too much of this stuff.  I do find however that is has a tendency to highlight any peach fuzz you may have growing on your cheeks.
I use this product all over my face, as a highlighter, as a light blush, for more color in winter, as an eyeshadow when I'm having a lazy morning, etc. you can use this for anything!

If I'm not mistaken, this product is not so much a blush as it's a brightening face powder. I'm a light to light-medium olive tone and this powder does wonders to my complexion. I tend to look a little dull in the morning after finishing my face routine. It's that 30-40 minutes where everything is still trying to settle and situate itself. If I have somewhere to go in that time frame, I use my big powder brush to quickly apply dandelion all over my face and neck. I love this stuff!! I wish I had bought it sooner. It's what I've been searching the last 6 months for. TU benefit!! Xxxooo

The color is very soft and very light it's a pretty color and very subtle so if that's what your going for this is very pretty it's light pink with a little shimmer, if you want more pigment or matte this isn't what you're looking for.
I love this blush, it is a perfect soft color for day time or for someone who is just getting used to wear blush! CAN'T GO WRONG.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am on the light/fair side and I thought this would be the perfect pink blush for my skin. Got it home and did a swatch, it didn't even show up! It might be good for someone with vampire like skin tone but I don't think this is worth $28. Returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so light and easy-to-apply on my skin. I don't really need to worry about over-applying or having to blend it out with powder on top, it just looks really natural. The brush it comes with is good enough for me, two dustings and I am good to go in the morning! Use it everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a gorgeous blush! i love this blush for innocent daytime looks or subtle nighttime looks. doesn't overwhelm your face or take attention away from eyes or lips. doesn't compete with contour, blends seamlessly with highlight. works beautifully with winter paleness. LOVE THIS BLUSH!  no breakouts or weirdness, either =)

I love Dandelion so much! I have very fair skin and I really prefer the natural look when I do my makeup. My favorite way to wear this product is paired with Benefit's Hoola. I lightly apply Hoola along my cheek bones and around my temples and then I apply Dandelion on my cheeks and down my nose. It creates the perfect natural pop of color that a lot of blushes do not give me. Dandelion also has a really nice scent, which I wasn't expecting. A huge plus for me is the brush inside. Initially I thought I would just toss it and use my blush brush but I actually fell in love with it because it applies the product perfectly.

reviews.review_title: Gives me a more youthful look
reviews.review_text: I can't explain this but I look years younger by lightly brushing this all over my face. It goes on sheer like a finishing powder and adds just a hint of pink to dull complexions like mine. I used this while sick and trying to look healthy. No one thought I was sick and I even received three compliments in my appearance that day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my favorite blush for about 8 years. I have very pale skin with pink undertones and this soft color compliments my complexion perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have very fair skin and have a difficult time finding blushes that do not look too harsh. This product brightens skin and gives some natural looking color. Color is perfect for everyday use and does not irritate my skin.
Just enough color to give you that glow without looking like you're wearing makeup.

reviews.review_title: Love Benefit, and this Cult Favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am already in love with this blush. I LOVE Benefit. And their boxed blushes, this is my second. I also have Hervana. But Dandelion is just the most natural, glowy flush and so easy to apply and smells great, too. Wear a primer though. Amazing and highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to blush this winter, it is such a beautiful light cool tone pink, check out my video below to see it in action!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin so this light blush is perfect. It's good everyday blush for when I don't want anything intense. It does have some shimmer that I wasn't expecting but I don't mind

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've heard wonderful reviews about this blush, and I agree- absolutely gorgeous! I love that it is very light and natural looking (especially for fair skin). It is just enough color to add to your cheeks without looking overdone, and the fragrance is actually very nice. It is very feminine. Love it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect illuminator, just right. Smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Build-able coverage. Definitely my go-to blush when I want a natural look.
It isn't too showy, It blends in really well. It's the only blush I like using.

reviews.review_title: It does live up to expectation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its a glow powder. Truly essential to every girl's beauty kit. Does not matter the skin color either. It adds an angelic glow to any blush as a topper over over the face when the skin appears dull. Give it a try!!!! It wont be a regret.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great natural shade for my pale skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite blush of all time. Perfect for natural look on sunny Spring/Summer days.  Although it's pink, it looks very natural on the skin and it provides such a lovely hue. Don't expect any shimmering pearls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush, and pretty much everything that Benefit pops out. This is so natural and shimmery and gives a beautiful glow. I wear it everyday on top of my foundation and wouldn't be caught dead without it. I'm always so afraid of putting on too much blush and looking like a clown, but a couple swipes of this and I know I look good!
I use this on my whole face and cheeks. Its like a pink set powder for me.

Benefit has hit a home run with their boxed blushes/bronzers/ highlighters! They are great products! This is a beautiful light blush with great coverage! It is so simple and looks great without anything else not the cheeks (such as highlighter or bronzer)! Great for the spring and summer time, when you're trying to do minimum makeup for those hot days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great price.  Pale and lovely color. Nice brush places a believable color and seems to last.  The only make up I have used up and purchased again and again.  It's how I finish my face and pull the elements all together, everyday.  I don't notice a shimmer, so it is very subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush because it looks so NATURAL and pretty. I can put this on in the dark and drunk and it will look just great. Works great on my very fair complexion--looks like I have a natural light flush. I've also used Orgasm by Nars and I love that too but this is what I use every single day and have for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very lovely blush. I was torn between this and Tarte's dollface, which is my HG. I needed a change. One swipe and I have a healthy rosy glow. I don't find it shimmery. The packaging is cute and I also like the brush. Highly recommend it. For reference I am NW15.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous color for fair to light skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is light, however, I realized that this blush was barely visible after I applied my foundation and bronzer (note: my foundation is a shade darker than my natural skin color to match my neck). I think this would be best for fair to light skin. It is a beautiful color, unfortunately, I had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When the winter comes rolling in, us Olive girls usually have a problem with looking dead, sick, green, what have you, Dandelion is my go to for adding life to my complexion. The flat brush really helps me build color while softly exfoliating, and the color really does last all day. I layer it on top of Tarte Flush cheek stain which helps hold the color down on top of BB cream or nothing at all. A must have if you want to look exactly as they say pretty at 8am lol I had originally bought it in the feeling dandy makeup set and the blush actually lasted me an entire year, wearing it almost every day. Really excited to get my hands on the full size.

This is a great blush if you're looking for a more natural look. I have very pale skin and this looks great with my skin tone, but I can't see this working well with those with a deeper complexion. The product lasts all day long and is very pretty. When you look at it, you're gonna see a lot of shimmer but it doesn't show too much on the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I've been eyeing it online for quote awhile and when I got to go to a Sephora store this week I decided to check it out. I feel in love and couldn't resist buying it! It's beautiful!
I didn't feel like the color fit me as well. In fact, I don't think it was quite noticeable. I was debating between Coralista

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this blush is nice. it creates a soft pink shimmery blush. It is definitely more of a younger look since it has a simmer or glittery huge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect youthful pink glow to your cheeks....Love this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have medium-toned skin with olive/yellow undertones. I use this as a finishing powder all over my face and really helps balance out my natural color, and gives it a bit of glow.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful color and nice Rose fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this powder as a highlighter or on those days when I don't want to wear blush. It has a nice color for my fair skin. Soothing fragrance.
Used it for 3 years. This is my 2nd. Love it as a everyday blush!

Oh how I love this blush!! I have fair skin and bought this around 4 years ago when my skin quite quite dry and flaky, and now my skin is more combo. I still have a little bit left after 4 years, and it suit my skin through climate changes and skin changes. On a darker skin tone it might be more like a highlight shade, but for fair skins, it is a beautiful, natural flush that glows. It is not sparkly but very luminous. It lasts all day, has a faint scent while you are applying, and is so soft and easy to blend. It has been my old reliable, I love trying blushes, but this has always been one of the most flattering I've ever tried! I really love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite blush of all time ATM HG BLUSH :D I often use it with hoola and highlight beam! Look soo sheek!!! I wear it everyday <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the BEST blush for fair skin. Goes on smoothly and feels wonderful!! Not streaky at all, and gives a just pinched glow.
I like buying beauty stuff and rarely repurchase certain item I used unless it truly amazed me after using it. This one, Benefit Dandelion, gives me the best glow. Now I have my fourth box.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first blush and is my ALL time favorite. Great for fair skin:)
love it! it gives a nice subtle pink glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the colour, a very nice light pink and very natural. Usually I am not a fan of shimmer but the shimmer in this is so great, it is very light but makes your face so much brighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely, soft powder for fair skin. It is subtle and buildable. Benefit blushes are such a fine powder they go on extra smooth without any splotches. Only four stars because blush subtil is a little longer wearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried NARS blush, but I bet this is better. The pale pink, slightly shimmery color is fitting on almost all skin tones, including deep tan girls (just use a little more). It is very easy to apply and buildable. You can apply this using their brush (which is actually a really great little kabuki-style brush), or use one of your own brushes. Either one will give you a light rosy glow (or a darker glow, depending upon how you want it)
Super natural, lovely glow! Love the packaging. A great colour, blends nicely.

reviews.review_title: Light bright.. And smells great too
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this product gives me a bright eyed bushy tailed appearance. I have darker skin and this product works beautifully without that chalky look that most products do.

This blush proved to be too little for my fair skin. It's not very pigmented to begin with so it's so subtle that it isn't even noticeable. I also don't think the blush brush helps one get the most out of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this blush for over a year now, and I still find myself reaching for it on a day to day basis. The light pink color is perfect to brighten up my face, and it looks so natural as well. Even on days where I don't have the time to apply a full face of makeup, I'll quickly put on concealer under my eyes and this blush on my cheeks, and it instantly brings my dull complexion to life. Highly recommend!!!
i have never used blush before but i have to say this is one of my new faves :)
I love this blush. Goes on really smooth and not heavy and it smells awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this blush. I recently bought it for the 3rd time. It's my go-to everyday blush. Combined with my skin tone it give me just enough (not too pink) cheeks which makes me look refreshed and awake. I don't like the brush it comes with so I use my own Elizabeth Arden Brush. Will continue to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this since freshmen year in college, absolutely a to go product. Can't really go wrong with this! Very natural looking brush, and you can use it all over your face if you got sick or something, really make a difference. Not sure if it works for dark skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I needed an everyday blush for my pale skin and this is great. It's a very soft pink that looks very natural on super fair skin.
Natural pink color, fresh and cute; good for gals at 10s~20s

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice product. It has pink/peachy tones and a bit of shimmer. I was recommended to use it as a highlight above my blusher but unfortunately, I think my skin is too dark for its full potential. Really nice on lighter skin, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it... read the reviews and knew this would be the right blush for me. I have fair skin and don't wear any other make-up except this blush, mascara and gloss. I don't care for the brush or packaging - small price to pay for the wonderful and glowing powder inside.  Just enough shimmer and color to brighten my cheeks and bridge of my nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is just gorgeous. Moving into the colder months and losing my summer tan, I needed something not so dramatic. This looks gorgeous on my fair skin, just the right pop of ballerina slipper pink to compliment my look. Only downside is that it's very powdery, but seems to blend very nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ai first I think it was a blush.But the color is not. Hot enough.So I apply it all over my face.It makes me look healthier. Becase I usually use the vanilla foundation ,it makes me pale. I use it very often now.

reviews.review_title: Natural, subtle and pretty everyday blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great for pale skin tones, looks super natural and radiant on the skin. The blush looks very pale in the box, but is in fact fine and healthy looking on the skin, it looks like you've gotten enough sun and you're super healthy! Not shimmery at all, leaves a satin finish on the skin and looks lovely and natural. Not at all dramatic and suitable for everyday. I am very fair and also very young, and the only complaint I have is this blush might not look so good on deeper or very pink skin tones.

I tried this blush based on a recommendation from the Sephora associate and loved it. It is beautiful and has a really nice finish. I have combination skin and usually avoid powders as they can make my dry patches worse. This does not settle into dry patches like most powders and it lasts forever. I actually get compliments on how bright my skin looks. I highly recommend.
The color is perfect. I use it every day. It lasts a really long time. I'm going to reorder.
Very pretty, and it is easy for beginners to use

This blush goes on so smoothly. A little goes a very long way and is highly pigmented with just the right amount if shimmer. A gorgeous color for me, feels fresh on my face. The brush is super soft too :) Definitely my new staple blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Since I found this product I've not used any other blush! This is perfect for fair skinned peoples for a blush or highlighter, the colour is just PERFECT! it looks so natural I love it! It also last a really long time, it might not seems like it but that small box last me half a year and more for sure!

I have been using this blush for 5 years and I still love it. Also-- I have yet to buy another box! I have the old style box without the hinged lid, which I've heard has more product, so this might be why, but I haven't even come close to using it up, even though I go through periods where I use it daily.  It adds the most perfect finishing touch and puts life in my face (I am really fair so after putting my foundation or powder on I look completely white and pasty. This fixes everything!). It is perfect for people with pale skin, as you really only need a little bit to make it show up. The color is soft and beautiful, especially for more girly makeup looks, but really works for anything.  Definitely worth the purchase! Oh, and did I mention, it's smells beautiful? ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use Dandelion as my blush on and never have to worry that I've overdone my cheeks. I only wish they'd make the packaging more travel-friendly as the size of the box is totally unnecessary, especially if you use with your own brushes.
I love this so much! It goes on naturally, light pink, and looks great.

I have been using this powder for YEARS and I love it, but on my last purchase I noticed they changed the box to a hinged version, added a little mirror, but REDUCED the amount of product in the package. Still love the powder, but buyer beware!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When I was in elementary school I remember my mom using this blush. When I was in middle school I remember borrowing this blush from her. And now being in college I have my own stocked up in my bathroom. I have never found a blush that struck my skin with such a natural pink glow quite like this one has. It's perfect to wear with a no makeup look as well as full face.
This is a shimmery blush so I use it above my cheekbones as a highlighter, but if you like shimmer it's a great blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely fair skin, so this blush is the perfect shade for when I want to look natural. It's a very light, rosy lavender color with a slight shimmer. The texture isn't too chalky, and it spreads beautifully. It looks really nice with the Benefit High Beam on the bridge of my nose and on my cheek bones!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great blush! I have pale skin and it is a great everyday blush to add just a little bit of light color to the cheeks. It's a little too light for the summer or if you want a more dramatic blush. It's great for a no-makeup look. The box of blush lasts forever. I sometimes use this blush all over my face to bring a nice color to it since I've never found a bronzer to work well with my pale skin. The brush that comes with this is awful. Just use a blush brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: very good texture on skin nice feel love how it makes your face have an airbrush finish !!!!!!

Just a tiny bit of this blush lasts all day, and adds the perfect soft touch to any look. It has lasted me forever. Perfect for people with really pale skin (like me), because of how light it is, so it doesn't look like too much. I would definitely recommend, well worth it (and I say this as someone who isn't typically a fan of benefit cosmetics)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. I have all of them, but this one is my favorite. And I've also hit pan, which means I'll have to buy another but still this is my favorite blush. I have a light skin tone so it works really well, it doesn't look too light on my skin. It also doesn't break me out, so that's another plus.

reviews.review_title: My favorite piece of make-up, hands down!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot live without this powder! It is the absolute one item I continuously and religiously stock-pile! It is the perfect pink tone on my fair skin, and even in the summer months when I have a little bit of color, it compliments my shade. I love the light, porcelain effect, and it is instantly brightening. BUY IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and how it looks on my cheek. Will repurchase and recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product more as a highlighter then a blush because it doesn't show up very well on my cheeks even though I am on the fair side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I find that this product gives me a natural look. The color is gorgeous and the packaging is adorable. The only thing I would complain about is the lasting power (which is expected to be short) and the packaging is sometimes hard to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted something light and to brighten up my face so I bought Dandelion. It's a light blush pink that smells so good, there is a some shimmer but when on you don't see it. I have olive color skin and Dandelion does show up on my skin sometimes if I want more color I'll mix it with another blush. My face lightens up and I look more alive, goal accomplished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first started using this, I thought it was pretty meh--the pink barely stood out on my pale complexion.  As my makeup skills have gotten better, I've realized it functions awesomely as a highlighter, and not a blush! I use it on the bridge of my nose, chin, brow bones, and the middle of my forehead, and then blend, blend, blend. Works best in combination with a great blush & bronzer combo--in the right spots of course.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use Benefit's Georgia shade, but switched to Dandelion when they discontinued it. I'm still very happy! The included brush works well for me; I dust the powder over the apples of my cheeks, and then all other areas I'd like a little highlighting. After I put on my foundation, I need a color like this so I don't look washed out. I don't notice much of a shimmer, as is advertised, but that's okay with me as I don't like glittery flecks on my face. I only wish they made a cream blush to go with it! The color is so flattering! I will continue to purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush. It's such a pretty pink color and goes on lightly. It gives you a subtle hint of color thats perfect for everyday use. Definitely one of my favorite products from Benefit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The blush for more ideal for fair skin. I cannot live without this in my collection. No other blush on the market has such a soft light pink. I use it and feel like a princess. Ideal also for woman who shy from too much blush and want a very soft color. If I recall I believe this is the blush Glenda used on Wizard of Oz!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very natrual look on the cheeks. The remaining powder on the brucsh could be used on whole face to really help light up tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this based on all the rave reviews I have read, but unfortunately when I opened the package I thought the smell was terrible. It smelled like cheap makeup. When I turned the product over to read the ingredient list I was shocked to see how many terrible ingredients were in this product (parabens, phenox., etc). This product was not for a ingredient-conscious person like myself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product! It's so natural looking and it fits my skin tone perfectly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product! This blush is a soft baby-doll pink that works for my light skin! The blush itself is very pigmented, but it's so light it doesn't always show up on every skin tone. My friend also bought this and she has an olive skin tone but it didn't quite show up on her as a blush, but it worked excellently as a soft highlight. I recommend this product not only as a blush but also as a highlight.

I'm reviewing this as a blush rather than the intended highlighting powder. I have very fair skin that is sensitive & dry but combo in the summer. I use Dandelion almost every morning and a box typically lasts me 5/6 months. The product is worth the price -- the color is subtle but absolutely buildable. No breakouts or skin reactions have ever occurred after using the product. By far the best blush I have ever purchased and used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is really great. I feel like it would work on all skin tones. I have a medium to olive skin tone. This powder is very light and soft. Works well by itself for natural glow, but I like to use it over my matte Nars blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this after my step-daughter said that it is her favorite. When it arrived I tried it and,even though I am fair, it was way to light for me. The powder seemed nice but it was just not my color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this blush almost everyday. It's color is so pretty girlish pink. Has very little purl so good for everyday-look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful product. It goes on lightly and blends effortlessly. It also great on super pale skin because of its light color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have a been a loyal dandelion fan for years, so disappointed to see how much this product has decreased in size, but not price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect amount of blush, not at all heavy, very subltle, light, texture. Best blush I've EVER had.
This is great as a blush for pale skin or a brightening base for another blush. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best blush that i have ever used. This pink is light enough for light skin- like me, but can be built up. Such a pretty shade and perfect for any season. Although the brush it comes with sheds a bit, it is still suitable to get the job done! Definitely buy if thinking about it. Would buy again!
great color! Very natural looking

This is the perfect color for me, especially with fair to light skin. It looks like I have a flush of color, rather than that I am wearing blush. The scent is so much better than any other blush I've ever used, and the packaging allows for great pigment pickup. I also had to switch all my makeup recently due to reactions, and this hasn't caused any reactions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use Dandelion as a blush and I like it because I am very fair and it gives a subtle flush to my skin. It is a highlighting powder so you could use it right at the top of the cheekbone too above your favorite blush. It's long wearing and a very soft powder.
I like it ÔºÅRecommend it.It looks goodÔºÅ

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for the past 4 years as a highlighter for my cheekbones. I like the color of tipsy from tarte for my cheeks. I am fair skinned. My boyfriend rebought this for me since I'm running out (probably from just using it as a highlighter), and it's still the same price it was 4 years ago. However, 4 years ago they had 100g's instead of 70g's in these new ones. That's why it gets 4 stars. And if you're looking to use this as a blush, you have to be really fair skinned. It does say it's a highlighting powder so why people try it for blush, I don't know.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love this as a summer blush! perfect color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
