reviews.review_text: I really like this blush for an everyday look in the summer or spring. However, I don't think it would be a great match for anyone with very dark skin. I am very fair and it's even a little light on me. I have to apply with a pretty heavy hand to get the color I want to achieve. However, it adds a great soft shimmer over cream or liquid blushes.  I don't think I'd repurchase this however, you don't get the color pay off that you would expect considering the price.
I bought it as a gift for my friend. She loves it so much and has used this product for 5 years. She highly recommends this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is a great shade for women with fair skin who find that most blushes look too red or coppery on your skin. It gives a sun-kissed look that I think is very attractive.
This is the prettiest blush ive ever bought! Its just the right shade and has just the right amount of sparjles in ir! It goes on well and the brush Is neat! Im overall happy about it!!!

reviews.review_title: Perfect color for people with rosacea
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find this blush perfect as I don't need too much because my cheeks already have some color due to a mild Rosacea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A very natural looking pink blush. Perfect for my fair skin. I purchased a few blushes and tried them on at home with natural light and this was the winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like all Benefit blushes, this smells great and blends nicely. I have light to medium skin with olive tones, and I was originally afraid this would not show up or look funny on my skin tone, but it was a great, natural looking color for days when I don't want my blush to be the focus on my face, but I still want some color to brighten my look.

I had been looking for a really light blush that would work well for summer to give a really natural flush, and this is definitely the one! The color is very natural and the product has a very light scent that is wonderful. I would definitely recommend this if you are looking for a nice summer blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this works so well on very fair skin. Nice light shimmer worked great as a work/everyday blush too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best-seller for a reason!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say... as a fair skinned girl this is one of my favs! It is just the right color for me and my preferance of what I like!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This didn't look like much on my cheeks and I'm pretty fair. It has too much shimmer and not enough color. Not a fan of this particular Benefit boxed powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years, and alway love it. But after my recent purchase, I found the power was not as tight in the box as before. It loose like floures after few applications.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to purchase Dandelion for a while - my usual Sephora had been sold out for what felt like forever - it was worth the wait! This is the usual great quality I expect from all Benefit products, can be applied for a subtle very natural looking pink and can easily be built up from there. For a classic low maintenance daytime look I have been using the bronzer from my Urban Decay Flushed palette for contouring (also can be very subtle if applied appropriately) and this Dandelion blush, couldn't be happier!! Love it!
It smells so good, and the pigment is so beautiful, but I blush naturally. So when I put it on a little on my cheeks, they turn red... I love this anyway

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Benefit's boxed powders are my favorite because they are sheer for a nice natural coverage, but if you wanted a more dramatic look they are buildable. I have 5 of these in Dandelion, Coralista, Hoola, Sugarbomb, and Dallas!! Amazing products, I use of these products every single day :)
I'm super, super fair skinned and this is my Holy Grail blush. I don't think it's possible to screw up this blush, it looks so natural and subtle and never sunburned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a sweet and sheer color to use for the apples of your cheeks. I love it. Makes me look just the right amount of flushed. I couple it with Sonia Kashuk's illuminator and it looks like a million bucks.
Love this product. Does just the trick for those of us who do not like to wear a lot of makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The picture does show the true color of the blush. I am fair-skinned and a senior citizen. A dark, overdone blush would look hideous on me. This blush looks perfect, highlights, but natural.

reviews.review_title: I hate to say it does bad things
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want this blush to work so badly. I love benefit and all their neat things. I have this blush and the coralista one and they BOTH break me out. Not just a few zits but actual little bumps everywhere on my cheeks. I stopped using it six months ago and just started it up again and same story. I know it's this blush and it's so sad because I want to use it. It smells so yummy an the color is so pretty. Why does it have to break me out? And the bumps lasts for weeks to months afterwards so I have to stop using it I have no choice. Others have same problem so beware.

reviews.review_title: Subtle and nice for fair skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom gave this to me because it made her break out. It didn't do the same to me - it was a really nice, matte, natural blush that worked great with my pale skin (it was too pink for me to be able to use it as a highlighter).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even being fair skinned like I am, Dandelion doesn't have enough pigment for me to really count it as a blush. Benefit calls it a highlighting powder, so maybe it was unfair of me to expect more pigment. I use this product to set my cream blush and I think it does an alright job with that. I wouldn't repurchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect blush for fair skin. Lasts long. Not fake looking. Doesn't shine: just a naturally sweet pinky flush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very pale skin and have been hesitant towards using blush because I haven't been able to find a color that doesn't make me look like a clown. This blush is fantastic. It lasts all day and it is the perfect shade for my skin color. I would recommend this to anyone who had very fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This gives a really natural, classic coloring. I wear it almost every day! I bought my first box almost a year ago and have only recently reached the bottom of the product. But there is still so much left in the box, I kind of wonder if it has to do with how I swipe the brush. Anywho, I will be buying another box!

Very nice blush and brightener for winter blah skins. I think this is just as flattering and of the same quality as a much more expensive Dior blush I've also used. One or two quick strokes on each cheek and I have a sheer and natural glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The pinky color gives a natural healthy look. I don't really like the brush included. Well, the blush is relatively cheap, Probably shouldn't expect too much on the brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush can be as sheer or as intense as you want. It works really nicely with my skin tone. (I'm pretty pale, but in the middle between cool and warm.)

I was looking for a subtle blush because I am quite fair, and I usually use NARS but I wanted something a little different. This is the same price as NARS but you get a little bit more product and a brush! Gives me a beautiful rose pink flush and it has a nice scent (strange, but I'll take it).

I was extremely excited to purchase this blush/highlighter. I had seen it online previously, and it was recommended to me by the sales lady at Sephora. I thought that the color was magnificent, and that the packaging was adorable. When I arrived home, I was looking forward to applying the blush to see the turnout. When I used the included brush, it scraped my skin, and left an irritation. (I do not have sensitive skin) the color was chalky, unblendable, and reddened my face. Worst $28 I have ever spent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is very natural-looking and foolproof, it's simply impossible to overdo it. The amount of colour and shimmer is just right. The brush is surprisingly good, but for even more natural effect I prefer to apply it with a huge powder brush. The only problem is that due to the supplied brush the package is too big to throw in in your makeup bag.
Simply the best blush. Gives a pop of color on my fair complexion, buildable when I want it to be. I can't help but reach for this blush everyday. Highly recomended!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using NARS blush in Orgasm for years, and I finally decided it was time for a change! Benefit's always been one of my favorite brands, and I love their bronzers and highlighters, so I went with this lovely blush. Pretty ballerina pink that looks so natural and pretty with my fair skin! It really does create a radiant, dewy complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like Dandelion blush because when I dont want a strong color (Coralista) I use this for a nice subtle color that actually looks like my cheeks are flushed. It does go on a little sheer, so I need to apply it about 2 or 3 times to get that natural pink glow that I love. Definitely recommend this if you have tan or olive skin, this color will look beautiful.
I love this powder! I use it as a blush and I absolutely love it! It gives a very natural look and it suits my pale skin tone very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first Benefit product I purchased and it got me hooked on the brand. This blush is the most natural soft pink I've ever tried. Definitely a must-have in any blush collection!
Nice highlighter. It's almost sheer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love the color!! perfect for my olive skin without tan. I think it will look wonderful with a tan also. 4 starts because of my love/hate relationship with the packaging. Really cool but terrible for the day makeup case. Big and clunky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. I love using it for a day look, for a more dramatic look, I top it with a slightly brighter blush. The only reason I did not give this product 5 stars is because it can look a bit ashy if you over apply. If you go too sheer, it may also disappear on your skin. Overall, I love dandelion, it gives me a beautiful rosy glow and I love that it's not over the top shimmery. If you are light to medium complected I strongly recommend this!

reviews.review_title: NIce subtle flush for fair skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Benefit Dandelion for years. It's the perfect subtle blush for my fair skin without being overly pinkie-girlie or sparkly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite blush EVER! It's so natural, it's hard to over-do, and it gives me the most delicate glow. LOVE IT!

I really really in love of this product! And the lipgloss is the perfect partner for this beautiful blush, in a minute your face looks diferent, it's perfect for use daily and smells delicious! I love it!

Bought it for my twin sister recently for her birthday. I had bought it for myself a month ago and loved it. My skin tone is medium and can tan easily. My twin is fair and burns easily. She does not usually wear a lot of makeup and never would spend this $ on herself. She loves it. Went out the day after I gave it to her and she said how pretty it is. It brightens her face . I agree. So different skin tones can use it and look beautiful . I use this instead of my glow minerals blush during the day (and most nights too).

Just a nice light color to add to cheeks or all over face. I can use alone on the weekends and then add a glow to my face after blush during my work week. Got a sample and then had to order the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this at the bar in the Sephora store as only a way to replenish what the Associate removed when trying to match foundation for me. I had NO intentions of purchasing another cheek color, but...oh my!  Dandelion is the PERFECT shade for fair skin tones! In fact, the Sephora Associate told me it's the best match in the entire store for those of us in that skin tone. It's soft, and it gives the most feminine shade of peachy-pink I've ever seen. I immediately tossed my Bobbi Brown and Clinique shades aside because this is truly my fav cheek color shade ever!

reviews.review_title: A staple in my makeup bag!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Dandelion! I have used this blush for years and I have nothing but good things to say about it. Well, mostly good things to say. The one tiny, little, itsy bitsy thing that bothers me is the staying power of this blush, but I will get into that later.  So, what is it? It's a beautiful pink shimmer that I have found to be flattering on MOST skin types. Sadly, since this is a fairly sheer blush, I would imagine that it might not show up that well on darker skin tones, but I do not know that for a fact. What I do know is that this works well on my friend who is VERY VERY pale, and on me. My skin is on the lighter side of medium/lighter olive-ish (I am mixed, so exact skin tone is a tricky subject). It gives you a dewy look with a SUBTLE shimmer, so don't be expecting anything crazy.  I like the little brush that comes with it. While I loooove my Bobbi Brown brush set and my Real Techniques brush set, I am not so much of a snob that I would thumb my nose at the tool that is included. I tend to use my other brushes, but this one is perfectly usable, and definitely functional.  And the smell! As anyone that has read my other reviews knows, smells are are a BIG deal to me. This smells lightly floral. It is very pleasant and it fades quickly, but it is nice while it is around. Not enough to irritate my allergies or my sensitive skin, so that is a big plus.  The only con? The staying power. I have not had the best luck with getting blushes to stay on my face for extended periods of time, and this blush is no exception. I do have to reapply after a few hours (assuming I am not being lazy), but I normally do, so it is not an issue for me. Just don't put this blush on at 5am, and expect to still see it when you get home at 7pm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture and color of this blush. Light and a little shimmering helps give my face a little glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has such a cute natural pink colour to it. The texture and application is also very wonderful.  I don't use the brush that comes with it (because it's square and flat), but it's nice to have just in case you didn't carry an extra face/blush brush with you.  I am never without it. When I am running low I buy a new one just in case.

I have fair skin, and this is the only blush I could find (and I've gone through plenty of them, inexpensive and expensive ones) that gives me a pinky glow without too much sparkle or sheen. Just a nice daytime, fresh-faced product. I resisted buying it for a while because of the price for a single blush, but it's really magic for my skin. Everyone comments on how pretty I look when I use it.
This product is one of my all time favourites! It's light colour looks so natural and beautiful on the fair skinned. I definitely would recommend getting it!
I use this all over my face and it gives me a nice, even, soft look. Love it.

This product is by far my favourite blush! I use it every single day and have yet to be disappointed. I am not a big fan of super shimmery blushes, but this provides just enough for me. I definitely recommend this!

Can't live without! Such an amazing shade- it will more than likely fit any skin tone. The light pink makes it easy to build up the pigment and the light gold specks compliment any shade! I use this for multiple looks and continue to rebuy! I fully recommend this product! Check out the other colors of your hesitant but I do believe this is the end all of blushes. (extra points for GREAT package and brush that totally contains all the blush-dust! YEAH!!)
I love how finely milled and highly pigmented this is. The color is a beautiful peachy pink and looks very natural. One of my new favorite blushes!

I love all of Benefit's blushes but this one is my favorite. It's brightens up your face instantly with a soft and subtle pink. Makes my face glow! You can also layer it up, the result is a color not as intense as the Bella Bamba but equally as dramatic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Before I found this product, I was constantly switching blushes...some shades of pink were too dramatic, some blushes made me break up and some were overly shimmery. There just wasn't a perfect one until this product came along!  It gives your cheeks a flushed look yet looks extremely natural! On my lazy days, I would even skip my foundation and just swish on my Benefit Dandelion to give my cheeks a healthy glow before going out.  Best part of this product is you can control how much tint you want. 1 to 2 swishes give you a natural day time look. 2-4 swishes preps you that evening, superstar glow.

This pressed powder is the best out there for a hint of color and brightness w/o a Tammie Faye look. Can't get this wrong! It goes on perfectly and easily. Can be refreshed anytime during the day and never looks overdone.

This blush is beautiful on pale skin. It immediately perks my skin up, adding a natural-looking glow. I will definitely be buying again when I use it up. I would, however, recommend using a real blush brush, instead of the brush that comes in the package.

I use Dandelion to give my cheeks a bit of natural color. The packaging is better than what it used to be, but the included brush is really wimpy. Every time I use it, a few bristles fall out and stick to my face.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite Benefit products
reviews.review_text: I first received this years ago as a sample and have been hooked ever since. I wear this over my foundation before putting on blush. I love the soft, natural finish and the brush that comes with it works perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the Dandelion blush based on other customers' reviews, and it lives up to its reputation. I am very fair-skinned, and this soft pink is perfect and not overpowering. It blends in naturally (no clown cheeks) and lasts all day, unlike other blushes which have totally worn off by the time I get home from work. It smells heavenly and I even like the brush that comes with it. I hope they never discontinue this shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color of this powder is beautiful. It does not show up very well on my fair skin but it leaves a nice sheen that highlights my cheek bones. It would look great on darker or olive skin tones.

This color Dandelion compliments any skin tone whether fair or olive, its rosey and blends beautifully, no clown looking cheeks with this blusher. I once forgot it on vacation and was truely lost without out no other blusher workes as well. I have been using this color for years now. Benefit DONT stop making this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don‚Äôt wear a lot of makeup; just the basics, understated. Blush wasn‚Äôt part of my morning routine because blush tends to make me look harsh, trampy, and/or old. (I have very fair skin, blue eyes, blonde hair). Then I got a free sample of this and the matching lip gloss and I changed my mind about blush. When I came to this page I saw it was described as a highlighter, which might mean I‚Äôm using it wrong, but even so, it looks awesome. It makes my face look a natural bright and healthy. Maybe that‚Äôs what a highlighter is. I don‚Äôt know; I‚Äôm not the right person to be explaining makeup. I just know this product makes me happy. I also like the lip gloss that came with it, the Ultra Plush Lip Gloss, also in the Dandelion color.

reviews.review_title: Great for sensitive skin or rosy complexions.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've never worn blush or highlighters a day in my life. I've been a devout bronzer only girl for as long as I can remember. I tend to have a rosy tint to my skin anyway so I've always stayed away from adding more. And, that being said, I've always envied the rosy pink on girls who could wear them. I've been contouring with a bronzer around my lower jaw and the sides of my face and have been adding this to the apples of my cheeks and I've never had more compliments on my skin! I've had people tell me that I look glowing, that my skin looks healthier, dewier, and bright. I'll take it!
I just bought dandelion for the winter months as a lighter pinker blush for my paler skin. It's my first powder blush in years but I really like the effect and the slight shimmer in it.

I love Dandelion and recently repurchased. I have extremely fair skin and can use this both as a powder AND a blush without it looking too heavy or too light! I don't wear foundation, so a light brush over my whole face makes my skin matte but a little bit brighter/healthier. Layered a few times on my cheeks, it's a very pretty light blush--goes nicely when I'm wearing very light eye makeup for a natural look.
I love this light pink beauty powder. It looks great when dusted right on top of a thin application of high beam, too. Smells nice, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Although I have more that one of these box o powders this one is my personal favorite. Great for my light skin. The pink is great on my cheeks and I also us as a highligher.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a deluxe sample of this blush with a Beauty Insider Reward and felt like I won the lottery. With Dandelion, I use it for cheeks and a quick eyeshadow when on the go. It's gives me a sweet, ingenue glow despite being none of those things.  I was always hesitant to purchase blush of a higher quality - because it's blush. Just blush. I will never think that way again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Since I am extremely fair, I am using this more as a blush than a highlighter, but can see how it works as both. It is a very soft, pale ballerina pink with subtle shimmer. It is not heavily pigmented, so it takes a couple of sweeps across my cheeks to give me a soft pink flush. I also use it around my temples, nose, and chin to create a nice glow. On the skin, this leaves just a whisper of baby pink with a slightly luminous finish. You can layer it for more color, but it is always going to be light. It can start leaning a little chalky with a heavy application, so be sure to blend. The formula is a finely-milled powder, but it does not fly everywhere with a swirl of the brush. It does have a flowery scent, but that does not transfer to your skin. I am very sensitive to fragrances and this does not bother me at all. I'm not the biggest fan of the cardboard box as it does not seem luxurious and is a little awkward to open. It is also kind of bulky and takes up more room than I'd like in my cosmetics case. But, you do get lots of product for the money. If you are fair and looking for just a hint of pink, this is a great blush and highlighter. For those with a darker complexion, this is probably a highlighter/brightener only. I am really enjoying this for a sweet and natural look. I love this paired with Dior Addict Urban lipstick which is a sheer, pale pink lipstick with soft shimmer. They look like they were made for each other.
I love this and it is so pretty but I didn't realize how little it is.
I love how light the color is. You can layer to increase the intensity. It adds a very natural flush on your cheeks. I use it as my everyday blush now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was terrified of blush, but then I tried Dandelion and fell in love. It is so light and subtle, and wakes up your face without overpowering it. LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely product. For my fair skin it is either a natural light pink blush, or a luminous highlighter. It has a satiny finish with a slight glitter that is subtle.It provides a healthy glow with a little extra something. It can be built for a more dazzling effect, but I prefer it used lightly. It applies well and has a soft texture. The only draw back: Its obviously scented. I personally love it, it's a fresh floral (and I hate most florals) but it doesn't dissipate as quickly as I'd prefer. I can also imagine it could be irritating to those with allergies or sensitive skin.

This is my favorite everyday blush. It goes on very sheer and gives my cheeks the perfect natural flush. I have very fair skin and this blush compliments it perfectly. There is also something about the smell of this product that I find appealing.

I am very fair skinned with dark hair. I loved the color of this but unfortunately, there is not enough pigment in the blush for you to even notice you are wearing it! If it doesn't show up on me, I don't know who it would!
Great Color and light

Previous to this, I only really liked ONE blush I'd found. And I used that primarily at night because it seemed too intense for day. But this is fantastic for all hours, and gives a great natural flush to my cheeks, and wherever I sweep it. A fave product.

THIS MAKES ME SNEEZE LIKE THE DANDELION! THE COLOR IS FANTASTIC FOR A FULL APPLE CHEEKED YOUNG LOOK....PLEASE REMOVE THE FRAGRANCE, AS THAT IS WHY I RETURNED IT BACK WHEN I TRIED IT. THE COLOR IS GREAT....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually skip blush altogether, because it always looks too dark on my pale skin. But this stuff is totally amazing; gives a great, natural looking flush of color, without looking overdone. Lightweight and foolproof. Great for fair complexions. Definitely recommend.

I use Benefit's Dandelion powder as a light dusting over my tinted moisturizer every day. It eliminates the shine from my moisturizer and adds a subtle touch of light pink to my cheeks. I prefer to use a large face brush instead of the small awkward brush that comes with the product. I use Benefit's Dallas powder for extra color on cheekbones.

This is a fantastic blush for everyday looks and casual days. It's very sheer, and a great light pink against my pale skin tone. It blends out beautifully and has a great staying ability. Perfect for Spring.
I love this product. It gives a light glow and looks natural. It also covers pores and feels lightweight. I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I work graveyard shift, and this stuff makes me look like I've gotten a few minutes of healthy sun. Seriously, I go from super-pale monochrome to glowy almost instantly. It's not blush, per se, more like a color-enhancer. Plus, it smells like roses, and the brush that comes with it is really perfectly suited to its application.
I have been used this for 3 years Im sooo satisfied with Dandelion Im going to stick with this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute color. I have had mine for years and years. Great investment. Perfect pink, a natural flush for us pale girls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Light, shimmer color. It gives me just enough color on my face that's not overwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my very first Benefit purchase, and it got me hooked on all things Benefit! I have fair skin, but even in the summer when I am tanned this gives a healthy, natural looking glow. It smells divine and the powder is very fine milled and good quality. I have nothing bad to say about this staple product, I even like the included brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives a healthy, natural look. Brightens skin tone. Smooth powder; brush works very well. (OK, not perfect--I don't like the bulky cardboard box it comes in.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a mini of this and I use it as a setting powder, and to reduce the shine through the day from my tinted moisturizer. I know it seems really pink but it works very well at making me look healthy and rosy. I can use it as a blush in a pinch since I don't carry a blush with me on a daily basis.
I am very fair skinned. This is the perfect color- wont buy any other blush!!!

When another woman pays you a compliment - then you've found a good product. I tried this powder and felt I looked fresher, but when a girlfriend said I looked younger, then there must be something to this powder. It doesn't add a noticeable color, just brightens your glow. I use it everyday...who doesn't want to look younger?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. I always carry it in my bags. Good for daily use, Very light pink, but enough to wake you up in every morning. If you like more colour, just simply apply more, it will work, at least for me. I also sometimes use it as setting powder when I run out of time in the morning. Looks natural and amazing in the morning, especially when you stay up for whole night haha~!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this blush! its a sheer soft pink, perfect for girls who have lighter skin tones! Best part is, no matter how much you apply, it will always look natural on you. Unlike some other blush, one brush on your cheek and you look like you just came back from the circus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I would be able to see a soft pink color on my cheek, but I there was nothing. Wasn't worth getting.

reviews.review_title: a lil luxry in a box <3
reviews.review_text: I am a very fair (with icky reddish undertones) bllonde hair, grey eyed girl. I never thought I could wear blush due to the ruddiness in my skin. This color is very forgiving. I sweep on my cheekbones, over my bronzer, and I look really beautiful. This stuff gives me a subtle glow that u can wear day or night. The faint, pale pink makes me look healthy and happy! Also, because it is a lighter color, it atually helps my sunken cheeks look fuller and more youthful! One suggestion: toss the brush it comes w aside. You really wont get a decent application with it. I use a bigger, fluffier powder brush. I swirl it around in the box, blow a bit of the excess off, and then swirl on my cheeks! Presto chango! Tee hee

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect pink powder and you can even use it with finding Mr. bright

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect blush brightener it's a really nice light pink great to use with the finding Mr. bright kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was between Sugarbomb and Dandelion but I decided on this. When I swatched both blushes Sugarbomb emphasized my pores... which was not flattering. Dandelion however was shimmery and very light. The color is really nice but I didn't like the scent too much. Personally this light pink color would look best on light skin tone. I'm Korean but on the darker side so the blush showed up on my skin a bit more coral than pink. Nevertheless this blush is great!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've gotten more compliments on my glowing skin in the few days I've worn this than in all my life! I was nervous about the shimmer because I'm not a fan of glitter or sparkles but its so subtle and the pink is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a good, staple product! I think it'd look better on lighter skin. I have on olive complexion and Dandelion is pretty on it, but then I forget about it when I look in the mirror an hour later. It's sort, not very shimmery, not matte, it's just, well, good. I use it as blush but only to add a bit of soft color to my face. It's not really buildable either, so it's a pretty solid everyday/natural product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! This is a beauty must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this in the Sephora store and ended up ordering it online.  I love how soft and silky it feels both in the box and on your skin. I have fair skin and it looks perfect and natural. It also smells amazing.  It is quite light though. I would like it to be touch more noticeable on the skin but I think that it is the point.  Great for every day use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I see where people are calling this a blush maybe for some but I use it as an all over face powder and I love it, it really gives your face a very even complexion. I read one review where they were talking about it being to shimmery and I dont see that at all if anything I would say this is close to a matte powder. I use it everyday and love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Dandelion is a very pretty, light, natural, pink hue. Very soft looking on my light skin. Great coverage, and great scent!  This was a piece in my daily routine, until I purchased Hervana, :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this, but because of my medium/deep skin tone it's just too light for me to use as blush. On lighter skin tones though I believe it would look beautifully and natural looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. I ordered the matching lipgloss but that was a notsomuch for me.  This is a light blush on my fair skin, so I feel it makes me look less like the undead, yet isn't obvious at all I am wearing blush. Just natural.  LOVE it. Will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about this product. All the reviews sounded positive and the packaging is adorable. However, once I received it and tried it on - Wow! SO much shimmer! Way too much unless you're 7 and in a dance recital. Even my boyfriend asked, why do you have glitter on your face? Anyway, if you like shimmer, go for it. But if you want to look natural, try another brand!

I didnt think this blush would show up on me, especially since i am tn right now, but it did, and it is awesome. It gives just enough color and sheen to wake my face up, but it light enough that it is fool proof and doesnt require a lot of blending. This is my go to on natural days, or when I am in a hurry.

reviews.review_title: It absolutely IS a blush for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder! It's the perfect, every day blush for my fair-medium cool toned skin. It's very natural, the perfect 'flush' for my skin for a natural daily look.
I love this blush because the color is perfect and the brush covers just where I want the blush. The brush is so soft and a new one comes with each package.

Just seen a few reviews of people calling this a blush. It's not, it's a pressed highlighting powder. It's amazing though, brightens up your complexion without going overboard. Looks good on my medium-light skin tone. I would recommend to anyone! Maybe it could be a sheer light pink blush on very fair light skin, but for me this is nowhere near a blush. Have absolutely been loving Benefit's products lately. Very impressed!

This blush really is more of a highlighter than a blush...I have light skin and it really doesn't provide that much colour. This, however, doesn't mean that I think it's a bad product. Much to the contrary, it is a lovely luminizer, and I think it looks beautiful swept onto cheekbones over bronzer. The soft pink shimmer and the gentle look it gives makes it the perfect luminizer for those attempting the natural look. It is perfect for everyday wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm usually one for dramatic colors, but I tried this soft color in the store and I loved it. It makes you look like you're not wearing makeup, you just happen to have walked all the way to wherever you are. Or something. Anyway it's gorgeous. I use with Hoola and the High Beam highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a deluxe sample size and was afriad it would be too sheer to be a blush, but I was wrong! I have pretty fair skin, but tanned a bit this summer. It went on so smooth and it was buildable. It looked so pretty and natural and had just a hint of shimmer, and also smelled so pretty! It actually stayed on for hours also! Its my new favorite blush.

perfect blush for porcelain girls. not fake looking or a weird doll color, just a very natural glow. its so hard to find good cosmetics that suit my skin tone, and this is fantastic.  i got this as the 500 point perk a while ago... definitely worth it, and i am going to repurchase! (soon, because its almost gone :x)  and yeah, i look like a doof in the picture, but look at the blush. hahaha.

reviews.review_title: Great for real light skin tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the lightest skin possible, I burn in the sun, I never ever tan. I'm the same shade of pale all year. I love Dandelion because it gives me a healthy glow without overpowering my face or making my skin look dirty or chalky. I have been using this for years and it will continue to be one of my go to products.

I have very fair skin, so finding a product that gives a bit of color without being obvious can be tricky. This powder fits the bill--just a hint of natural-looking pink that blends in very smoothly and lasts all day. Would definitely buy this again!
Dandelion and Bella Bamba are the only two blushes I wear now. They are great and the two give me all I need for light or more dramatic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love this blush. It is just the right hint of pink for my skin tone (I'm a light medium). This blush is so natural looking. It is sheer but it's build-able, so I love that it's so versatile.

After hearing so many great reviews on Benefit box powders I was excited to try one. This one had a ton of great reviews so I went with it. I was disappointed because I didn't feel it was that noticeable on my skin ( which is pale ). I love the packaging and everything but for 28 dollars I expected a better color payoff. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great color, really does brighten my face. It's not even close to the colors I used to buy, but I'm hooked now. I'm very fair, and this is perfect for me. Cute box, and it has a pleasant scent. I know other reviewers complained about the brush, but I actually like it.

this is a great product. I use it after using tinted moisturizer and it really does give your skin a natural and healthy looking radiance. it blends really well, feels soft, and is not mattifying like other powders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very pale so this light pink with subtle shine makes a wonderful faint blush on the apples of my cheeks for daytime [no streaky, bright clown makeup for me thanks...] For a sexier look, you could wear more at night: higher on your cheekbones and temples and even dust some on your shoulders and cleavage for a dewy-looking shimmer. As an aside, I like the little plastic divider between the brush and powder which keeps the little box from getting messy and wasting powder that you would have to blow off the container and brush to use. Good idea.
So hard to find products that compliment extremely light skin tones but this is a winner. A staple in my cosmetics case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. I have medium skin and it is a perfect all-over pick me up. I use a blush brush to dust it lightly on my face except my eyes. The color doesn't show up so much as gives a subtle lift, which I prefer. One star off as it doesn't have the best staying power (definitely refresh halfway through the day), and the brush is not too impressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have several of the box blushes. I kind of want to collect all of them. Although they are pricy they last for years, and smell amazing. In addition, the color pay off is great. I would advise purchasing them as part of sets, because you get to test out other benefit products for only a few dollars more.

reviews.review_title: just the right touch of color
reviews.review_text: got a sample and thought it was perfect shade for a fair gal like me. bought the full size and love it. and the powder stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the applicator brush. Pretty pink, but wish it would last a bit longer.

reviews.review_title: Gives my apples a nice sheer pink flush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free gift and I really like it. I use just a little bit on the upper apples of my cheeks to highlight my bone structure. It goes well with my fair skin tone. Not necessarily long lasting.

reviews.review_title: great blush for the super pale
reviews.review_text: I have a difficult time finding powder and blush that look natural. This product solved half of my problem! A lot of reviewers recommend this as an all over complexion pick me up, but I find it a bit too dark for that purpose on my skin. However it's a perfect blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is gorgeous. I know it's called a highlighting powder, but in my opinion it's far to pink for that. As a blush, it looks fantastic on my skin. It's very light pink with a small amount of gold sparkle, definitely not too much. It seems incredibly natural on my light skin with pink undertones, and there's much more blush in the package than with other brands. This is my new favorite blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My styel: minimal, natural  I have naturally pink undertones in my skin and this product works well as both an eye shadow and blush on a no makeup day. My secret weapon to look naturally beautiful!  This product is not highly pigmented, which is what I wanted. However, it has a soft shimmer, gives me a fresh glow, and naturally enhances my pink cheeks and eyes. The awake look advertised is truthful for me.  I was first hesitant about this product because of the price, but I received a free sample from Sephora and it was exactly what I was looking for. I tried to look for less expensive dupes, but there is nothing like this. When I am finished with my sample, I will definitely purchase this product!  *talc-based product - may turn people off, but I find this oh-so-soft, non drying, and non cakey, and does not break me out.

I never wear blush, but I love this little powder. It gives my power-pale face the perfect little pop of color it apparently needed to look alive -- yay! Everyone said it was build-able & it really is. I love that about three swipes with the brush (which I love) is all I need to look awake & lively - BONUS! I'm also pretty sure it's going to last me a very long time.

Dandelion has a nice natural light pink color. Shows up nicely on my fair skin, but I am not sure how well this would show on darker skin tones since it is a light shade. It says it's supposed to be a highlighter, but I don't really get that from this. Love it as a blush for me though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so pretty! It's a sheer peachy colour with shimmer in it. Adds a nice amount of colour/shimmer on my cheeks on days i don't want too much going on.  Do note that the colour is rather sheer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this blush is good for a natural everyday look. its just a very natural light pink color. it looks very nice on us fair to light tones, however i'm not sure about medium to dark tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love benefit blushes, they are very natural looking, and buildable. It is a very soft pink, the picture above does it justice. Although it is expensive, the product lasts you a very long time. The only reason I give this four stars is because it contains parabens, and I would not repurchase because of that. Instead I would buy Coralista, also a benefit blush but paraben-free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good solid light pink blush. Compared to other Benefit blushes though, I felt as if I had to pack it on a little heavy to see anything. This is really nice if you're looking for a light flush of color or even as a subtle highlight, and It's nice for spring and summer but I can't imagine I would use this in the colder months.

I was in need of a blush, something to add a color to my face. Rather then the darker, bolder powders I usually used to define cheekbones I wanted something mellow, light. This is an amazing powder! It is light, smells pleasant yet isn't heavily perfumed, and adds just a light amount of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample of the Dandelion powder and corresponding gloss during a Sephora promotion. I loved both products and ended up giving the powder sample to my sister so she could try it out, and I purchased a full size box for myself. I am very fair, so this is a wonderful blush to wear when I am going for a natural look or am wearing more color on my eyes and don't want to overdo it. The color is buildable, so you can get just a flush, or a more intense pop of the beautiful pink color. The nice smell of the product also makes me happy every time I apply. Though I know many people are not fans of the little brush that comes in the box, I use it whenever I apply the powder and don't mind it a bit. I would recommend keeping the little plastic insert that holds the brush in the container rather than throwing it away. I have done this with all my Benefit boxed blushes, and I find that it helps to keep the brush from getting all powdery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this off and on for years, and I always go back to it. It's so gentle, I would let my daughter brush it all over her face when she was younger. It is very subtle, but gives a pretty glow. I am not too fond of the brush, but the powder itself is great!
The world's best pink ever! Soft and easy to wear, a great summer blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very pretty! It is not too pink, and goes on very light! It is very natural looking. I would recomend this product to every girl who is in LOVE with benefit cosmetics!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pale pink beauty powder is unbeatable for very fair skin. It makes the apples of my cheeks pop without looking garish or artificial. The texture really is satiny and radiant as described.
This is the best product, I use it as a blush and also allover color, I have been using it for years and would highly recommend to anyone with fair to light skin, it perks my skin up!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am really fair and often have a hard time finding blushes that don't look too doll like on my skin. Dandelion gives me a sweet touch of pink with a light shimmer that makes the apples of my cheeks glow. I also sometimes sweep it across my cheekbones and upward to give a nice highlight. The brushes that come with the Benefit boxed blushes tend to get a lot of criticism, but honestly I don't think they are bad at all! The brush picks up just the right amount of product and applies a nice, even dusting to my cheeks. If I am trying to define my cheekbones a little more, I use a large, flat blush brush or sometimes a large fan brush. Overall this is a great product if you want a light, radiant blush that adds the perfect touch of sweetness to your look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was torn between this product and the Watt's up illuminator from Benefit. After trying both at the store, I definitely preferred this product. As most people say, it gives a very subtle illuminating and rosey glow to my cheeks. The watts up was a little stronger and made my face look too shiny. I love this powder for a subtle blush and to brighten up my cheeks. And it really does smell great!! Recommend this for people who want a subtle, natural look with their face makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression was that the color was too light. Now that I'm wearing it almost every day, I appreciate the subtle quality that is very natural looking. It's a great addition to my daytime look and my alternative to days I don't wear Bella Bamba. It provides a soft glow and nothing shiny. I also love the smell.  However, I do think It's probably more ideal for light or fair skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can‚Äôt go wrong shade of blush for fair skinned ladies! This is my go-to for ‚Äúno makeup‚Äù days - it‚Äôs foolproof and looks so natural.

I got this in a sample and was impressed. This gives you a natural looking glow without being very pigmented. It complimented both my roommate (brunette/brown eyes/ medium complexion) and me (redhead/blue eyes/fair).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't really enjoy this product as a highlighter. I feel that the color is too sheer, and the application is a bit too powdery. I prefer liquid/cream highlighters because I get more control application-wise. This may be good for creating a soft-focus look on fair skin, but for me, I just didn't do anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, s'bout it really. It works as a nice natural looking, soft pinky blush, the powders soft, the included brush isn't as horrible as I thought it would be, but all in all it seems like more of a novelty item. The product is good...but really the only thing that jumps out in the fragrance and the packaging. Yes, I like the rest of the world loathe the little cardboard box in terms of practicality, but I have to admit it is pretty smeggin adorable. All if all I don't regret picking this little guy up, but for the price ah'm not impressed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So, it's a very, light pink blush with a little shimmer. I don't understand all the hype.  I am a big fan of all of Benefit's tints, High Beam, Highbrow Glow, and Eyebrow Pencil... so I wanted to like this product as much as the other reviews had raved... My makeup tastes are pretty simple ... so I appreciate subtle products... but this left me feeling very... so what?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this as a promo and I must say it is fabulous. I love it and iit just may become a purchased item. I can't wait for the full sized. So glad it was my promo choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the blush I go for when I don't want to look like I'm wearing any blush. I just gives me a hint of a glow. Perfect for some of the lighter, pink-based makeup looks I've been going for this spring and summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as the BI sample from Sephora; I'd never tried it as I thought it would be both too pink and too light. But applied over the Benetint, this is lovely! Normally I go a little peachy-er or coral, but I love this. Might not be enough on it's own though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ....in a good way. I don't find it to be 'shimmery' as described (thankfully). It literally makes my complexion look all fresh and youthful and glow-y. I tried it on a tip from Glamour magazine, they recommended it as universally flattering. With my light skin and dark hair it's a winner.

reviews.review_title: Does what it says and then some!
reviews.review_text: Got this as a gift from my brother (after I dropped a lot of not-so-subtle hints), and I've been impressed with the product.  For those days when I get little to no sleep and wake up with an ashy face, this product makes me look very awake, very bright!  The smell is nice, and it really does give a subtle pink shimmer over your face. I love it and with the amount of product I got, I know I'll be using it forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, very sheer pink on my cheeks, doesn't cause breakouts because I have combination skin, and best of all is that it smells good. Love the compact mirror that comes with this as well. Overall, I'm very happy with this.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite products of all time
reviews.review_text: I love Benefit's Dandelion. I'm very fair, with pink undertones, and it's difficult to find make-up that blends with very fair complections. Dandelion does the trick, without making me look too pink or artificial. Also works as highlighter on brows, nose, forehead and chin. Color layers well. Doesn't settle into creases either, despite powder format. This is a basic in my make-up case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! It is a great colour and it lasts all day. It is buildable and really does brighten your face. I highly recommend this product. It is so pretty I love it!
I have been using benefit Dandelion for over 15 years. It's good stuff! The light color/coverage allows you to touch up all day without looking cakey.
The color is really pretty and subtle and natural. Plus the packaging is SOOOOOO pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this blush! I use it every day, and the brush is very soft. The color looks good on any skin color, and it is very buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Owned this product for awhile before using and was suprised at how lovely the blush and brush are. Not only is this the prettiest pink tone for my fair skin, the brush is a great applicator for on the go makeup delivery. This goes everywhere with me and I'm ordering an extra because I love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have test nearly all of these powder blushes/bronzers and have had samples of a few. I would love most all of them if it weren't for the packaging. I'm always throwing my makeup in my purse, a travel bag, etc. I would probably purchase all of these if they came in some sort of plastic compact with a mirrow that snaps shut. Unless they stop using the box packaging, I likely won't be purchasing them. If you don't mind that detail though, this is a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this on my clients, and I never have a problem. The color shows up amazing and the box is adorable! I don't use the brush in the box because it doesn't blend as well as a normally blush brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is a pretty very soft pink. It is a very buildable blush. I have foud that it takes at least 2-3 applications to have a good color payoff. I have pale skin with pink undertones, so maybe thast why this blush takes a couple swipes for it to show up. Once I get the color built to were i like it, it is a very soft natural blush. Great for summer. These Benefit Boxes always last me months. It takes a long time to hit pan on these blushes/bronzers. So They are worth the price. If you have dark skin I do not recomend this product. If you are willing to build the blush to your liking then try this out. The packaging is super cute and sleek. I have had a little bit of problems with the box coming open in my make up bag since it is just a magnet holding it together. The brush that comes with it does pick up the right amount of product but the fibers are not soft so I dont use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this blush based of a YouTube review. It is an amazing blush for almost anyone, because it adds a nice light flush of colour (& is buildable) that also brightens your face. While I'm not overly crazy about the box packaging, it is cute and well constructed. I enjoy that while not being matte, it is not a pearly, glittery mess.

reviews.review_title: Best blush for fair skin with big pores!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many blushes in every form, stains, powder, compac, liquid, gel, and sticks. This blush is the BEST. It isn't dark, it's to accentuate not highlight. It has almost no shimmer but that can be added over it. It HIDES LARGE PORES so well!! I keep coming back and now it's the one. I have med fair skin and light green eyes. Born blond but went to a dark dirty blond with age. This is subtle and perfect for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's tough to find a pink blush that won't clash with warm redhead coloring. I usually go for peach, nude or light coral shades, but wanted a true pink to go with purple smokey eye. This fits the bill exactly - it's a true blue-based pink, sheer, blends nicely. Slight shimmer, but not that noticeable. Looks soft and natural. I was a little hesitant to purchase because of the reviews of sparkly finish, but glad I finally ordered it. Great value & cute packaging - this brick o' blush will last forever.

reviews.review_title: FailSafe and Fabulous - Especially for blondes
reviews.review_text: This is one of those products I always go back to in my make-up bag because it's just the perfect amount of color to perk up your face, make it look healthy, rested and glowing. Works great over other blush or alone, I even put it down my neck to brighten me up in winter. It's just a little hint of super soft, natural pink. And one box will last forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really pale skin (usually within the first couple of shades on a foundation color selection) and yet Dandelion just doesn't work well for me. It's not enough shimmer to work as a highlighter on me and the pink doesn't show up enough as a blush. I switched over to Benefit's Hervana and that is a much better match for me.
The nicest blush I've used to date. Lovely warm colour but subtle too so I don't look like a barbie doll! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're fair skinned (like me) this is more an illuminator than blush. It does leave a peachy pink color on your cheeks only if you put it on numerous times. This is more of an illuminator than blush .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i first tried dandelion when i was in high school, and it's still my go-to powder when i just want to look fresh, natural, and gorgeous. it's perfect for school or work, running to the store or hanging out in sweats at home. anytime, really :) also...a little bit goes a long way, so it lasts forever. totally worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush - it looks so natural and really wakes up your face. I use it every day and it lasts quite awhile. Took one star off for the $$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I use it everyday! It gives me a nice, soft glow with a hint of shimmer. What's great about it is it looks great with makeup or alone. On the days I don't wear makeup I put on Benefits That Gal Face Brightener and dust this little baby on and I'm good to go. A little goes a long way. With that said this product lasts for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to shy away from shimmery pink products, as they don't tend to flatter my light/golden undertoned asian/hispanic skin, and usually stick to peachy blushes only. HOWEVER, the shimmer and subtle pink glow of this blush is perfectly understated for not only myself, but many of my friends' light to medium dark skin tones. This is the only bright pink blush that doesn't make me look like a clown (I also sometimes use this to highlight the inner corners around my eyes for a nice awake look). It also lasts all day and doesn't accentuate my sometimes overly-dry cheeks in the winter. Absolutely love this blush, have hit pan in about a year's time (it lasts forever!), and will be buying this again.

The color is very flattering on myself & my friends who use it whenever they can! Its subtle but still gives a pretty cheek color. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is interested in a  light but long lasting blush.

without a doubt this is my favourite blush! it's a beautiful, soft, romantic pink that looks great on my skin. because i am so pale i need the colour in my cheeks and it makes my skin glow and look very natural!

This is my first Benefit purchase from Sephora and I'm pleased with the soft silky feel of this highlighter powder.Many highlighters are shimmery or very glittery but this is not and It's great soft color for day and work. The square brush sheds a little but it's a great shape to apply the powder on the upper cheek area.The little square box container is cute but not great for packing. and travel. I'm going to consider other products by Benefit.

Received this as a 500 point perk (Beauty Insider program) gift and i am so glad I did! I would have never bought this for me because it looks too soft/sheer to show on my medium skin tone. This is so soft, pretty, baby pink that shows up on me with two swipes using the brush included. I wear it with a strong eye/lip to get a nice soft pink cheeck that does not compete with the eyes/lip. The brush and mirror make it easy for travel. Will buy when I run out.
This is such a great, natural color. It gives you a little flush without looking like you're wearing blush. It lasts all day too. Definitely my new favorite!
light, a bit of shimmer, comes out more of a dusty rose on me

I love this product- it goes on so smoothly and stays on, too! I used to never wear blush because I could never find a color I was satisfied with, but this light color looks really natural and flattering.

I have purchased this product about a year ago and was completely satisfied with the product. However, when I purchased it again recently I was disappointed because once I got it home and compared the new box with the old box, it was obvious there was about 30 % less product in the new box. Though the new box does boast a new mirror in the lid (which no one ever uses) I would gladly trade it for more of the actual blush or at least a decrease in the price of the product.
I love this powder! it looks beautifully natural, goes on so smooth, doesn't wear off, and adds just the right amount of pop to highlight cheeks without looking unnatural!
Best color, long lasting, and the product lasts almost a year!!! Love it.

I have been using this for years, literally, since it came out! It adds a little boost to my skin, perfect for the mornings! Everyone, from my co workers to my dentist have asked me about my complexion and what I use to always look so perky! =)
This is the best blush ever made. It gives color without being too bold. It makes your skin look beautiful.

This powder works well as a natural-looking blush on my fair, pink undertone skin. It doesn't irritate my face, and usually stays on all day. I use a small blush brush to apply the powder. The small box fits well in my cosmetic drawer without taking up too much space, but despite its petite size, seems to contain a lot of product.

This stuff is great. I was a little skeptical, for the price, for something to just swipe on at random...but it really does do its job. I apply it all over my face, over top of my foundation powder and Benetint as blush, and I get this really un-fake, pretty, awake look. I'm so pale that I normally fight the ghost effect when I put on foundation powders (blush alone just makes me look like a clown), and this counteracts that brilliantly. It looks very natural, and restores my natural pink-tone.

I love this highlighter.  Usually, I'm not much of a blush person, because it makes me break out terribly - besides, my skin is so oily it usually just slides off my face before noon.  When I use Dandelion as a blush, it's perfect! The color is nice and subtle, and leaves a hint of glow (not chunks of glitter, like some other blushes).  What's especially nice is the staying power - at the end of my work day, I can still see the soft pink color on my cheeks. No streaking to speak of.  Honestly, I don't mind the brush provided. However, as I have said, I'm not really a blush person, so maybe I just don't know what I'm missing. I don't apply with a sweeping motion; I use a patting (I don't really know how to describe it) motion.  I recommend this product. Just give it a try, I think you'll like it!
I love this blush. It highlights my light skin so well that it looks like a natural flush - just the way I want to look!

Im a big fan of benefit products. The only reason I didnt give this 5 stars is I think it may be too light for some skin tones and there is another benefit blush I like a little better. However this color looks beautiful and natural on my fair skin. I would buy this again.

reviews.review_title: Great for my fair sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is perfect for my fair complexion and it doesn't break me out like other blushes! Will definitely be buying more of this because of how easy it is to blend with my other cosmetics.
this is my favorite of all the blushes, i think it smells so good. its just enough to give you a light shimmer. love it.
This amazing blush has been the best I've ever used. I love the effect it gives your skin during the day, it gives you a glow that makes your skin look beautiful. I highly recommend this product.
Love it . It's so natural and the little box is really beautiful
The only blush I use. Love the color!

This product is wonderful and a little goes a long way! I was surprised by how much it showed up on my skin and what a difference it made. It goes on nicely and leaves a delicate pink glow. Goes on better with a round brush--not the brush that comes with it.
Based on other reviews I thought the Dandelion shade would be great for my fair skin, but it is way too light. I think this would be nice on darker skin so there was contrast.
this is nice for us light skinned its not dark at all just a hint of color which is all i wanted very natural looking

Benefit Dandelion is one of the first products I ever purchased and one of the best. This isn't scented the way newer releases of boxed powders is but the texture is fantastic. This has micro-glitter in pan but when applied I never see it. It gives the most natural looking but subtle pink flush. I use this as a blush and occasionally sweep onto lids and it looks so pretty. This is one product I think I will need to have for the rest of my beauty-filled days
Great color on my light complexion! I have oily skin, so it doesn't last long...

I bought this item in hopes that it will illuminate my face as the box says it does. My face is medium toned and this product did not work wonders for me. I scattered the product all over my face and did not see a difference so i decided why not put more till i see a difference? So i decided to put more product on my face but i still did not see a difference. I will not recommend this product for people with medium skin tones as myself!!!

I love it! first time i tried on my friends at new years i had to get it! It smells amazing, just like all benefit cosmetics, and it looks great too as long as you blend it out a little after putting it on.
Quite simply, it's the best blush out there.
This is a pretty blush but i feel like it doesnt show up enough on my fair skin. I dont think its worth the price at all. I have 3.00 blushes.that work way better.

I adore this blush! It looks amazing on my fair skin, comes in a cute package with a brush i that works better than most blush brushed i have tried, the color is buildable from a nice highlighting powder to a deeper natural looking blush! i wish i would have tried this a long time ago
Such a pretty light blush color. smells good too. but it stays on most of the day. Overall a good product.
Yeah, it's expensive. But: It looks amazing on my skin tone (practically translucent) and gives me a beautiful glow for wintertime, when bronzer seems obvious and overdone.
I am fair-skinned, and I love how this looks on me. It gives me a great pinky glow. It smells good too!

I love this blush! It's so natural looking and really nice. It gives a slight blush and I would recommend this to people who like very pigmented blushes. I have veryy fair skin and I'm not sure if it would show up on dark skin but I love it. :)

I actually really like this product. Yes it's faint so for girls who are looking for a splash of colour it's not for you. However, I just like the slightest flush with some sparkle and that's what this product gives me.

This was my first expensive makeup product I had ever tried, due to sneaking into my older sister's makeup box. I' am really fair skin, but this color shows up very nicely! It's almost like a powder type highlighter for your face. I've tried other light colored blushes but this one is the best one. The packaging is so adorable and it lasts such a long time mine did for like 8months. Its really good if you like the more natural look or you just want more of a pick me up throughout the day.
Am not a fan of the Benefit packaging or the brush provided. The color left my complectiion flat and not rosie.  Returned product.

I see no difference with before or after when I use this. I guess it's supposed to make my face look brighter or something, but I am at a loss to figure out what it's done except make my wallet lighter. Cannot recommend.

this is my favorite box of powder from benefit. It's gorgeous on my pale complexion and it looks so natural. it's such a pretty ballerina pink color on my cheeks and it's one of my go to colors if I don't know what I want to wear :)

reviews.review_title: Its nautral pink blush!! love it <3
reviews.review_text: This is my first time to try benefit blush and i chose dandelion because i wanted to look natural and light pink looked so pretty!! I absolutely love it <3 but it is very sheer pink so if you have dark skin, don't get this product because the color is not gonna show up your skin. I have a medium skin, it looks very pretty and natural pink color
This is the best blush for people with pale skin! It's just enough color on your cheeks without being overbearing. I like it a lot.
Favorite blush ever. Perfect for those with fair skin.
I love using this powder. I have light, fair skin, and it really does perk up your complexion.

I only tried this because I got it for free with my 500 points. I didn't think it would work as a blush on it's own because it is VERY LIGHT and it reminded me of something I would have worn in junior high however it translates very nicely on skin and gives it a nice healthy glow. I usually wear Coralista and I have to be careful not to apply with a heavy hand because I have extremely pale skin but Dandelion looks much more natural on me
i had heard a lot about this blush and was looking for a pink shade that would be highly pigmented and show up on my skin tone. however, it didnt show up too well.

I can't get enough of Benefit's cute little boxed blushes, but this is the one for me without question. I honestly can tell my face is not complete in the morning until I have applied this, it adds just the perfect glow to my face - a rosy, healthy, pink that is breathless and pretty. Often people ask what the foundation is - but it's the Dandelion mixed with High Beam on the high points - really lightens up my fair pink skin and just looks like I am glowing with a little secret of my own! It's great stuff. It also stays all day long.
I really love this blush. I feel like it gives me more of a youthful appearance every time I wear it. I have fair skin, and love the look and feel on my skin. Been using it for YEARS!

I love dandelion powder/blush. I originally bought it because my cousin told me how pretty it looked over hello kitty blush, I ended up buying it for myself and loving it! I typically use it over my hello kitty blush stick to set it as well as on top of my foundation as a powder. It looks natural, and is so gorgeous. I also typically don't like the brushes that come with products, but now I just use the brush that came with this blush because it is simpler as well as looks better than the blush brush I usually use.  Overall, I recommend this product!!!

I used Dandelion years ago....it was very youthful. I stopped using it and used Orgasm from NARS. Althought both are beautiful, there is something innocent and delicate about Dandelion...even on it's own, without any foundation or other makeup....it makes me feel pretty.

This is a nice daytime blush. Not too much color but just enough to look not so pale. Goes on nicely & the brush is nice. you have to have light skin to wear this. It's def. not a night time blush, it's not dramatic in any way. Medium/dark skin...this will not show up.

I got this with my 500 points and I was very excited about it because the color was so pretty and it was a full size! Unfortunately, I was immediately disappointed with the results. It didn't even show up on my medium tone skin, I couldn't even see anything. It's good for a very sheer blush for a small flush of color though.. nothing too great. I'd say this blush would be nice for people with pale, fair skin.. not for medium, olive and dark tones.

reviews.review_title: Smells as good as it looks
reviews.review_text: I adore this, I love everything about it, right down to the box! It's perfect for my pale skin tone and smells delicious! Great staying power too.
