Really like the glow that this powder provides--and since I'm fair, I can often use it as a blush substitute

reviews.review_title: Pretty Color But Not For me
reviews.review_text: I think the color is really pretty but the color is a lil to light for me.
I have been using Dandelion for quiet awhile. I have fair skin and this product gives me a natural looking flush. The only problem is the brush is kept inside the box and I am acne prone.
This is one of my all time favorites- it is perfect for adding just a little color to a fair complexion when you don't want to wear a lot of makeup but still want to look alive!

I got this blusher for christmas a week ago. Im already have pretty red cheeks. what i do to make this blush the actual color on my skin is buff my powder alot on my cheeck then aplly the blush. GO BUY IT
I love Benefit blushes..Dandelion in particular leaves a really nice soft pinky glow. It's a very subtle product. Works really well with fair complexions.

This is the prettiest, most natural-looking pink blush I‚Äôve ever seen. I‚Äôm rather pale and I find most blushes either too dark or too bright for my skin tone. If you have the same problem, I definitely recommend trying Dandelion. You can apply 2-3 layers for a slightly brighter color. This is also a great deal, given the amount you get, although I see that Benefit actually changed the packaging to include a mirror at the expense of 0.1 oz of the product.

reviews.review_title: Subtle blush for a very pale girl
reviews.review_text: I'm very pale and was always afraid of using blush, but this is very soft pink and pretty. It seems pretty hard to mess up or over-apply (which is good for a beginner like me). I don't really notice any shimmer in it. It also has a soft, clean smell that doesn't linger on your face. It might not show up on darker skin tones, but is a subtle, soft pink on mine. I took one star off because the brush they included was too harsh for me (I have pretty sensitive skin).

Received a full sized sample as a VIB. Really didn't want it or think I would like it but Sephora clearly knows what they are doing when they dole out samples as this has become my new favorite blush. It's natural looking and is perfect for the workday. (I use NARS Orgasm when going out.) Anyway, I absolutely love this shade as well as the brush that is included. Just ordered two more, one for my travel bag and another for my purse!!

Having very fair skin and not being a huge fan of blush in the first place, I usually stray away from it. But I wanted to start adding a bit of color to my cheeks when I was going out, so I started looking for a blush. My mom actually recommended this color to me because she used to own it, and immediately after buying it I loved it. It's very light pink and perfect for someone whose skin is very pale like mine. Plus there's not a lot of shimmer in it, which I love! I think a lot of shimmer in blush looks tacky.

ive been using this product for years, its a staple in my makeup bag. it provides just enough color to use on my fair skin as blush, but isnt too powdery. i would also like to mention that its not TOO shimmery, it has a small amount of shimmery but isn't sheen-y at all or over the top. the product also features a new package that helps keep order to your counter, no more makeup lids to shuffle around. overall a great product!

I LOVE THIS! It's like perfect in a box, which is also perfect! It's just the right shade for everyone. More=darker less=more natural. No weird smell, no pimple producing stuff, no weird glittery stuff, all just right!

Dandelion adds a very soft pink tone to cheeks that makes me think of children's youthful rosy cheeks. I think that this is light and innocent enough color that it would make a perfect gift for a girl who is coming of age/taking interest in her appearance. I love it.
Perfect for girls who like natural looking blush, or for setting cream blushes! A gorgeous colour for all skin tones, I am absolutely in love with this product. Packaging is also sturdy and adorable!

I have been using this blush for nearly 15 years & I will be using this as long as Benefit continues to make it! This light pink color is perfect for fair skinned girls. It goes with a large variety of looks, from night-time sexy smoulder, to summer-time beach simplicity. ADORE IT!

I LOVE benefit cosmetics, but this powder was absolutely too pale. It was unattractive on my skin and barely showed color. I'm Italian with light, yellowish skin with red-pink undertones, this was not for me. The only skin tone I could see this color working on is fair with yellow undertone and freckles.

I wasn't sure what to expect when I purchased this. I got this as a recommendation from a YouTube Beauty guru. I find that for my skin tone I have to apply a lot for it to actually show up. It's pretty for every day if that's what you're loooking for. Something subtle. It's a very pretty pink.

This product gives the most beutiful glow. If you are expecting a high pigmented blush, do not purchase this. Rather, it gives a peachy sheen. It's perfect for natural looks. I think this product is best for light complexion tones. It's become one of my go-to blush products.
This powder is very light and in lovely pink. Applying it to cheek make the whole face look healthy and beautiful! You can wear it to work or school in just perfect color.
Highlights cheeks and is soft and pretty.

very nice natural color for a fair-skinned person. it's kind of a blush-highlighter combo. warning to those looking for more oomph...not there. but, for others looking for dewy without the shine, sparkle, or glitter, this is it. the packaging is cute, but the rectangular brush doesn't give as much control as i'd like so i use my standard highlighter brush with it.
this is great powder pick me up because u can put on without looking in a mirror very natural
one of my new favorites. its very neutral looking. a little dab it good. not caky or chalky. smells nice.
The best color. I am very light skinned and I have to put two or three layers on but I sitll think it's the best cheek color ever. If you like a light blush, this is for you.
Good for every day use, adds a light pink flush to your face. However, friends commented that NARS Orgasm (my previous blush) still looks better.

I first go this blush in a sample bag and immediately fell in love with it! It's perfect for everyday use and gives my cheeks a perfect pink glow that lasts all day! I definitely recommend this blush!

This the pefect pink blush for my fair skin, not too bright. Perfect for day wear. In the box it appears to be a pretty light pink, but a little of this really goes a long way. A box of this lasts me 6 months!. Absolutely worth every penny!
Once I found this years ago, I never stopped using it. it just gives a pale person glowing cheeks!
I use to use this product a long time ago and it is great! I recently purchased it at Sephora, and I will not be buying it again! It does nothing for my face except make it look over powdered.

i don't think this works on my medium olive complexion. I didn't see anything change when applied. I tried using it as a blush and its ok only if i layer it several times, it'll give a hint of pink and tons of shimmer which I didn't like. I tried using it as an all-over complexion powder which just gave a hint of shimmer to my face but no brightening effects. Overall ehhh for me

This is the first boxed powder I've bought from Benefit, and I am in love! It's very natural, and the light pink works well for winter since I've lost my tan. My Bare Minerals blush I normally wear looks too dark now, so I've moved on to Dandelion. The color is fairly buildable, but it is good to keep in mind that the primary purpose of this powder is as a face brightner. I don't use the brush that came with it. Instead, I use my angled blush brush.
It has really soft pink, which goes well on my cheeks. The fact it does not have any shine or glitter, this is my everyday cheek powder. :) Two thumbs up!

I've used this for years and I hope Benefit never stops making it like my other standby, Georgia Peach, which I used as an overall face glowy powder rather than blush. I was saddened to learn it was out of production and had to buy a set from the UK. Dandelion gives me the perfect pink glow. I use it as a blush or to give some glow to a stain blush. Love it.
this is great, it looks natural and is very pretty i love it

i've been using dandelion as my blush for the past 5 years and it's the only thing i will use. i am very fair-skinned and anything else i try just turns me into a clown.  not only does the pink flatter most skin types, the little sparkles are perfect size - and it smells good too!
I have very light skin, and this is my new favorite blush! It gives me a beautiful pink glow, I love it!
This is my third one already!! Looks natural and flawless!!
great for everyday wear
Lightweight, soft pink; flatters my yellow undertoned complexion so that i look energetic and alert, i.e., not tired! A great product in a box, so easy to swirl a large round brush in.
Can't face the world without it. Been using it for years. Some days I need a little more, some days a little less. But it never looks clownish, always fresh and bright.
I love the smell so much and every morning I would apply a little all over my face. The smell is like rose. It makes me look cute and delighted.!! a must have!

I received this as part of my 500pt perk. I wouldn't have chosen this normally because it looks too light. So wrong! This is honestly the best blush I've found so far and I have tried TONS. It gives you a great flushed look without too much color or too much shimmer. A definite must have!

reviews.review_title: the most beautiful color of pink!!
reviews.review_text: i love love love this blush!!! it looks great.. laste all day and gives a fresh color on my cheeks... i am fair/blonde/ blue eyed and it looks very natural... love it! i bought many !!!!
the most perfect shade of pink
I love Dandelion! I've loved it for years. It's fresh and perfect. It's the first cosmetic I let my daughter buy. Just the best!
This is my one of my favorite blush. I absolutely love it.

This is a fantastic blusher! My skin is so fair that I always have serious trouble finding anything light enough (foundation wise and everything!) this is the only blusher I found that is light enough so that I don't look like a clown, but it shows and gives a nice glow. Great product. It smells nice, too
This will be the perfect blush when you want to look natural but yet you want to brighten up a little, also the little brush and the mirror it came with comes in handy! You can bring this anywhere.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for natural baby cheek look
reviews.review_text: I watched a gazillion vlog reviews before I took the plunge to buy this. I would never usually pay this much for blush! BUT it is truly amazing! It gives you that perfect baby doll cheek look. Very natural, everytime I wear it my friends ask me what I'm wearing because I look polished. I wear this alone (feels so light and almost creamy) and sometimes with Nars Blush in Deep Throat to add a little oomph. The scent smells like roses which I love but might turn someone off. While the packaging is odd it is very effective. With the fine powder blush you always get some sort of scraps left over when you use a brush and you end up losing product. The box packaging keeps the fall out inside so you don't lose the powder, ingenious! I find the brush it comes with is pretty much useless but I don't know many people who actually use the application tools that come with makeup. I've been using it for almost 7 months consistently almost everyday and I have yet to put a serious dent in it and I really put it on. I like applying it twice because it really makes you cheeks look gorgeous. However I am fair skinned and I don't know how this would work on darker complexions. If you have a darker complexion I would definitely hit up your local Sephora and play around with it. I highly recommend it, the price is justified by how well it works, great functional packaging and the lasting power of it not only on your face but also in how long the product will last you in the long run.

this has to be the only blush i ever hit pan with. I have some in the 4 corners of my box and it's quickly disapperaring lol, but I am NOT happy about the new amount in the box. The old box had .35 and the new one has .25 for the same price. I love this blush, but I'm not happy about the lesser amount of product for the price you pay. I may say it's worth it, but I just don't know. the thing that set benefit apart was the generous amount of product in these boxed powders and this one is getting smaller. But I love the color and it looks beautiful on my light skin. I've been using it for years.

reviews.review_title: perfect blush for my fair skin
reviews.review_text: I am naturally very pale. For the past year I was a tanaholic (I know, horrible!) so bronzers were my weapon of choice. Luckily I have woken up to the dangerous and unpretty side-effects of fake tanning. Since embracing my pale roots I have made the transition from bronzer to blush as bronzers now looks very unnatural and muddy on my skin.  It has been hard for me to find flattering blushes. I've had a lot of misses with my purchases. For example, the renowned nars orgasm looks way too pink and unnatural on me. A lot of other blushes are either too intense, or chalky...  Benefit dandelion is by far the most flattering colour for me! It's amazing actually. Its very hard to use too much unlike my nars sin which I am actually scared to use because it ends up looking too much more times than not.  This blush is hands down my favorite cheek colour at the moment. 5 stars for sure.
I received this as an insider bonus. It's a really flattering color. I don't care for the floral smell but it doesn't last long. The color is sheer and buildable. Love the packaging. Very nice!

I don't use this as a blush, I apply it over my foundation with a big fluffy brush and then apply my blush. It's very light and adds a gorgeous radiance to my skin. I started getting compliments immediately. I love this! It even seems to diminish wrinkles as it reflects but isn't at all shiny. Genius!!

Dandelion is amazing blush in a collection of amazing blushes from Benefit. The color is a perfect light pink which will not look overpowering at all. The boxed packaging is cute and girly, and the smell is a light floral. I recommend all Benefit blushes.
My friend recommended this to me. it is good!

this is my absolute favorite blush. it can be used as a finisher or as a light blush to illuminate the face... i call it angel blush because it really gives you the innocent flushed look of an ethereal creature!  that being said, i've had the blush for a month and i've already hit the pan. one problem is that the blush doesn't really stay on for long because it's so sheer, so even with my urban decay all nighter spray the color only lasts for about 4 hours. so that + redesigned boxes with significantly less product makes this a pricey blush for how long it lasts. but it really is beautiful and transforms the face without looking overdone.

Benefit‚Äôs boxed powdered blushes have become my favorite blushes. After trying Coralista and loving it, I got Dandelion and love it just as much. The pretty light pink color is perfect for fair skin.  The color is a light pink with a medium amount of fine silver shimmer. For those looking for a matte blush or looking to avoid shimmer altogether, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this. However, the shimmer is very fine and not very noticeable once applied. The blush is compacted in the box but picks up on the enclosed brush very easily. The brushed included with the Benefit brushes are my favorite blush brushes that I‚Äôve ever tried- they create a perfect glow on the cheek. The powder goes on smoothly, lasts all day long, and does not irritate my skin. Even when I notice my foundation or setting powder looking a little dull after a long day, this blush is still going strong.

Ooooooooh my God! I cannot believe how perfect this blush is. Light enough to be worn everyday. I'm sorry for those for whom it doesn't work good, I am pretty sure it will be a big winner for most....

I love the new design of the Benefit highlighting powder (ie, the cover and bottom are attached). Initially I thought this colour would be too light for my skin but it puts a nice pinky blush to your cheeks, which is perfect if you don't want a lot of colour. And the light fragrance on this product is really subtle and lovely.

reviews.review_title: not for golden or olive-toned fair girls!
reviews.review_text: This powder's high-quality, I tried using it first as a blush and then as a highlighter. I can say that the powder stays on (I used a big fluffy blush brush) and is a nice matte consistency. I'm part Asian though, with yellow undertones, and while I'm super fair, the product just doesn't show up on me even though I tried layering. Just not the right color! Nothing wrong with it so I can't really deduct stars.

This blush is really pretty! It's flattering on my light skin, and I think it's neutral enough to work well on all skin colors (though I haven't tried it). The only thing is, it doesn't layer well. I have tried to put on more occasionally, for a more dramatic look, and it doesn't come through. All around, this is a great day blush!

Got this as part of a VIP point perk...quite nice really! Gives a nice glow and just kinda perks you up. This will be going in my travel kit to ward of the deathly pales that plague me after a long plane ride for work.
Leaves a light, just-pinched pink on your cheeks. Love using this when I'm contouring just underneath... gorgeous color and can be used all year long if you'd like.

I love this! At first I was scared to try it because i thought it would be too pale (even though I am one of the most palest girls out there) but every other blush I try is too pink or too orange if i put just a liiitle too much on. This gives color to your apples with out making it look like you're wearing blush. I'm so happy I finally bought it. Plus for the people complaining about the price, you're being silly, this stuff lasts FOREVER and is one of the only blushes Ive had that doesn't shatter into a million pieces all over my floor. Ill definitely buy again, and would recommended this to anyone that wants to look gorgeous without looking like they're trying : )
I ordered this for my 500 point perk. So dissapointed that I wasted my points on this. I am fair skinned and you can barely see this on me. Don't understand all the hype????
Love this product, great texture, pretty color, long lasting, ver natural flush.

I'm a sucker for beautiful packaging, which is the first thing that drew me to Benefits product line. $28 is more than I would normally spend for blush‚Äî so I was very critical of the actual product when I tried it. I loved it, the color is perfect for fair to medium skin, smooth and pretty. The brush is high quality. The blush, never cracks or breaks, wears well and lasts about 5-6 months (and I use it almost daily.) The box lasts forever as I repurpose it. It's too cute to toss out.I've had several of my friends try it and are now repeat customers. It's just right!

This is one of my go to blushes. It;s so soft and pretty. For my skintone, it looks more like I have a natural flush, like I've just come in from the cold. I've also used it to brighten my complexion on blah days by very lightly ocering my t zone with it. It's a good blush to use with a really dramatic smokey eye or bold lip color. It's flattering and pretty, but soft enough not to compete with heavier makeup looks.
I love this product. It's the only blush I'll use. It works on eyelids too, over shadow, just adding a lovely muted tone.

reviews.review_title: just a little bit disappointing T.T
reviews.review_text: I have light-medium skin color, yellowish skin tone. This product does not show much as i excepted. A little bit disappointed. If you have medium, dark skin i suggest you to use it as a highlighter for the face. I use this product mainly for my t-zone. It works great for that or when i wear a cream blush, i use Dandelion to set the cream blush but thats the only reason i use this blush.
i finally found a blush that i love... it gives me a healthy glow and makes my skin look totally flawless.

Recived this for beauty insider points. I have my summer skin tone right now but im using it as a highlighter till winter when I will use it for blush. Nice pink only downside I think it looks best on just the apples of the cheeks and not the the cheek bones

This is my absolute FAVORITE blush! I wear it everyday for school and it gives color to my cheeks without making me look too done or like i'm wearing blush at all even! a must have in my collection :) absolutely love it. and it smells great! love all the benefit boxed powders.
I took a chance and purchased this with my Insider points, and I am glad I did. I love this product. I use it by itself and with other blush.

This has to be the best of the benefit boxed powders! Because it can duo as a highlight or blush! It just depends how you apply it. I was weary spending my points online, never testing this product. But I'm very happy. Pick this up if you have sown points!
Gives a pale rosy pink color to my fair skin. There's a little shimmer in it, but I didn't notice it on my skin. Price is ok because you get a lot of product. This should last me at least 2 years.
The highlighting powder is a gorgeous addition to the face! And the packaging is adorable

Normally I stay away from shimmery blushes because they don't wear well on my oily skin, but I love this! The pink is very neutral and flattering, and there's only a hint of shimmer when it's on. When I'm in a rush, I also sweep this over my eye lids instead of playing with shadows.
This is without a doubt the most gorgeous and long-wearing blush I've ever owned! Absolutely LOVE it!
I have used Dandelion for years...it's perfect for a little pick-me-up. Especially for us fairskined girls...and it smells devine.

I got Dandelion as my 500 pt. perk. I love the pinky-gold color of it! I have very fair skin and if a product has too much gold or bronze in it, I tend to look a little dirty/orange, but not with this! I've tried it as my blush but now I think I'm going to switch to using it as my all-over face highlighter. The only downside I would say is the fact that if you layer a little more on your cheeks for a pop of color, I feel it starts to look powdery. I even wiped some of it off and used a clean brush to buff the rest into my skin, in an effort to combat the powdery effect, but it didn't work that well. I can see the product clinging to my peach fuzz and that is a no-no for me. I use Bobbi Brown blush in Apricot daily, and I like it better because it's pressed very hard so it doesn't get powdery, no matter how much you apply. I'm still going to use this product, I do like it. However; I am a little dissapointed with the way it applies because the color it gives is so pretty! I think it would compliment any skin tone and give that perfect dewy flush.

reviews.review_title: best blush I have ever owned
reviews.review_text: forever ago from benefit I bought the Throb blush, which I think they stopped making and I was stubborn about getting a new color because I am so fair skinned. I had that blush for about two years or maybe longer and it wasn't even over yet. I love that about benefit blushes, it seems like a lot of money but it's super quality and long lasting. I got the deluxe sample of Coralista and really liked it but had too much gold in it for me to have it as a daily blush. I danced around getting it for months and I love it. It compliments my skin so perfectly. I look natural and awake and not over-powered. The brush that's included is really good and I love that there's a mirror in the tops now. If you're on the fence about this one, I wouldn't hesitate.

this is 100% my everyday, go-to powder. it perks up my complexion and makes me look pretty and polished at any time of day. so easy to apply and impossible to overdo, and the packaging is adorable! i can't say enough good things about this.
This is my first Benefit boxed powder & I 'm addicted to it . I have extremely fair skin with pink undertones and this is the perfect natural pink blush , it 's impossible to overdo .

reviews.review_title: A staple in my makeup kit for 8 years running
reviews.review_text: Bought this for the first time in 2003 and haven't let myself run out or switch yet. It is the *perfect* blush - in fact, it doesn't get any better. Summer, winter, it doesn't matter! LOVE IT!

reviews.review_title: Too chalky. to light. and im nc25
reviews.review_text: im not tan but im not fair i have normal yellow understones and this doesnt really show up. i got it as a perk i hgihly enjoy coralista its one of my fav blusshes this can be use as a highlight but i should have to compensate.
easy to handle.. and the smell is good!

This is my official go to blush! I have tried so many blushes from Coralista to Orgasm to various different MACs. Don't get me wrong, I have liked all of them, but never felt like I could ever say wow, I really like this blush. I have been debating on buying Dandelion for a while and finally bit the bullet and I'm so glad I did! It gives me the perfect flushed, natural look. It's easy to use so even if you are heavy handed, it's usually okay because it's fairly subtle, however is definitely buildable if needed. I'm so glad I decided to purchase this product and highly recommend! For reference, I am NC25.

reviews.review_title: I love Benefit, but hate this
reviews.review_text: Benefit is one of my favorite makeup lines out there. But this product just didn't do anything for me. I have pale skin, so thought this would be a great highlighting powder, but I couldn't even tell it was on. One of the few products I've ended up returning.

The color is fantastic -- loved the brush, a really good and soft one - only reason I didn't give 5 stars was it doesn't last too long. But did I say I'm crazy about the color and the finish look-so natural!

reviews.review_title: Lasts forever, but not much color
reviews.review_text: I have had this product ever since December of 2007. This blush has lasted me forever and I've yet to hit pan. The product claims to be a HIGHLIGHTING powder, not a blush. When you put the powder on your face, there is a slight pink shimmer, but other than that, nothing special. The staying power of the product... it fades very easily. Other than that, this powder smells very nice and does make you look more awake; however, I'm not sure if I would repurchase this product again.

reviews.review_title: good blush/highlighter depending on your skintone
reviews.review_text: i adore every Benefit boxed powder, and this one is no exception. just like the others it is long lasting, super pigmented, satiny, natural looking and a beautiful color. on me it works as a blush since i am so pale, and gives me a nice pink glow. but on deeper skin tones, you could use this as a highlighter and still get great results. just another great product from benefit :)
This is a really cute blush and I think works for almost every skin tone! My only down fall is that it doesn't last that long as I hoped it would.

I have been using this blush for about 10 years. I absolutely love it. It has just the right color pink for me. People always ask me how I get my color so right all the time. Love Dandelion.... Do not hesitate to buy this.
I love this product, makes applying blush, which sometimes is daunting, a simple task and the color is as subtle and natural as baby cheeks!

When I bought this, I was so excited to put it on (I had been putting samples on every time I visited the store) and finally have a little box of my own. And by little, I mean LITTLE. I'm scared that one day I'll just dry the whole thing out within 2 weeks of purchasing it.  But, it does boost my self-confidence, and it DID give my face a luminous glow while also adding a nice flush of color. I have medium, fair/tan skin, and it goes very well. Though, for a cheaper alternative ($28 is a LITTLE much for this sort of thing) I would just use light blush.
This blush is a perfect everyday blush. It gives me that cute pink glow, very beautiful blush.

I didn't go seeking out Dandelion. In fact, I don't typically use Benefit's products. It's nothing against Benefit, I'm just one of those people who finds a brand I like for something and I stick to it (i.e. lipsticks all come from Buxom, eyeshadows from Urban Decay and Kat von D, etc). Then I decided to get the Benefit little looks 500 pt perk in store a week or so ago. It had a mini badgal mascara, a mini that gal and a full sized dandelion.  I had actually been considering looking for a lighter, pinker blush. I typically use Nars Lovejoy on the recommendation of one of the girls at my local store but as I got more color into the summer it wasn't standing out much on my skin. I wanted something light but that would stand out. Dandelion, my accidental find, did just that. I have a light-to-medium skin tone and it really does run that gamut depending on the time of year and the amount of sunlight I've been seeing.  Dandelion is a very subtle, pretty pink when I use it as a blush. It stands out just enough for me to notice it but not enough for it to draw attention to itself. It both brightens my face up and adds that hint of color that makes me look happier. I may very well be in love.
Light amount will give you beautiful highlight to your face, add on the amount and use it as blush!! Either way the color is beautiful!

I have used he Benefit bronzing & highlighting face powder duo as blush for the last couple of years, however I decided to buy Dandelion on my last trip to Sephora and have used it every day since. I am very happy with the natural finish on my very fair skin. Highly recommend!

I purchased this product after I read that Isla Fischer (the redhead from Wedding Crashers) uses it as a blush. I have a skin tone that is not quite as light as hers, but still pretty fair. Unfortunately for me, this shade is a little too close to the color of my skin. Since the product is so sheer, that means I have to apply a ton to make it look like a blush. For the longest time, I thought the product wouldn't work for me since I was only using the brush it came with. Recently, I've discovered that using a very dense, tiny kabuki brush gives me enough product for it to show up as a blush. As a blush it has a nice luminescence, since it's just shimmery enough (never glittery). Conversely, if I use an enormous powder brush, it is sheer enough that I can use it as an all-over highlighter. I love the brush itself, both the design and the quality, but I simply can't get it to work with this product on me. Unfortunately, that means that it isn't as portable for my purposes (I have to bring along an extra brush). I do love the feel of the brush, so I'll probably start using it with a light bronzer.  Overall, I think the boxed powder collection idea is great. The products are incredibly portable, the quality is excellent, and the smell is lovely. Also, even with daily use, they will last you forever. I'm just not 100% sure about this color. My mom uses the Coralista blush, and whenever I've borrowed it from her, I've been very impressed. In retrospect, rather than choosing a product that works as both a blush and a luminizer, I wish I'd gotten one of each. While this product serves both purposes, I don't feel that it does either exceptionally well. Instead, I'd call it a decent blush and a decent luminizer (in my case, only when I'm not using the brush that it came with). Of course, everyone's skin is different, so I'm sure there are women who look phenomenal in this. Even if you don't love it this color, I would definitely recommend looking into the boxed powder collection.
Works great as a blush. Very shimmery and pretty :)

Benefit's Dandelion is a powder that everyone can enjoy, no matter what their age or skin tone. It's a lovely pink pressed highlighting powder. A single stroke of the excellent brush that comes with the powder gives my skin a beautiful look. Since it highlights, it detracts from and disguises any skin imperfections. And for those of us over 30, it takes back time. I can't say for sure if it's the pure innocent pink color, or perhaps something more difficult to define, but even when I apply it ever so lightly on my pale skin, my skin looks younger and radiant.  Sometimes I use Dandelion over Benefit's That Gal primer and sometimes I use it alone. Either way, I'm very happy with the results. My skin looks fresh and young. It's wonderful that such transformations can come from a box of powder.  Dandelion is one of the best powders available. It works well with my pale complexion, and can be layered for even more depth. I also like to layer it over a pale bronze primer in summer, so that I end up with a little bit of natural color. Dandelion can be the beginning of so many styles. I've used Dandelion now for about three years. I know I can depend on it to make me look great no matter what the season or event.
love this, smellsd lovely, apply a sheer smear or build it up, i always look healthy and get great compliments when i have this product on
A pretty touch of color and it smells great! Like fresh cut flowers. My only complaint is the box is weird since it's small and deep. It just feels hard to sweep the brush around. But not a big deal.

I love this sheer pinkish powder around my forehead and across my cheeks, especially in the winter. It is light, so it doesn't quite have the same effect after I've got some color in the summer. Always love the square brush, too!
I love this product and color. I use this everyday and adds the right amount of color, it never let's me over do it. It is also good for the ladies over 50

I would consider myself really fair skinned and I have freckles and some yellow asian skin tones since I am half asian so I was seeking a blush that would suit my skin tone and not make me look clownish if you know what I mean. This blush is amazing. It smells yummy, is sheer so you can build the coverage and shows up really well on my skin. It gives me a rosy glow that doesn't look overdone and the shimmer is barely noticeable. I can wear this blush with any makeup look and it works so I am happy its such a versatile product.  My own gripe is the box, its adorable but I would have preferred an old fashioned pan like regular blushes come in as that would make it easier to get the product. I also tossed the brush as I find a bigger fluffier brush that I got from Quo works way better and is more functional.
This is my second purchase of this product and I love it! It goes on just right with the little brush and the color is a nice flush of pink. You can't overdo it with this one!
I have a lot of benefit products that I love. This one did not work for my skin tone. Had to return

I found a review of this blush on a blog post about makeup for girls with fair skin. Although its a little bit pricier than other blushes, I love it. I just bought my second box. The color is perfect for my ivory skin, it gives a real natural pink to your cheeks and it smells really good. I wouldn't suggest using the brush that comes with the blush, I never do. I use a Kabuki brush (like this one:http://www.sephora.com/browse/product.jhtml?id=P179927&categoryId=B70) and this works much better for me. Also, the blush last quite a long time. I use mine almost every day and it's lasted close to a year.

reviews.review_title: watch out if you have dark skin
reviews.review_text: I'm asian(korean) with darker skin than normal population  pros: - box's cute, color's very cute and shimmery - makes you want to really use it  cons: - doesn't work... - ultra-mega-omg-crazily smudge the thing onto your cheeks and it still won't show up... (unless you have fair/light skin) - at the end of the crazy smudging, your cheeks are flaking with white (not pink!) powers.... - makes you sad to realize the reality of having dark skin

I love this product. I've been using it for several weeks, and I think it's a really solid product. It doesn't have too much shimmer, but it definitely gives me a little something extra. I like to use it on days where I'm not too dramatic with my makeup.  I think the packaging is adorable, the color is beautiful and overall I really like it.

This is a great highlighting powder/blush. I use it to give myself a healthy glow when I am wearing very little makeup and I've used it with a full face of makeup on. I love the shape of the brush as it really helps with an even, natural application. Don't be put off by it being too pink. It really just provides a nice, healthy glow. I have fair skin with a pinkish undertone....normally, any shade of pink looks over-exaggerated on me. Not this one. It looks natural and it stays on for a fair amount of time. Very happy!

I simply love this product.. The colour is perfect on my pale fair skin. As soon as I swept it on, I loved the effect of softness and the subtle glow on my cheeks. I think the packaging is beauitful and unique. I actually like the brush, then I use my big round brush to buff. Instant glow!

I'd been using the same Clinique blush for almost ten years, so I figured it was time to try something new. I tried many different blushes, but most of them were not flattering for my extremely fair complexion. But Dandelion was absolutely PERFECT! It gives a subtle rosy glow that looks so natural, even on someone as pale as me. I love the light pink color. I'm not a fan of modern coral-colored blushes because I have a more classic style and I prefer a more pinkish hue. The ballerina pink color of Dandelion is ideal. These boxed powders by Benefit are top quality, smell great, and since you get a lot of product, they're totally worth the expensive price. I know I'll be able to use this blush for years. The only thing I don't like about it is the brush it comes with. In my opinion, the brush it comes with is too wide for the precision application I like, so I use my Bare Escentuals blush brush instead.

I love this product. I'm at white as they come so i need really soft pinks and this 1 is perfect! The packaging is adorable and the product is really great. However, I gave the brush it came with 2 my 4 year old sister 2 play with. I don't recommend using the brush it comes with.

reviews.review_title: product is okay, packaging is NOT okay
reviews.review_text: It's a pretty baby pink blush with soft shimmer product.  I have asian light to medium skin tone and it doesn't show very much on my skin, but it looks natural.  I never use the brush included, I don't think it's very good quality.  The paper box packaging is not sturdy at all. Don't ever put it in your bath room or carry it around in your bag. It will easily be ruined. It's made to sit in a safe & dry area looking pretty.
I wear this over the Dallas powder from Benefit...It gives it just the right amount of glow without being shiny or oily looking..Stays on very nicely. Will be buying again!
I love this product. I use it everyday and it really brighten's my face!
Maybe it's just awesome packaging, but I am not sure if I would want to live in a world without Dandelion.

reviews.review_title: Love the product HATE NEW PACKAGING
reviews.review_text: I love these Benefit Box o' Powders but hate their new packaging with the mirror! I haven't seen the new packging for these powders yet but if they're like the Bellabamba, then it's cheap, thin paper quality! It's so flimsy, unlike before, it's a more sturdy card-board like material that wont bend out of shape easily. The mirror isn't a very good quality one, either, like it's made of plastic? But most importantly, Benefit has DECREASED the amount of product you get in each box! Some that were 0.42oz are now 0.28oz! They shouldn't have done that. And we all know, after each repackage, they're bound to raise the prices....again.
Love this color and the cute box. It would be better if the brush quality is better. But I ususlly use my own blush brush, so it doesn't bother me very much.
This is one of my favorite blush color. Love it.
The pink color looks very natural on face. A little goes a long way. The smell of it is also great.
It smells good, and looks natural

i lovee this product so far! its natural, subtle, and girly! it's exactly what i was looking for. (i'd previously purchased moonbeam and it was too obvious and pearly colored, i definitely wanted something more subtle.) i love this product, i'm just waiting to see how long it lasts throughout the day.
My daughter has fair and sensitive skin. This blusher is one which adds a natural glow to he face without making it look fake. It has a soft visual impact.
it is the best. I love it more than NARS. It can make u soooo cute!

reviews.review_title: This is not supposed to be a blush!
reviews.review_text: Unless you have very very fair skin, this is not to be used as a blush. I use this product over my regular bronzer and blush. It gives me a flawless look. I also use it as a refresher at the end of the day if my makeup is starting to look a little splotchy, or on a hot day if my makeup is running. It really evens out my color and freshens up my face. It could also be good for those mornings when you want to look awake without looking like you're wearing any makeup. The best thing about this product is you can never put on too much, so it's something you can sweep over your face without even looking.

This blush is perfect for my skin! I have a fair skintone with cool undertones, and this is perfect for me! It is pretty and certainly makes me look awake, but it is not dramatic, which is what I want! There is also a shimmer, but the shimmer is not overwhelming or glittery. Love it!
I have light-olivey skin and this stuff barely shows up on me. It gives me a slight, pink color but that's about it. I think it'd be good for a very light, sheer makeup day.
it does give a slight glow. i apply allover as a finishing powder but i dont put very much. it also appears to help with my oily t-zone.

The perfect blush for a soft touch of summer. Use alone during the day for a natural glow or as a highlighter of a bronzer to soften the look and reduce excess color or an muddy appearance. Great as a highlighter over a darker color for glamorous evening wear.
If you don't want a bronzer this powder really does brighten your complex.
Iv'e tried many others, but I keep coming back to this one. Oh how I wish I didn't have to drop $30 for blush, but alas you get what you pay for. . . :)

reviews.review_title: Not too light, dark, or shimmery
reviews.review_text: I have always been afraid of blush and bronzers. I am pale with sometimes red/irritated cheeks.. so the last thing I want to do is make them look even more red. This however gives just a bit of color and a nice healthy glow! This is the 2nd time I have purchased this item.

I can't imagine how any of you are using this as a blush; I have fair skin and it barely showed up on me. Meanwhile it's too dark to use as a luminizer, and I didn't notice a brightening effect either.  I didn't give it one star because it wasn't actively terrible, it just didn't do much of anything. I rarely return anything to Sephora, but this one's going back.  I will say, though, that the packaging is lovely.
Love this stuff. I use it in winter as a regular finishing powder. Great coverage, great color. It's a keeper for me! No breakouts from it even though I have sensitive skin.
this is great for a natural look! the color is a light baby pink so it doesn't look heavy. smells like perfumed flowers. can be strong at times but not bad or annoying.

I bought this product after reading a review that it would work great as a highlighter instead of purchasing the regular produt I use by the same company. Dandelion does produce a nice light pink slightly shimmer color, for me however it is better suited as a blusher on my fair skin on an everyday basis, I did not care for it in place of the Moonbeam product.

I loved the packaging and color of this blush in the store, but it was too sheer on me to show up well (and I'm very fair). It also did not work as a brightening powder. If it cost less, I might have kept it as a very sheer blush, but not for $28. I returned mine. Also, the brush was completely useless.

I've been using Dandelion for a few years now. I thought I'd grow bored with it and try something different, but for me no other highlighter comes close, whether liquid or powder, including that other one that Benefit makes (Highbeam?).  This goes on VERY sheer, it absolutely doesn't leave any evidence of powder on your face. And NO glitter/sparkles which is fantastic. I have a medium skin tone so I actually use it all over my face (minus my nose because it's sometimes pinkish already). It gives me a really natural-looking, subtle glow.  Another bonus: A box of this wonder powder lasts over a year even for a full-face, daily user like me.
very pretty on my pale skin. the color is such a nice pink.

Until about a year ago I never wore blush because I simply could not find a color that was natural not garish on my fair freckled skin. Benefit's Dandelion is fantastic! It is buildable, so works with my skin as a blush year round. I have tried it as an all-over finishing powder, which I found to be a bit much. But as a blush for fair skin it is wonderful!
Gives a nice, pretty tone! I love the smell too. I don't like the brush at all though. It is kind of pricey but worth it, I think.

reviews.review_title: Great scent, beautiful color, adorable packaging.
reviews.review_text: The color is a slight darker pink than indicated by the photo, but it is still a sheer buildable color. I have used as a blush (very pretty with my light skin, and very natural looking) and as a finishing powder (not a fan, but to each their own). The smell of this powder is fantastic! A light perfumed scent that makes me look forward to putting it on each morning :) I gave it four stars because of how little product was included. **The box is not even half full of product**... still, a great buy.

I brush this powder on lightly after applying my foundation. It gives my skin a wonderful tone and doesn't look fake or unnatural in any way. Highly recommend and I do like the little brush that comes with it - it works perfectly with the box!

I have oily skin and do not like my cheeks looking oily with shimmer. i use this only as a blush i absolutely love this color because it is light and i can build it up a bit and is not too shimmery. i love the smell of it.
when you use this, you will be very cute,just like a apple.
loved it. every one is asking to me what did you use? makes me feel so happy look good on everyday every type of make up. love it!
Very light, pale pink powder that brightened my face. I use it with a little Bella Bamba for more definition, I would recommend this if you are looking for a light color that brightens.
I love this powder! As a busy mom I really appreciate how this makes my skin look. I love this product and it has become a staple to my morning routine.
i think its really cute because it's so soft and pretty. i love wearing it and it smells great too. try it! brush works best for it too

I love this blush. I have tried so many blushes to get the right one and always come back to this one. I am 45, light skin with yellow undertones, auburn hair and green eyes. Most pinks don't look that great on me but this one is perfect! It's the perfect blush for every skin tone and coloring. Leaves a nice natural glow without being too pink and cakey. Sometimes I don't even wear any makeup but this blush! it gives just the right amount of color!
Love it....use it every day, a little on my eyes and a little on my cheeks!
Beautiful, color with a subtle but lovely scent, I feel like it makes me look fresh and youthful! Great packaging. Very happy with this purchase.

Dandelion pink pressed highlighting powder is perfect for a quick pick-me-up or if you need something over moisturizer! This is my favorite Benefit product and it's definitely a can't live without one!

love, love this product. it gives such a doll like yet natural blushing to my cheeks. and its very high pigmented, i just need to sweep it once and shake off the excess, then apply. i feel like this is going to last me a long, long time. a very beautiful color for my fair skin!

I love this stuff. I'm extremely pale and cool-toned, so it's the perfect shade of pink for me to use as blush.  Whether you use it as blush or luminizer, it looks gorgeous, not too shimmery or heavy. Highly recommend.
If you want to use this a blush, I would not recommend it, but if you are looking for an al over glow this is the one to purchase.  Long lasting , and natural looking.
beautiful color to make you feel young again. I love it.
I've been using this for a year or so, and I absolutly love it! Looks awesome and even smells good (:
i like this color. i apply this on my cheek with one simple touching. it looks lovely. i recommend especially for asian skin type.

This is the first benefit cosmetics product I bought and I absolutely love it. The color is great for fair skinned girls like me or even if you just want a subtle glow. Plus, the packaging, the size, the brush- even the name- is just too cute. Even though it's a little expensive I think this blush will last long.

Love this stuff. I really can't find anything else like it (and I've tried). The color is so pretty and it has a nice scent too.  The price seems high, but it lasts forever so it's worth it. I don't wear much makeup so I just put a bit all over. I would not consider it a blush, more of a finishing powder.  One thing to add - don't buy this product on Ebay. Though the lower price is tempting, the product will most likely be a fake!

I love the shade of pink! Very soft and feminine in color. Just the right natural hint of color on fair skin. I use mine as a blush, and it really brightens my face!  I also love the smell, and the texture of this powder!

This product claims to be a luminizer, but on pale skin it makes the perfect blush. I've been happily using NARS Orgasm blush for a year, but I found it to be a little to peachy for every day. This pink color of this blush is really subtle and beautiful on my skin. It also smells like roses. I love it!

I've been using Dandelion on a daily basis for about 5 years. I have very fair skin and this gives my face a healthy glow. It's a subtle powder that you can build in layers if you desire more color or use in conjunction with another blush. I love it with Benefit's CORALista. These 2 together are a pale Irish girls best friend! Ditch the tiny brush and use them with a good quality blush brush.

for the first two months of using the blush it was great, made me look awake , perfect amount of pink and it was absolutely the longest lasting blush i've had but midway to the bottom of the blush it started to lose pigment and seemed to not last as long and definately was losing the effect it had at the beginning overall an amazing blush just be prepared to buy a new one just before the old one runs out..its definately worth the money

I bought this years ago when Benefit first introduced it.. and just bought it again. I really like this highlighting powder, i put it on above my cheekbones (after & above my bronzer) & under my eyes to give myself a nice awake look. I also use it as an eyeshadow base. I would of given it 5 stars but the brush has a tendency to leave bristles behind on my face, so i have to almost always go back and sweep them off..but the brush is nice & soft. I don't think it has a lot of shimmer (which i like), Just a nice natural glow.
really cute pink color. It does help me have a natural and healthy look. Meanwhile it has a little shining in it..

reviews.review_title: Perfect Shade for us Paler Gals
reviews.review_text: I stumbled across this when i was looking for a new blush and gave it a shot. I LOVE THIS STUFF! I'm very fair but also have olivey tones so some colors look weird. Most pinks are way to bright and peaches look more like orange mixed with my olive undertones. This looks great combined with bronzer all dolled up or is great to throw on in the early mornings with no other makeup just to look refreshed. The little box is easy to throw in a purse or clutch, especially because it comes with a brush. The only thing I dont like about the box-shaped holder is that once you get down to the end there is only stuff left in the corners. Here's the easy fix - take a Q-tip and just break it off so it's in loose pieces and that little bit will last you for another week or two.

I don't know about 'luminizer' since I use this as a blush, but it's a great blush to add a healthy glow. A beautiful color that I think will be great on any complexion. I've used this as a brunette, dirty blonde, and coppery redhead and it was complementary with all of them. I also *love* that it smells like roses!
Amazing, i love this, it works really well, i would highly recommend it! only thing is that the brush is not my favorite, it works but if you have your own use that instead
I thought in the pic this looked a little too bright, but bought it anyway. I tried it on and it is a very pretty pink not scary at all.

A lot of my friends have gotten married. This is the perfect powder for formal occasions, It looks natural and doesn't overpower. The brush is nice, too. I like how it comes boxed. It's looks beautiful on and it's more low key that my other Benefit favorite.

I bought this one thinking it was to be used as described (a highlighting powder). It's not. I actually seems to make me look more red than pink. I have fair skin with cool undertones. I thought this pink would be good. It's fine on my cheeks as a blush. It is NOT a highlighter unless I want to highlight my rosacea. There is no shimmer. It has a funny smell. Flowery but not really pleasant. Kind of how a dandelion smells like dirt. ;) I will use up the box eventually, but won't be purchasing it again.
LOVE IT! I was worried about how the color would look on my olive skin, but I use dandelion every day now! It definitely gives your skin that 'pop' and instantly gives you that fresh-&-awake glow :)
This blush is perfect! It gives me the perfect flus, and looks natural and fresh. Its a perfect sparkly pink. Plus it smells good!

This is my favorite blush. I have used it consistently for 8 years and I'm only on my fourth box. This stuff lasts a long time. It's a pretty pink on my fair skin and looks very natural. Definitely my go to blush for an everyday casual look.

I had been scrapping the last little bit out of a Clinique blush but decided to try this instead, what a good idea! I love this blush, perfect light color for my fair skin, a very small amount of shimmer, lasts all day.

I absolutely love this product! The first time that I used it, everyone instantly thought I looked so great. This petal pink absolutely brightens your whole face up and I would definately recommend this product to anyone! Trust me, you will not be disappointed!

This product has a very nice smell. I gave it 4 because it doesn't exactly give me what I am looking for. Maybe because its in the form of pressed powder. I am looking for a dewy moisturized look. Just bought moon beam, if that one turned out good maybe will buy high beam. Girl meets pearl seems like worth a try too.

This used to be my favorite blush, and it still is my mom's favorite blush. I'm 22 and she's 47 and it looks good and appropriate on both of us, it's really subtle and perfect as everyday bush. The gold shimmer makes my apples look glowy. I do not carry this in my purse though, because it's too big to fit in my purse and the paper package wears off easily. The only thing I don't like about box-o-powders are the brushes. I think the quality is too bad, it works best for the hard texture. The problem is I can never wash the brush!

I bought this expecting to use it as a highlighter, but for me I can actually use this as a blush. I should say though that I am SUPER pale, so for those of you with a darker skin tone, DEFINITELY test this before you buy it, lest you find out that it won't show up on your skin at all. It's a nice blush for me, a pretty soft pink, but for a highlighter I would try the Benefit High Beam, my best friend swears by it and it looks lovely on the cheekbones for all skin tones (including us pale girls!!)

I adore the glow this pinkish powder with subtle (and I do mean SUBTLE - thank you, Cheezus!) golden shimmer imparts. It's way too pale to be considered a blusher (my intent when I first purchased. I know, I know- DUH! Little did I know!), but it's a gorgeous highlighter and all-over face brightener. I'd never used a product like this before and had no idea the benefit (har har!) it could impart. I feel fresher and more *alive* looking.... It's like a couple cups of morning coffee for your complexion, with no nasty caffeine jitter side-effects! ;)  The ONLY thing that I wish was that this product was a little more highly pigmented. Sometimes it feels like it takes a lot of sweeps to achieve the look that I want, and I am very pale complected!  If you've never tried this kind of product, I urge you to try it and see how it transforms your face. I think you will be pleasantly surprised, like I was! :)
I have dark skin, so this product did not show up on my skin at all, ver bummed. Its a beautiful color and the light sparkle is perfect, just not for me. I returned it.
very soft and natural looking
i love this product. it is my favorite blush well its a highlighter but i use it as blush and i absolutely love it.

I have been buying this product for years, and went back to by Georgia. It was out in the store, so I bought Dandelion but with some hesitation. I LOVE the color, it looks flawless and is so light on my skin that it looks like I have no makeup on at all.

I love how natural this one looks in my skin, it gives me this glowing look that I love.  People can't help complimenting me about how beautiful I look, they just don't know that Benefit Dandelion is my secret.;)

This creates a nice natural , sweet look. I like to wear this on days where i don't feel like wearing much makeup. I originally bought it thinking it was a blush but it is a highligting power so it doesn't really have buildable coverage.
I love this stuff, and i use it on my eyelids too from time to time. It just glimmers there, not obvious, but it makes such a big difference in terms of the brightness of my complexion.

I am very fair and this is one of my favorite blushes. If you are fair to light/medium I think you will love this. It might not show up on darker skin tones so you would probably have to try it out in store.

I've been looking for the best pink color for my cheeks for the longest time. This color is great for fair and light skinned girls. If you have darker skin I wouldn't recommend. But for me this color is great. I love to wear this color to work without looking like I have a lot of makeup on. It is very natural and I love it.

I have been using this blush for two years, the color is pretty light so it doesn't really show much on my skin which is exactly what I'm looking for. I usually wear netual eyeshadows and this blush goes along very well with my everyday makeup, perfect for office.

I was holding off on buying this blush for the longest time, because I thought the color would be too light to show up. But to my greatest surprise, there is just enough color to make a soft and beautiful blush. During the dry winter season, I don't use powder and only use foundation or tinted moisturizer. This powder works flawlessly on top of those! The result, porcelain smooth cheeks. So beautiful!
I am pale and this works wonderfully...does not give a strange look...just a natural glow!
On ultra light complections it gives just a hint of natural looking color.

I swear by this stuff. I'm 28. I look 33 when I roll out of bed. I brush this on and voila! 23 and naturally radiant! With my super fair skin this is my foundation AND luminizer AND setting powder. If Benefit ever stops making this...well...

I've owned this for over a year and while I like it, it's a bit too subtle for my everyday usage.  It does give the skin a nice bit of color, perfect for a trip to the grocery store or the mall. But if you need a more finished face (for the professional world or a night out) then I would skip over this product.  I like this product and if I were still in college I would probably need to replace it every 6 months. However, I'm not still in college (*sigh*) and won't be buying this again - won't need to anyway, as there is still a ton left in the package.  One word of advise - give the brush to your nieces to play with or use it to create faux finishes on your craft projects cause it's not worth a hill of beans to apply the product.
It's a great natural looking blush that puts just the right amount of luster to your complexion. The light scent is fantastic as well. This is my second one!

In my late 30s, I need a little dose of magic. When I wear dandelion, people always say I look great or that color (whatever top I'm wearing) looks good on me, or I look young, or whatever. It just gives you that little something extra. I usually use it all over, sometimes as blush, but usually more like a bronzer or even in combination with a bronzer. Sometimes I wear it alone with primer.

I love Dandelion! I have dark brown hair/very fair skin and this powder gives me a perfect, natural-looking pink glow. I love to try new things, but I always wind up coming back to this one - it's become a staple in my makeup bag. The box it comes in is really cute, but I find the brush pretty useless.....it doesn't distribute the powder very evenly so I just use my regular, full-szie blush brush.

I'm not sure how this color would show on medium to dark skintones but for very fair to light-medium, this color is perfect and it looks incredibly natural! I have very fair skin and when applying this blush, I don't have to worry about a specific brush to use or the amount I put on. The pigmentation is intense but the color is just like the natural flush people get from body heat/blood circulation, so no worries about over-applying :) It is very long-lasting as well, just like all other Benefit blushes.
I have been buying this blush for the past several years and have found that it is the only blush I need. The color is so fresh and natural that is goes with everything. I love it!
This is the best shade I have ever found for my skin which is fair. I always feel beautiful when I wear it. It looks so natural and adds just the right amount of color.
brightens my complexion, a great light pinky color. Not too severe for day and makes me look awake after long nights! will purchase again!
i like it very much. the color very natural made my face look brighter

I wanted to like this product, I really did! It's in a cute package, smells nice, and I loved other reviewer's descriptions of a fresher face. Maybe I had the wrong expections--was hoping for a general luminizer. Dandelion for me was more like a pale blush that was the wrong shade (I'm a medium golden complexion). Oh well, I'll keep looking.

I loved the color and saw this in a magazine on a celeb and it looked gorgeous so I decided to purchase it. Well, after I applied what I thought was a good amount on each cheek, I couldn't even see anything! Idk I'm not applying it good, but I think this would work best on fair skin. My skin is a light yet golden color if that makes sense so I couldn't really see it. I love the bubblegum pink color but too bad I couldn't see it. Also, the product sheds the blush alot once the little brush hits it so you dont need that much.

Well. I had HIGH expectations for this due to the price. A huge amout of product comes in the packaging, and the packaging is cute. I personally like the brush and it deposits a good amount of color. not too much. The color is pretty and nicely pink. I loke it, but i would like a little more wow factor with a product this pricey.
At first it doesn't seem to do much but in the right light it's like WOW!!! Bright look!!
this blush is so perfect because of how natural and buildable it is. its goes on smooth and smells qite nice
sheer and lovely! Will purchase again! Not too pink for fair, med 44 yr old skin!
This product does not last long, it looks very good in the first hour after application, but then seems to fade. also The brush is a little rougher than I would prefer.
This powder is a great color for blush or an all over glow
A staple for me. I wear it over Nars for a highlighting effect.
Love this pink pick-me-up! Flatters my skin no end!
LOVE LOVE LOVE the smell of this powder!!
I love this blush... it gives you a nice color on the cheeks... it does look so natural And i do use the brush ! The brush is really good for sure i will keep it after i will be done with my box.

This product truly does what it says. I am hooked on its natural brightening qualities. I work very early in the morning, and with just one swipe of this it brightens my skin tone, making my complexion appear less dull and more ready for the day. The shimmer is very slight and when layered over foundation or tinted moisturizer it just brightens the skin to the perfect tone, without looking too shimmery. I will definitely be purchasing this product again. Also, an added bonus for me, it seems to control oil on my face throughout the day!

i bought this thinking to use it as an all over face poweder, just a light finish on top of my tinited moisturizer, but after a month of the se , i decided that i didn't like it too much  i like the pretty sparkly finish it gives and the smell is sorta pleasant but i think it's sort of on the pricy side.. i'mma return it when i can get too a sephora.. and in case your wondering i'm asain and the color was very sheer and didn't really show up on the skin. it gave my skin a sorta of matte satiny sparkly finish i like it bt yeah not that worth it...

I've used many different brands of similarly colored-blush, and this is one I always return to. It is the perfect, natural color that gives almost any skin tone a lovely blushed look. And better yet, it last throughout the day, and the product itself will last a long time. All around, Grade A+ product!

The soft, petal pink is a versatile color that works on my light, peachy skin and my mother's medium, olive skin. The subtle shimmer can be worn alone for day, or played up with a highlighter for night. The packaging and included brush are very cute, and the powder will carry you through seasons.

Its a natural baby pink flush with a touch of peachy shimmer. It takes about two coats to show up perfectly on my medium skintone. With setting spray, mine lasts all day. Not to mention how much product you get, I haven't even dented mine and I've been using it everyday for a month! It also has a nice light scent!

I've a fair complexion, and while this appears extremely pink in person, it's a rather lovely pink flush color when applied to the apples of my cheeks. I love that natural look. It seems to really brighten up my face. It's very natural-looking, and it feels lightweight. It doesn't have the best staying power, hence four stars, but I'll just take it on the go and reapply when needed. Nice job, Benefit.

reviews.review_title: didn't light up this old face
reviews.review_text: may be good for 20s but not for 30s unless you're going for vogue chic fashion photo effect.

Very pretty on, especially with a tan but I would recommend using a toner/make-up setting spray to help it stay put. I'll probably use this up and then purchase either Posietine or High Beam to test those out instead.

I was kinda hesitant to try this at first because I'm afraid that the color might not show up on me because I have a medium skin tone. It does show up on my skin and it gives me the most natural flush. It makes me look so pretty especially in the morning. I also love the scent. This one made me hooked to benefit, maybe i'll try georgia on some other time.
It's a great all over powder when your looking pastey. It's great as a light blush. I mostly use it to highlight. It has a pretty smell as well.

I'm asian with fair light skin and i was afraid this blush would be too light after hearing stories from my friends. It actually is the perfect blend of nude pink that warms up the cheekbones. Natural soft look!!

This product is sooo amazing..i LOVE IT! i vave very fair skin and it gives me a nice soft pink healthy flush to my face. Usually blush for me is a nogo because i find they are all to dark...even the NARS orgasin is too deep for me ans they say it is perfect for egveryone. If you have fair/light skin this is a must for your collection

i'm obsessed with dandelion...it looks amazing when i'm all made up, or just getting ready for school. it really does make you look pretty at 8 in the morning! (or 6...) seriously perfect for any occasion.

i absolutely love this product. i have only been using it for about two weeks and im in love. goes on great over bronzer, foundation, anything. often times i wear it on a day i dont want to wear make up but dont want dull skin and it looks fabulous ! feels so great putting this product on your skin beautiful application on ANY skintone. what i love most is the scent ! soo fabulous !

I love this blush, I heard amazing things but i was nervous that it would be too pink. I am so happy with my purchase. It is pretty light yet shimmery so just put a good amount on, but not too much because of the shimmer. I like using my Bare Minerals Blush Brush instead because this brush is just too wide but great blush, smells good gives an amazing color and gives you such a natural flush of color. Love‚ô•

This is one of my favorite face powder. I use this when my skin seem sallow, just a LIGHT dusting on the face perks up my skintone. When I want to go for that barely there, innocent makeup look, I would use this on the apples of my cheeks and whatever that is remaining on the brush, I sweep it on my eyes. It looks so pretty. This is also very pretty paired with Benetint or Posietint.

reviews.review_title: Has become a staple for everyday
reviews.review_text: This has become my favorite light blush
It works really well. It makes my face look soft and almost angelic. I also like how the shimmer is subtle. I definitely use it every morning.
It makes my cheeks rosy with just a touch of shimmer, would look great on any skintone. Makes me look well rested even if I'm running on five hours of sleep.
I like this because it gives me a dolly look. And it looks natural on my face.

Luminizer is right, I wouldn't really call this a blush but you could use it as one.  I'm NC30 (medium-light complexion with golden undertones) and this product just came into the mail today.  ------------------ Physicals: The brush is a little harsh for me, however I am used to the too faced Kabuki brush which is very soft. However I feel that the shape of the brush works with the box and applying the product on my cheek.  The box is smaller than I thought it would be. It's about a cube an inch and a half around. The blush is deepset into the box, so I feel as though using it is somewhat awkward.  The powder is extremely soft. Softer than all the blushes I've ever purchased. ------------------ Usage:  Really pretty color! It brightens my face up! From far away, it looks like a light LUMINZER, and makes me look very awake. However if you peer into the mirror up close, the blush does not blend in with your skin, and you can tell there is a powdery material sitting on your cheeks. This is not noticible from 2 feet away.  I put it on approximentally 3 hours ago... and even ontop of foundation it no longer looks like I have it on. You can tell SOMETHING is there, however it is very faint. You will need to reapply after 3hours. For the record I have combination skin.

reviews.review_title: Subtle color -- great for very fair skin!
reviews.review_text: I don't know why it took me so long to try this -- I had heard such positive reviews. Being super fair, I'm always on the lookout for a blush / highlighter that will give me a barely there touch of color (which is a more challenging feat than it sounds!). I *love* Dandelion -- it instantly perks up my skin, making it flushed and brighter -- and it's so sheer that I don't have to worry about overapplying and having to blend. It highlights, but it's not too sparkly or shimmery. I love it...and I think this is a new staple!

This blush is gorgoeus and goes with any skin tone. i was worried about that when I bought it because pink isn't really my color but there is something about this blush that makes your cheekbones vibrant and blush and beautiful!

Gives me a nice faint pink shimmery flush and smells lovely. I love benefit boxed powders. I guess I'm giving it 4 stars and not 5 just because it is a bit pricey.  The brush is decent. I do use it, but usually I blend with a bigger, lighter brush afterwards.

This is a really pretty blush. It is a little on the pinker side, but I'm pretty pale and I don't like blushes that are so dark. I only gave it four stars though because it's sooo light. But I'm a huge fan.

I am in love with this blush right now. It has such a perfect colour of PINK, not peach, red, or and other colour. It can be used as a highliter: put it on your cheekbones, bridge of your nose, and forehead. if you prefer a more subtle look, go for just the blush: just on the cheekbones. It gives coverage, too. it's buildable, i prefer more on my cheeks, because it lasts a bit longer that way aswell. I highly reccomend this beautiful powder to everyone :)

I love this blush so much! The picture online makes it look like a sickly gray pink- but don't be deceived!  When i put it on in the morning, i instantly look awake and fresh. It has highlighting properties but its not too shimmery and overpowering. Not to mention, it smells really good, and the box keeps all the fallout! more blush for buck!  The only downside is that its not as longwear as i would like, but otherwise its a keeper! :)
I pretty much only use matte makeup which can sometimes look like a mask if I'm not careful. A splash of this adds a bit of dimension as a finisher on top of powder and blush.

i read a lot good reviews about this product. that is why i bought it. however, some people said the color was too light or it won't last for long... it works for me perfect. i am asian, so i have yellow skin tone. this light pink blush gives me natural and healthy look.
Oh, how I love this. It has a sweet, sugary scent and makes my skin look much more bright and awake. It's such a great subtle shade of pink, too. Wonderful stuff.

Years ago I bought this product and felt it was too pale of a pink for me. My skin must be getting more pale with age (sigh!), but I decided to try this again, and was so glad I did. It adds a healthy glow without broadcasting to everyone that I have blush on. I am so happy that it is not sparkly, but blends in with a light sheen. Thank you, Benefit!
This color is very natural looking. It gives a perfect glow to fair skin.
So beautiful perfect for every day. I am very fair skinned and it it very flattering!! :)
Use it after cream. Pink like you just have a good night sleep. Do not stay long though.

at first i thought that it seemed too sheer but it turned out to be just perfect for everyday wear because it gives the perfect girly baby pink cheeks! buildable and the glitter is barely visible. think it will last me a loooong time too. recommended!
First introduced to by a friend of mine... It's become my everyday-must-put-on item. It's not overpowering,which is why it's so popular I guess... It's GOOD!
Dandelion works! It gives you a nice awake look at 7am! Its not heavy but very light and such a pretty fresh pink color. Not over powering at all. I wish it was packaged in a more portable container.
This is my favorite powder and I have been using it for some time. I've tried others, but I always come back to Dandelion. It provides just the right amount of color without being overpowering
Dandelion, byBenefit is great to the skin. It's very soft powder that just gives your complection a little oomph. Love it!
Nice for an all over fresh light glow.

This is a great, straight forward pink blush. You can put a light layer for a little color & then buff a little bit more on the apples of your cheeks for more color. Some say they like the scent, but I can't really detect a scent. The only thing I don't like about it is lots of pink powder accumulates inside the little pot, which can be messy.

I love this blush it is may favorite I had gotten two other ones before to try something different, and went back to Dandelion. It looks natural and it complements me the best. I get complemented with it because it gives me radiant complexion as if I slept for 8hours. I totally recommened Dandelion its a pretty blush makes you feel like a doll lol. It doesn't break you out either.
I love this product. It's not too much, but not too little. Perfect pink shade for my cheeks and it also makes my skin glow with the subtle shimmer.

I've always been a big fan of Benefit cosmetics, but until recently I had never tried any of their cheek products before. Since I'm on a hiatus from work, I no longer have a sun kissed glow, I figured that this would be a great product to give my pregnant woman glow a pop of radiance:  Finely spun with delicate mauves and pinks, this exquisite brightening face powder leaves a petal like finish.  My Overall Thought: Two Thumbs Up! It gave me a gorgeous radiant look, and it was definitely not over powering (I have fair/light skin, so this works great).
I love this blush! I have fair pinkish skin and my daughters have light olive skin and it looks great on us both! Beautiful and natural looking.
Very soft but lovely. I will also try a shade darker in the future

Hi there! Normally, I wear Cover FX's Golden Peach as a blush during the summer as my face gets darker and Tarte's Flushed during the winter as I'm very fair-skinned when not in the sun. However, I just wanted something different and more illuminating for the coming cooler weather this year. Benefit Cosmetics has been a hit or miss with me. I LOVE Erase Paste as a concealer and I love the creme eyeshadows, but I've had some other meh moments with other Benefit products. Sooooooo...last night I ventured over to the Benefit products because I had heard some good things about Dandelion powder. (My daughter LOVES Georgia Peach). I tried both the Coralista, which was way to orange on me, and the Dandelion. Dandelion gave me such a pretty pink and natural flush and the illumination was extremely subtle so I purchased it on the spot. This morning I used it over my CoverFX Creme Foundation in C20 and am SUCH a happy camper. Where has this blush (even though they call it a powder) been all my life? This color is a keeper! No clown cheeks. Not too much color. It is just absolutely perfect! I'll tell you when Benefit gets it right, they get it right! I hope this is never discontinued!
