If you have fair skin with cool undertones, this is a beautiful blush. It does look darker in the box, but once you apply it--it just makes this lovely transformation. Oh..BTW, I used a large blush brush to apply. The brush it comes with may be cute, but it is totally useless. Benefit should just charge three dollars less for this product and d.q. the brush. Just my opinion!
I love this blush! Tried it a few years ago, & have been hooked ever since. Great color, nice light smell, & tad bit of shimmer. Perfect!
i really really like this blush! it's such a good color and it's not too orange or too pink, just right! it gives you a pretty glow and even smells good... :)
I use it as blush. The color is great on my light to medium skin. It brights my skin up. I love it.

Though it appears pale in the box, it shows as a lovely natural pink on my light olive skin. The box lasts forever - I've had mine for over a year and a half and I still have plenty - and it's adorable, which is of course a plus. My only complaint is that it tends to fade a little over the day, but it's nothing a quick re-application can't fix. It's also fairly expensive, but based on how long it has lasted, it's worth the price. (I never used the brush, so I can't comment about that)
I will buy this blush again. It's beautiful!

The powder is finely milled and a little goes a long way; the color is perfect for my fair skin and brightens my pale face without looking made up; the first powder blush that doesn't look like you are wearing powder! I thought it was pricey but a little goes a long way.
Great for highlighting your features. Has a beautiful floral scent.

This is so natural and gives me a glow! I usually use Nars Orgasm (which is also another favorite of mine)... But I wanted something a lil more subtle - and this was perfect! I look flushed but not as rosy as the Nars, just great for everyday casual wear.
Absolutely LOVE this face powder !!!!
This color is so nature and beautiful!
my super-fair skin never has any colour. this product is shimmery, yet so soft & subtle i can wear it during the day to the office.

i didnt know if i would really like the color. i was reading and heard it is really light. I have to say i am so happy i got this, I am fair and this color shows up great. Also i can use this lightly as a highlighter if i want. Buy this you will love it

I have super fair skin and this blush looks great on my cheeks! I've used it alone and over the posietint and it is just gorgeous. It is buildable and the prettiest soft pink I've used. Not to mention it really lasts (especially over the positint). I also have Georgia Peach, Dallas, and Ten as well as Hula. I love them all and they last forever!!!
I have used this for like 5 years, love it!!

I love this! The color is perfect. The brush is perfect. It smells wonderful. The box is so cute. The only thing I wish was different was a separate place for the brush. The brush goes in the box with the blush and I don't like that. I would keep my brush out of the box, but I'm afraid I would lose it. Other than that, its a great product.

I can sing praises to dandelion all day!!!! This is absolutely the most beautiful/natural/utterly phenomenal luminizer/face brightener/blush that i have ever tried! I have fairly light skin, so I usually brush it all over my face lightly and then layer and build up the color around my cheeks as a blush as well. The smell is really nice too, and the packaging and brush is cute and pretty. I will continue to buy this product as long as it is made!!
very light shimmer  cute pink color for young girls the brush is not good enough but you can apply with your own blush brush

reviews.review_title: La la la la LOVE IT!
reviews.review_text: Twenty eight dollars? Seriously I have no problems spending bucks on My highest prized asset... ME.  This is pretty inexpensive considering what it does. I certainly own many blushes/powders etc. that cost far more than that of this one with results that are far lack luster than Dandelion.  The perfect pink. Smells pretty too which is a bonus. I use it in conjunction with Too Faced Rose powder for a look that is unbeatable.  So healthy and natural. Yeah Benefit. Another home run!

A lot of people have been commenting on the smell of this product. It took me a while to realize what it smelled like, but I finally figured it out! It has a similar smell to the Mango Mint Body Butter, made by Body Treatment. Love the smell!

I was at my friends sleepover, and after i took a shower, i had to apply back some makeup, cuz it was still pretty early. I didn't bring my makeup, but my friend had TONS of makeup, so i looked through her stuff. I found this, and when I applied it, I fell inlove with it. Although it says its a luminizer, i use it as a blush. This makes my face perfectly pink, without looking fake! i LOVE this!

This blush is absolutely fantastic! For my fair complexion this really does wonders. It adds a bit of both shimmer and color. My friend who has a much darker skin tone really got me hooked on this stuff. It definately does what it says and makes you look GREAT at 8:00 in the morning. I brought this stuff to a friends house when I was staying the night, brushed some on in the morning, and was showered with compliments. I will stick with this product for life, as I absolutely love it!!!

As difficult as it is to determine what my favorite Sephora product is - this might be the winner. I love everything about this powder. It works magic, it feels great, and even smells delicious. The box is cute too! I might go buy more to stockpile, just in case they stop making it!!

love it. i find the powder light enough to use any season, but colourful enough that only a few swipes are necessary. the only slightly bad thing is that the powder comes off the compact really easily - but that is also a plus because it means less brushing time.
I use it as a blush... unless I am tanned i am pretty pasty looking. this works great... not too much color, just enough to give a glow. i would call it more peach/pink than pink..
This powder's cute package caught my eye so i bought it but was disappointed.For some reason it also looked colorless on me,I could hardly tell i had it on although i do agree that it smells nice.
first time use this product. really like it. I can wear it everyday. nice.
I was afraid it was going to be too pink, but it's just right. Adds a really healthy shimmer.
I don't know why it's seems like color less for me`~may be my skin'a s little bit dark~
This product is amazing. You can wear it so many ways. Sometimes, I just use it on my cheeks, but it's perfect to use on the whole face. It's sheer and not too shimmery. It certainly gives me a glow.
I bought this for my 15 year old daughter. She is very fair and this looks beautiful on her. She loves it!

I have used this powder for about 7 years now and I hope that Benefit never even considers discontinueing it. First, it is the perfect color for me. My skin tone is Light with a little pink tinge to it. I've also used another color by Benefit....I think it was called Cowboy and the color was too dark for me. Second, this little box lasts forever, so you definitely get your money's worth. I will be buying this little box for years to come!

This is great! First I was thinking this colour might be too light for me because I've got sort of a shade darker of skin tone compare to other Asians, but it's completely light and just adds a bit of colour to my colourless face after the foundation application. It definitely completes the natural look for myself!

I love this because it smells AMAZING! Which is weird because I couldn't believe a highlighting powder like this could actually smell. I give this 3 stars because I bought it under a poor light and you can't see it on my face. However, I still like it.
Beautiful! Looks natural, just the right amount of color. Just what I was looking for.

I like Dandelion a lot, the container lasts a while, and an application lasts the whole day and wears off evenly. It brightens and clears skin and gives a natural glow. It can be layered for a pinker blush or applied lightly for an all over glow.
As a previous user of both Hoola and Dallas, I find the Dandelion color to be a lot softer and sweeter. Just enough blush to look sun-kissed without the awful 80s hot pink cheeks. Smells good too!

I am in my 40's and had been using cream cheek stains,powder formulas seem too ageing until I tried these benefit powders. I first purchased coralista,then my daughter,who had been a Nars/super orgasm fan(who isn't),wanted something with a little less sparkle,so I bought the Dandelion color for her,I tried it and fell in love,I just got Goergia also,which I thought was going to be way to light once I opened it,(it's not) I use it as a highlighter,along w/ the Dandelion for a very natural flush.I hope these are NEVER discontinued,they're perfect!!

I loved this! This goes on evenly with a small blush or powder brush. I use it on the apples of my cheeks and it really blends and highlights my blush and bronzer. I've even wore it in place of my blush and looks amazing. I love the smell to...kinda sweet flower. It wasn't overpowering to me at all just a light pretty smell not perfumey! Recommend
I absolutely love this shade. It's my new go to favourite...and believe me I have alot of shades. Perfect!

i love the shade, i have light skin tone, so its not too 'pink' on my skin, but just enough. And this is a great deal, you're getting much more blush in this than to any other brand i think, and i've been using this blush for so long now that i think it probably expired, but i'm not even close to finishing it.

A wonderful pink shade that gives your cheeks a healthy glow when used as a blush (just build it up if you have tanned/medium skin). I also use it to define my cheekbones, and it blends in naturally with my skin tone. A fantastic product!
This product really lightens up your face. I loved it
I love Dandelion!! It was pricey, which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. I love that it has a hint of smell. It is a beautiful petal pink color which works very well with my fair complexion.
This stuff is a little too shimmery for my taste. Great for when I was 12, not so great at 20.
This is a great product. It is good for a subtle highlight. very pretty and light
Brightens my complexion, not cakey
It's okay. I didn't notice much of a difference. Nobody noticed a difference. Maybe something I would buy in a drugstore, but not pay 28 bucks for.
I like the travel size, I like the brush, I like the dandelion but... it is so light that on my skin is transparent... I wanted a pink light blush but on my skin this product is nothing.
I love this! It looks great and it has a nice scent to it too! Doesn't smell like typical makeup.

It's got a great, soft color, but isn't always enough for a blush. I find I have to apply quite a bit to get it to show. Still, it's nice and I do enjoy it, just need to have another blush to alternate for when I want more color. Nice, soft finish.

A lot of complaints are because they dont see it on their skin. Its not a blush! Unless you are really fair. I use it as both,if you want to use it as a blush then put Benetint first. It is a great Highlighting powder and its very subtle but it gives you a nice glow that looks natural. I also use Georgia Peach for an overall face powder to make my skin glow :) Hope this helps!
You can't even tell it is on and I have very light skin. I kept putting more and more on and still couldn't tell. I will not purchase again.

I love the shade of this complexion enhancer it's a very light pink, perfect for my fair skin. It smells very light and fresh and goes on flawless. When I bought it I just expected it to be a bit bigger in size but it's a very good quality product. A little goes a long way :)
Smells good, works like magic, the only thing I dont like abt this is the brush, after a week of using it, the brush is so hard I had to use my other blush brush
This is a delicate and subtle light pink. There is a bit a of sparkle in the color too. I like it for a fresh, natural look.
I have very light skin and this color is so pretty and illuminating. This color looks so natural on my skin and i have received many compliments. Also this prodcut smells good too!

I was so excited about trying this product. I have used other Benefit boxed powders in the past and was pleased. This one was slightly below what my expectations were for the product. While the very sheer shimmer effect is nice, the powder really does not pack much punch. I was expecting to see more of the pink come through. I am very VERY fair skinned and could not see it show up, which is a surprise.
pretty pink..essential
This blush is so natural looking and just adds a nice glow to fair and light skin, even looks great without any other makeup on - however, I would not recomend it for medium or dark skin.
love it! makes me feel fresh and naturally pretty. i always get compliments!
Unfourtunatley, I am not an owner of this product but I have heard great things about it!It's very natural looking,great for fair skin!

This is a really sweet color and is great if you are looking for something really subtle. It's not a blush, it's a highlighter, so I brush it all over and don't notice a ton of difference. But when I use it on top of the posietint blush it does add a little more soft pink.  I wish it showed up a little more but a nice addition to my makeup bag.

reviews.review_title: The only blush you'll ever need!
reviews.review_text: At first when I saw the pink color, I was skeptical, but ever since I tried it, it's the only blush I use. It looks incredibly natural, and really perks up your complexion. Highly recommended!

I use this everyday and it has the best scent. It's a great blush for a soft daily look and also helps even out darker blush for evenings. I also use it as a contrast at my temples and under my jaw bone. I love it so much I bought a second one so if it gets discontinued I still have one.

does what it says it will do, freshens your complection for a pick me up, but unless you layer it over the benetint or poseytint, youre not gonna get much in the way of color if you use it as a blush, unless your skin is very fair.
its great but it has talc in it i herd that talc was bad for you

This is my favorite blush, and this particular shade is so soft and beautiful looking on the skin..it just brightens up my entire complexion and makes a huge difference when I put it on. Love, love, love it!
Benefit Cosmetics Dandelion is so cute, i love the brush, and the color is great, not so bright
Great color that's just right for fair to light skin.
I use this on top of stila's covertable color for an additional pop on my cheeks, and even on my forehead and chin... lightly of course!
I bought this product because many of my friends recommended it. It is good but doesn't have fantastic effect. I would buy it again if it is on sale.

this is by far the best illuminating powder ive ever tried! im a cosmetics junkie and ive tried them all trust me! i sweep this over my eye lids, bridge of nose and cheekbones for a perfect candlelit glow.this blurs imperfections like magic.it is not overpowering or glittery like most highlighters on the market. i dont see how anyone can use this as a blush tho (even if you are extremely pale it doesnt have much color).i highly recommend this to anyone and everyone looking for a skin pick me up.it makes your face look alive and awake even if thats not the case.i dont care for the brush or packaging but im willing to overlook that even for the price of $28.this lasts a really long time, i buy it maybe twice a year if anything.A GREAT BEAUTY INVESTMENT!!!

I'm really happy with this product! I put it on the apples of my cheeks as a blush and it looks beautiful. I used to use NARS orgasm, but the color and shimmer made the blemishes on my cheeks stand out. With Dandelion, the color is just right, and there's not an excess of shimmer. It looks very pretty and natural. The powder smells nice, and the box is cute too. Great product!
I have fair (barely darker than vampire) skin with a little pink in my cheeks. I put this on and can't even tell it's there. Maybe this works for someone with darker skin but I couldn't see anything.
I purchased this product because I have very fair skin and most blushes are much to bright. This is actually a little light to use as a blush, but works ok as a highlighter.

reviews.review_title: Even my mom got it too
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of my favorite blushes. It's not necessarily 'natural' flush, but this hint of pink is so lovely and sutble. I used it everyday for months, it can be worn with any outfit, either casual or business attire. It's pretty big for a blush, but I already used half (considering I have about 10 of 'em) and even my mom loved it and bought one for her. (she's in late 40s) Perfect on light skin, regardless of occasion or age.

This is way more than just a blush!! I love this powder sooooo much! I usually start by applying it like a blush, but it's so pretty I just have to put it on my nose, chin, and forehead! I recommend this product with an strong five stars!
What else can I say? such a pretty pinky glow!

I started out with Hula for the summer. However, I found that I needed to rosie up my cheeks. While in Atlanta I talk to the consulant about this product considering that I loved the first box blush so much. While the color may look odd for a red-head it blended into my skin and gave me rosie cheeks. I often use this blush and a little lip gloss for my non-dress up days.

This is the perfect natural blush colour for those who have a very fair skin tone. It can be worn alone or on top of a deeper blush colour. Unfortunately, I'm not a big fan of the brush that came with it.

When I swatched this product at the store it was a great gorgeous pink - just what I was looking for... but when I got home and tried it out, it just didn't really do anything for my face and hardly showed up. Now, I know that it's not supposed to be a super bright pink blush or anything, but I felt like I had to pile it on just to see SOME difference. I think this product is better for someone with lighter/fair skin tones... and I'm more of a medium. So, for $28 dollars, I decided to return it since it didn't do much for me. I also didn't really like the scent it had... it's a pretty flowerly smell but I don't know if that would cause some irritation because of the fragrance for some.
This is the perfect pink blush for those of us who are super-duper pale. It's incredibly natural and not to sparkly. It smells sweet too!

I love this blush it can be used as a brightening face powder,eyeshadow, and blush! I can't thank Benefit enough for making the dandelion blush; It's a light pink that's very natural if you want to have more pink on your cheks just apply more it takes usually about 2-3 applications of the blush for you to really see it I have been using this blush for a while now and I just made a dent in the box of blush but I ordered my 2 box! and can't wait for a new box of blush it smells really good and the box is really cute!
I love this product! I've tried other highlighting powders on the past that had made my face too pink. This gives just a very soft glow to your face. I will continue to use this product.
Looks fresh and soft. Gives innocent soft romantic look. I love it!!!!!!

I bought this because I needed a new blush but I had no idea what I was in for! Although it seems very pink, it really isn't that much. It makes my face glow with a little flush of pink. It also smells good and lasts really long!!! I love it! :)
The color my cheeks naturally glowed in my younger years, and it looks perfect now. Healthy, sheer, natural, glow!

So pretty. My absolute favorite of all the Benefit blushes. I've been using it for two years and can't not have it. Works in all situations and my husband never fails to tell me I look pretty when I use this. (Yes, he fails to say it when I use something else. =D) Can also be used as eyeshadow which means you get more for your money! Great product when you just want to toss something light on your face.

I used this as a blush on some days because I'm so light and I absolutely love it! I don't need so much to really make my face look more awake. I've been through two of these highlighting powders and I'm totally looking forward to my third!
I LOVED my Dandelion powder. It made me look like I had been outside, with just enough pink to look natural. If it wasn't as pricey, I would love it even more!

I bought this to use as a blush since I have very pale skin. I have to say I LOVE it. The color looks so natural, like a slight flush to your skin. I put a little on the apples of my cheeks, my nose, forhead and chin and it looks like I spent the afternoon outside. It also has a very faint fragrance which smells really good. The brush that's included is also a little higher quality than most blush brushes that come with product....overall this an awesome highlighter that I will definitely be purchasing again.

This is a repurchase for me. This is my favorite product from Benefit. It brightens up your face if you use it as a highlighter. It gives you perfect rosy cheeks if you use it as a blush. I wish the packaging was different though, it's so big and bulky. A big pain when I have to bring it on trips.

i adore this .. i bought it under the impression that it was a blush. and it can be for lighter skin tones.. but this color is so pretty. Great for a soft natural look. It adds a lovely sheen to the skin after application. and this product smells so great.

I just love this powder. I use it as a blush because I am very fair skinned and it just gives me a pretty, natural touch of color. It's a bit pricey, but it seems like it will last awhile. It also smells very nice. Yet another reason to love benefit!
it gives very natural blush, and i would never finish this because i've been using this from last year and they are still there! love it.
this is a pretty highlighter but may be too light .

reviews.review_title: For a bit of color without looking too
reviews.review_text: I have very fair skin, and I hate most blushes because they tend to look very unnatural on me. I've been using Benefit's Dandelion for years, and it's perfect. I can use it like other people use bronzers - swish the brush across my cheeks and forehead, and it gives me much more natural-looking color. My only caveat is that it does not last all day, so be sure to put it in your purse so you can refresh during the day.

reviews.review_title: Its a Life Saving Make-up Essential
reviews.review_text: This make-up brightens my day. Whenever I put it on i feel as if I have a glow surrounding me. It makes me sparkle and have pink rosy cheeks. With my medium skin tone and the bright sparkle I feel like I'm a new women.

this stuff will make you look ALIVE on those days where you have the dreary blahs (which, for me, is every day as of late). it gives your cheeks a sheer pink smooch. word of advice: use a good blush brush. I recommend a contour flat brush for optimal results -- that'll really help the color show on your cheeks. the color's also buildable, so if it's not sheer you're going for, you can get a pinker flush. p.s. it also smells heavenly. love in a box, friends.
This is my must have favorite every day and every night cosmetic item. I have reddish skin and the pink shade lightens and brightens. Love this!
I like it very much!!!

Dandelion takes my corpse-white skin and brightens it right up! Don't expect a clown-like blush; this is a pretty, natural pink that will suit EVERY skin town, even my much-darker sisters. The little brush that comes with it is great for applying just a hint of living color, without over-doing it. I love the name, the packaging, and the product. This is a must-have whether you usually wear make-up or not!
i am fair and got this for blush and it is great - gives me color yet you can see through it. also i never like or use the brushes that come with products but this brush rocks.
great product, love it
Lovely!! Leaves the skin with a glowing look. Feel free to apply as much as you want, all day long... Excellent powder!!

I love pink so of course I headed for the Dandelion highlighting powder. Wow! Talk about instant perk-me-up color! I love the color, texture, and look so much am going to buy a back-up. I just took the brush and swept it across my cheeks and forehead and it looked so beautiful! I am very fair skinned, so I have to be careful as not to look like I have clown-cheeks. Not this. This is gorgeous and natural! I like a smokey eye and this is just perfect. So soft, yet what a difference! Thanks to the staff at Sephora for the suggestion! Just Love!

I bought this after trying (and loving) 4 other Benefit powders. I was so happy! I have very fair skin so anything too pink makes me look like a painted doll. This was the perfect shade of pink and lasted all day. I had people at work coming up to me and asking what I had done over the weekend because I was glowing. Love it!
I like this for my everyday blush. I'm brown hair/blue eyes of German/Irish decent. Looks great on my kind od pale skin.

I've used this product for gosh knows how many years and still haven't bought a replacement. It's a nice, healthy-looking pink, and on my fair skin shows up easily. It lasts through the day for the most part and I think would work well on both warm and cool undertones. The brush that's included is far better than most of its kind. Highly recommend.

I love most all Benefit items. I am a regular everyday user of your bluffing, It Stick, eye bright and hello flawless. I also use Bad Gal eyeliner when I do want to look Bad!! I have light skin and this Dandelion powder does NOTHING at all for my face. Nothing, No Color...ZERO... I highly suggest testing this item before purchasing.

Very pretty hint of color. You really can't over do it with this one. I gave four stars because of the packaging. It's going to be difficult to get at all of the product once i get down to the bottom.
i am very fair and i use this for a blush and it is so perfect. i am a makeup junkie and this is the best blush ever!!
I love this powder. It smells really nice, and makes my complexion look brighter.

I LOVE this stuff!! I at first was weary on the color, because i usually dont wear blush at all and its looked pretty dark- but the woman in the store talked me into trying it and WOW!! it didnt show up the way blush does- it just brought out a nice peach glow to my cheeks. It comes in the cutest little package and smells good too. LOVE
I love this product! It brightens up my face and gives me the best glow!

reviews.review_title: Looks good in box, but too sheer on skin
reviews.review_text: I was thinking of buying Dior blush, but didn't like the hefty price tag. I thought this would be a great pink blush for my fair skin with a better price tag, but alas, it's too sheer and barely shows up at all. I tried layering it on, but just ended up looking cakey and older....gah! It has a very subtle shimmer, but you have to look closely to see it on your skin. I gave it 2 stars b/c it's the only blush I know that smells good and the packaging is nice, but bulky. For the money, it's not worth it. I haven't been impressed with Benefit cosmetics lately and this might be the nail in the coffin.

This is the perfect touch on those days I don't want to look like I'm wearing makeup. Gven my fair but less-than-perfect complexion, sometimes brighter blushes just draw more attention to trouble spots, but this adds just enough pigment without ever looking heavy.
I will be returning this item as it does not show up on my face when applied.
Love the color, complements fair skin tones very well.

This is actually by far the greatest blush I've ever used. it adds a perfect glow to my naturally pale face and has such an amazing smell to it. I definitely recommend at least trying it. its worth the money and in my opinion there's no better.

I use this when I don't want to overdo it with NARS Org@sm blush, and just want a pretty, and light pick-me-up... The color is not very strong, but I'm okay with that for the reason stated above. Its a very subtle pretty!

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to like this one...
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I think my skin color is much too light for this product. I loved the soft pink brush & the scent, but other than that it did not show up on my skin at ALL even with heavy coverage. I ended up exchanging it. Might be better if you have a medium skin tone.
It may be great on girls whose cheeks are more white. But my cheek is pink and kind of redish. So it didn't add anything on me.
This is my favorite blush. The color is nice and subtle and leaves a nice glow to you skin.
Great! Very natural looking!

Great color. Very light and natural. Easy to apply. Both myself and my teenage daughter use this powder. Does not clog pores. Highly recommend for those who dont have a lot of time to spend doing their make up. Benefit products are great for your skin and look very natural.
Great color for fair skin
If you want your blush to look natural, this one is the best. Even when I put a lot it's impossible to over do it.

This stuff is so pretty! When I put it on at first, I didn't notice anything besides a little sparkle on my face, but my friends told me later that my skin looked really bright and awake. This is a great and super-natural way to make your skin look perky and beautiful!

This product is good but a little expensive. The product color is very very light when you put it on, but it saves you from putting on too much accidentally. When its on your skin the product does feel very smooth and satiny. I don't like that brush at all though, the shape of it is not good, and the bristles are not soft.

I bought this with high hopes, since I always look tired from lack of sleep and my complexion isn't what I want it to be. I got home, swept some on, and didn't notice anything different. Not worth $28.

I have very fair skin so I figured that this color would be great for me. I used it on my cheeks as a blush and it looked great. Unfortunately, the brush is horrible. Also, as far as highlighting goes this powder is pretty dull.
Perfect for highlight or cheeks. I wear it everyday!
This smells nice and the packaging is really cute, but nothing really showed up when I applied it to my skin so I ended up returning it.

this is so bad!!! I'm Chinese so basiclly my skintone is yellow-light skintone. I've been using this for a year and no matter how hard i put this on my face it never show up... eventhough i want to use this as a Highlighter, it also doesn't work.  I'm so disappointed e-mail me for some advice

This delicate pink highlighting powder is perfect for people like me that have very light skin. The color is perfect and it doesn't overwhelm the rest of your face. I love it. (Although I ditched the little brush and used my Sephora brand natural slant brush #42.) And Benefit's packaging is always so cute. Buy it!
I luv it. the sheer pink color makes my face shine but not too over. Recommend to my friends and they fall in love w/ it as well :)

I really like this product. It makes me look awake for my 8 am class. And it smells pretty! I would recommend using this product alone for anyone who wants to look their best, but doesn't want to look too made up. However, it also looks amazing over bronzer, especially when you put it along your eyes right above your cheekbones. I use it every day and it was definitely worth the money.
I love this blush! It is so natural and is the prettiest pink tone! You do have to use a decent amount to get enough color, though. Highly recommended !
I'm an NC40 and It's more like a highlight to my skin tone, but I love it. The glow in my skin is just amazing and really like the subtle rosy glow!
what a amazing blush!!! It is the best blus that I'v been used!!!!
After lightly dusting my face with this luminizing powder, I look refreshed and awake and my skin looks so much brighter! Love it!

I love it, It makes my cheeks look radiant without looking like a crazy doll. Definitely radiant and satiny. I just need one very soft stroke and that's all it takes to make you look healthy and i'd say even younger. I do have some redness on my face so I was afraid this product will make me look like a strawberry but it's just very mild. you can definitely make it stronger appliying a lilttle bit more. Great product!

I thought this seemed nice when I tried it on in the store...but over the weekend...I literally kept layering it over and over and could not see it that well. I'm going to exchange this for the Sugarbomb. At the time I thought it was too much color; however, now I realize my skin kind of needs more impact to show. I wanted something that seemed natural and the Sugarbomb seems much more natural on my skin tone than Dandelion.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for my NW15 cool, fair complexion
reviews.review_text: This has turned into my go-to- blush. Love it! It goes with everything, gives a nice soft, pink cheek. I do not use this as a highlighter -- just a cheek color. I don't like my cheek color to be in your face -- just a compliment to the rest of my makeup. This definitely delivers. Will definitely repurchase.

I love this powder. It's never too heavy, always makes me look ready to go, and is my one must-have blush that I'm totally true to. It also lasts FOREVER-- I've had the same box for about a year and finally made a dent.

I decided to finally purchase Dandelion after all the great reviews and I must say I'm very happy with it. Dandelion is perfect to use as a blush and overall brightener for the face--as long as you're not into the heavy makeup look. I love that it's sheer, so I can add more layers depending on how much coverage I want. It's pricey-- but it seems worth it to me so far. I would definitely recommend this blush/brightener to any fair skinned lady out there
It is so wonderful--it can cheer onesefl up when you feel blue..

It's good stuff - I have pale skin and I feel this would work well on different skin tones as long as they're light enough for this stuff to show! It's not obvious I'm wearing makeup when I swipe this on.
It's really good! AWESOME! The best of best ;-)
pretty color but even for my fair skin really didnt show up or highlight, nice consistency though
This was recommended by InStyle magazine for fair complexions... I think it is way to pale and the cardboard box is cheap....

I bought this because my skin looks so dull in the winter. The color looks very natural on me and it really does make my complexion look more radiant. I only need to use a little bit and it smells great!

reviews.review_title: Bring some life into your face!
reviews.review_text: I originally bought it to be used as a blush. However, on my medium skin tone, it was much too subtle. It isn't meant to be a blush, but actually, an illuminator (especially for my skin tone)  After sweeping on some blush, I sweep dandelion on my cheeks, forehead and chin. This brings some life back into my face. For me, after the intial steps of foundation (if i decide to go with foundation that day), and then blush, leaves my face still somewhat lifeless. A sweep of Dandelion makes me appear more lively.  I've been complimented that I often look so glowy. (Excuse the lack of a better word, but that's a compliment straight from the mouth of a boy!)  I typically use the brush that comes with dandelion and find that it works well. It also works well with a fan brush if you have one.

With a light hand or a fan brush, it's a lovely brightening allover face powder. With a dense brush, it's a very natural-looking blush. Not too shimmery for the natural light and not too mate to look dull and flat. It also smells great

Though I thought this blush might be too light for my olive skin, it gave me a perfect blush- great for when I wear minimal makeup during the day. Has a nice scent, goes in smooth, and lasts all day. The only con is that the packaging is a bit bulky if you want to put it in your purse, or to travel with.

I LOVE dandelion! It's perfect for when you don't want to feel like you're wearing a lot of makeup, but still want to look polished. Very subtle and natural. I use it as a blush, and then lightly dust my forehead and nose.

I think obvious blushes look ridiculous- I've been using the Almay cream stuff to avoid the sparkly clown look. Then I tried this though, and was blown away.  It is shimmery, but subtly so. It's not too pinky either- this shade is fool proof. It's a very innocent, natural non-blushed flushed look.
I'm not a fan, I like shimmery products this did not have any that showed up too sheer.
I love this blush! It makes my cheeks look amazing! The little brush is great, too. I plan on keeping the brush after the makeup is gone.
Great for the entire face; brightens up my complexion and gives my makeup a nice, soft finish.
the blush was a really nice color and it also smelled nice.

LOVE this product, wear it every day. Really does instantly brighten your face and make you look alive. Perfect for students and others who often have to look much better/more rested than they feel :)
I love this cosmetic.I like Benefit so much.Dandelion smells good. And it was make me looks lightly and nice.

This gives you just the right amount of natural looking roseyness to your cheeks, with a touch of sparkle (no tacky glitter disco club girl look.) It brightens yout whole face up, and the color is neutral enough that it'll match whatever other make-up you're wearing (lips/eyes.)
I used first time cheek make up. It is so natural and not too dark and bright. it is what i want to type makeup.now i'm enjoying every go out.
This stuff is really great. I just started using this brand and I really like it. it really perks up my skin.

reviews.review_title: PERFECT FOR EVERYONE - LOOK YEARS YOUNGER
reviews.review_text: I love Benefit Cosmetics. Everything I've used has been perfect. The products perform exactly as they're supposed to for flawless application.  Dandelion is made for everyone. Every single age group will benefit from this powder. It's a pink pressed highlighting powder that gives skin a brand new innocent look with the stroke of the brush. Because it's a highlighting powder, it also detracts from any skin imperfections. But more than that, for those of us over 30, it takes back time. I'm not sure if it's the pure innocent color, or if it's something more difficult to define, but even a light application makes skin look new and radiant.  I sometimes use my Dandelion over Benefit's That Gal primer, and sometimes alone. Either way, it the results are awesome. My skin appears dewey and fresh and young. It's amazing to contemplate that such phenomenal results can come out of a box.... Skin looking so fresh can be the basis for a multitude of make-up styles.  Another idea for you: Benefit's Benetint and High Beam are products that would really well under Dandelion. Draw the OUTLINE of a circle on your cheeks with Benetint. Do one cheek at a time, and do this quickly, as Benetint is designed to dry pretty quickly. Then draw a line across the top of the Benetint OUTLINE with High Beam, Benefit's liquid high lighter. Blend quickly. The apply Dandelion over it. The results are really beautiful and would work well for everyone. This look is perfect for day to evening, and can be the basis for an evening out, or special occasion, once you add your style with eye make-up.  Dandelion is probably the best powder available from any company. It's my favorite. If you could have only one powder, this would be the one that I'd recommend. It can be the basis for so many fantastic looks. You'll love this. It's truly awesome.

reviews.review_title: Does exactly what the description says!
reviews.review_text: I love this blush!; I just bought it today and I am very happy with it the it freshens up your face it's a pretty pink and it looks natrual!; If you are looking for a blush that freshens up your face, looks natrual, and is soooo pretty!, I definitely recommend purchasing this blush!; thankyou Benefit for making this dandelion blush it is so amazing! I love it please do not ever discontinue this blush!. -Very hapy customer

This is my new favorite!! At first I thought there wasnt much to it, but I put it on and looked at a mirror from afar, and WOW!!! It completely changed my complexion and gave me color without being obvious. Higly Higly Highly recommended.. or...maybe I should keep this little secret to myself?

I have quite pale, thin skin (I'm usually the lightest or second-to-lightest shade in a foundation) and the lack of sunlight in the winter fades my tan, deepens my dark circles and makes me just generally look corpse-like, ugh. I had swapped Dandelion away because I wasn't using it in the summer but decided to re-purchase it and it was a great idea! Dandelion is a great blush and highlighter for my really pale winter skin because it is slightly cool-toned and very sheer, which keeps it from looking too obvious. A little dandelion on my cheeks and the bridge of my nose and I look considerably more awake and fresh. Sometimes I like to layer Dandelion with NARS Penny Lane cream blush for a really sweet, pink-cheeked look that works well in the winter when the cold makes me flush anyway. A must for anyone with pale skin who needs a pick-me-up!

I'm light complected and most blushes look really awkward on me, but I love love love how just a little goes a long way and doesn't make me look anything but naturally blush-ie (not a word but should be).
That is pretty good as a gift to my friend.

reviews.review_title: makes me feel pretty in pink
reviews.review_text: I love this product!! Have used this for years.
Puts a nice pink color on cheek bone.
I love this powder it instantly brightens up my face !
Looks great on any complexion. I could not live without.

This is the first product by Benefit I've tried. I thought I'd go with a classic; besides, I'd heard rave reviews about it! After trying it, I have to say I really do like it a lot. It's the perfect pink hue for my fair skin (which I'd been searching for, forever!). It's buildable - I can sweep a little on for a glow, or put more on for more significant color. It's gentle and leaves my cheeks feeling velvety. It smells great, scented products are a plus in my opinion. I really like the brush it comes with. I know a lot of people don't like or use it, but I love it. It's unbelievably cute (black handle with pink bristles which are extremely soft) and it contours my cheeks perfectly. Also, the fact that it comes in a little box is beyond cute - I love that! My only con about it is that it's so spendy! I wish it were a bit cheaper, but then again, this will last me a long time.
Bought this for myself. It adds a little color but would like a different container
I like the color it looks really natural.

only reason why i don't like this one is it is really really light colored. i have relatively light skin and it looked weird on me. i like dallas or benetint better. the makeup girls say this is good as a highlighter.

I'm not sure if this product delivers anything that a very pale pink blush wouldn't do. I like that it's sheer and adds warmth. I brush it on my neck as well. I have very pale skin and notice my neck often looks too light in pictures in comparison to my face. I do like Benefit products I just wish it was more noticeable.
I wanted something to go on light and that blended easily. I love the color, the packaging! It just does exactly what I wanted!

i really love this product!! i have never been a big blush user but this is so light and looks unbelievably natural and subtle. its perfect for my fair skin. it also smells beautiful and light which was unexpected. i will definitely continue to purchase this highlighter.
I love this product! It wakes up my face....just a hint of colour but it really makes a difference.
I LOVE IT!!!!! It's cute and the brush is soft. But it's not good for travel, other than that it's perfect!!!
Love this product! It's the only make-up I use and it doesn't look like I have any on.
I absolutely loved this product. It stays on a long time, is light fresh and even smells good!
I love this product. It makes your face look bright without looking too made up. The color is suddle. I have given this product as gifts several times.

I purchased Benefit highlighting powder for the first time and love it. I will be going to purchase a few more shades for different occasions. The pigment is not to strong yet its not so week that you have to put tons on. It goes on great and lasts a long time too.
nice color, nice smell, love it!

this is a perfect blush or highlighter for pale and fair skinned people it doesnt take over our light complexions it enhances them. its very beautiful it brings out my light freckles in a good way lol, not to mention the packaging is gorgeous too. i bought it for the awesome packaging and will continue to buy for the amazing quality
Like it so much!~ Really natural pink!~
Works as a blush for me. Vibrant color on my fair skin.
really preetty, light but vivid color.. suit for everyday..
Great for everyday use. Has a nice scent that is almost flowery (like a dandelion!) Doesn't fade.
Love love love this stuff. Makes me look refreshed w/o a bunch of fake looking color. Well worth the money!
long lasting...alot of product in this little box...super pretty and soft ballerina pink...makes you look young and fresh. I sweep it across my cheekbone and swipe it in my t-zone...love Benefit.
i'm fair skinned and use this as a blush. it's the perfect hint of pink to add color and not make me look overly done. natural and great overall product! i use my own blush brush however.

i love benefit cosmetics, especially coralista. it's almsot december and i was still wearing that shade. it was a little too bright for winter so i wanted to get a new blush. the salesman told me to try dandelion and layer it on top of the coralista, which is very pretty. im only giving it three stars though, because it is very light, and i cant really tell if it's even on sometimes, even if i do layer it. im

have had the same box for years, and keep rediscovering it. just bought a fresh one today. it works as blush or highlighter or to make me look alive at the end of the day, with or without other makeup. i wish there was something like this that wasn't talc-based, though.
I love this natural shade. I turn to this blush when I want a minimal makeup look. It really brightens my complexion.

Still loving this product after purchaseing it for the third time. I love to apply it on days I don't feel like wearing much makeup. If you want it for blush, it simply takes a few more strokes. My only complaint still is the brush, don't have much use for it, I'd rather see more product in that box.

I love this blush! The packaging is so cute and I love the sheer color. It's not too garish and it's very natural looking. It really does give you a subtle glow from within look. This was my first Benefit item, and Im looking forward to buying more!

This really completes a natural look and sets foundation flawlessly. It isn't too pink and the tiny flecks of sparkle draw light to your face nicely. Plus the box is pretty. Overall very flattering, would definitly purchase again.
i have light skin and have used the georgia peach powder and this is much better its slightly shimmery and brightens my face instantly.
I love this product and have been using it for years. A sweep of this over your blush softens your look and gives a pretty girlish glow.

I bought this with the intention of using it as a highlighting powder.(which is how it's marketed) But apparently I am fair enough so that I can use it as a blush. I love the color. Some pinks are clownish looking, this one is pretty... natural looking.
I love this powder - it looks great on any complexion and the box is adorable.
Maybe my skin is just too pink for this, but it doesn't show up on me at all. I might as well be using a pressed powder.
This blush is awesome!!! It makes my skin look like it has a natural glow to it.

This power is very light, has a fresh scent...the brush that comes with it doesn't do anything for the product. Product is better applied with a sponge type applicator. Powder is good for ridding skin of 'oily' look...otherwise, I wouldn't recommend it as a make up bag essential. You could do well without it...I just like to try different things.
Absolutely love this product. I live Sephora.
This is the pink I really want !! Not too pinkish! After I put it on, I can see and I look very different. Very satisfied.

The packaging is so cute and the color looks good before use. The downside is that the color is so light on and I even have fair skin. By the time you apply enough to see it a bit, it becomes too powdery which makes my skin look older than it is.
really love this blush, makes me have a glow all day long. sometimes make up has a weird smell but this blush smells like flowers. i love it.

the coralista is the perfect shade. i tried dandelion 1st... too light. then i tried georga peach... too light. finally i gave these blushes one more shot and TA-DA!!! im not even that dark. im light to medium olive. so olive skinned people beware! the first two i mentioned dont even bother. however the final product (coralista) i was happy with is deff. worth the money.
Love this product. Looks great on the skin
This is one of my must have beauty items. I bring it with me everywhere and brush on whenever I need a pick-me-up!

reviews.review_title: Not the right color for me
reviews.review_text: I bought this hoping that it would be a lighter version of Benefit's Dallas product but it was too pinky for my skin so I had to return it.
I love this blush, I have been using this for years, it looks very natural and stays on all day.
looks better on pale skin, but overall a good product

Originally made as a highlighting powder. But this one can be used as a subtle blush OR highlights, really depends on what kind of look you're aiming for.  I was skeptical at first, especially the first time I bought it. Turns out that the more I use it, the more I'm liking it.  It's a very light pink blush and buildable. It smells great too! I use this everyday at work and/or school. A natural finish, just blend well and build on how much pink you want on your cheeks.
Love the way it makes my face bright and cheery in the morning! Its so easy to swipe on my cheeks and go. Perfect for a new mom!

I love this product! It has been a staple in my make up routine for a while now. A light dusting all over gives a nice flush of color that looks perfectly natural. Really perks up the complexion, with or without use of other make up.
love the color my skin is light and this color is perfect it a soft pink with a lil shimmer
Though I absolutly love the soft subtle look Dandelion gives to your face, I can not stand the boxey looking brush it comes with. Other than that I love this product when applied with a blush brush.

This product is amazing! It gives me soft and sweet pinkish cheeks!!! The brush that comes with it isn't bad actually. It's just that I have to find a place to store it separately cuz I don't want it to be sitting on the blush.  I read some reviews that mentioned how the color didn't really show up. So I was worried that it would happen to me cuz I have a medium-tanned skin. However, it shows up really nicely, really soft and delicate pink when apply 2-3 layers on the cheeks. I apply 1 thin layer all over my face and it gives a nice glow too! Luv it!
I love the subtle color and it shines on my skin! I use it all over the face and a second time on my chin bone. I love it and will keep using it.
I love, love, love this blush!! It's perfect and doesn't look clowny....just the perfect color for that glowing colorful cheeks look! :)

As someone who isn't a huge blush person, I am totally in love with this powder. My cheeks are sort of red to begin with so I always feel like putting on blush makes me look like a clown. This powder is a beautiful pink/peach color and just compliments my skin so nicely (I am on the pale side). I don't care for the little square brushes in the Benefit powders so I use a Sephora blush brush. I think this color would flatter so many skin tones too... a must try!
I really like it. It's light- sometimes even too light. And it's not cakey-which is great.

This is the 3rd time I bought this blush & I almost never buy any product more than once, I always like to try something new & Sephora has sooo much to choose from. I have fair skin & this looks the most natural, love it! It lasts forever, too!
BEEN USING THIS PRODUCT FOR YEARS NOW CAN'T FIND ANYTHING TO COMPARE. HOW DO U LOOK SO PRETTY AT 8 IN THE MORNING ...WITH NO MAKEUP ON? EVERYDAY USE FOR A HEALTHY GLOW.

I've put off trying this for too long. I finally used a gift card I'd received for my birthday and I'm very happy I did! I have fair skin and it is a very natural blush color for me. I highly recommend it for other fair skins looking for a soft natural blush.

A decent highlighting powder, does the trick but not anything phenomenal. very versatile color can be used to highlight eyes and face anywhere. My mother loves it because its one of the few highlighters weve tried that doesnt leave a disco ball shimmer all over.
It's pretty and lasts a long time but I don't think it's worth the price.
It really goes a long way! It can work as a pink blush or I put it all over my face after I put on primer for a nice complexion. I've been using for over a year and still lots left. Totally worth it!

This blush is wonderful! It is an everyday blush that looks very natural but gives you just enough color to brighten your face up. It also has some kind of magical cover-up benefit at the same time. It seems to make my cheeks look smoother than they are without the blush.
This is one of my go to cosmetics - color is just right, not too dark, looks very natural - if I had to choose only one blush this would be it.

the benefit cosmetics dandelion is perfect, i loved it ! I'm a Chinese, i visited my sister in toronto last month,she led me to SEPHORA, i'm very happy to shopping there,and i want to go SEPHORA again!

I don't like any of the box of powders from Benefit because nothing really shows up when I put them on my face. The only one that I actually see color is the Thrrrrob one. I think that the only good thing about these powders are the cute designs on the boxes and the scents of the powders.

I went to Sephora in search of the perfect blush. I saw this and thought it was a great natural looking color (and the sales girl said it was one of her favorite products). However, what I should have noticed was that it is not marketed as a blush but a highlighter, which was my mistake. As an all over highlighter it does add a slight rosy glow which I imagine will keep me from looking sickly in the winter but as a blush, I can layer and layer it on my face and it barely shows up (and I have super fair skin!). Also, I feel like it sits on top of my face instead of blending in so i feel a little bit like I'm covered in very pretty colored flour.

I'm a slightly tan Asian with warm yellow undertones so I had my doubts about how effective this could be, but I was surprised! This powder gave me a shockingly beautiful healthy soft-focus glow that I absolutely loved. I currently use it all over my face and it makes my skin look gloriously radiant, but I may reduce it to just my cheeks, chin, nose bridge and forehead because I noticed it made my face look just a tad pinker than my neck. Otherwise, fantastic for day or night!

I cannot say enough good things about this powder. It's in a cute little package, it smells AMAZING and its portable. I know a lot of people have complained about the cardboard boxes for travelling but honestly, what the heck are you doing with your makeup bag that would cause this box to get damaged? These travel perfectly! I use some Smashbox tinted moisturizer, a little bronzer and sweep this perfctly pink powder across my cheeks and I'm out the door. It's just right for light makeup days. Would buy again.. and again.. and again!
this blush is so cute! everything about it is cute! the packaging, the brush, the color, the way it looks when put on, everything!!
love the colorÔºÅÔºÅi use it as blush powder, so natural
I have used Dandelion for years and converted many friends as well. The color is a perfect pink that goes with many different looks and the consistency of the grain is superfine and blends easily.
It is really perfect!~ I love it and use it everyday. Its pink color looks so sweet but natural.

I have fair Asian skin, and Dandelion adds a very nice, NATURAL-looking and rosy glow to my skin. I usually do two or three lightly brushed layers but one when I feel like doing a no-makeup look (I use only Dandelion to make me look healthy.)

This blush is flawless upon us rish or scottish ladies with our fair complexions. However, I've also seen it work wonders as a highlighter on warmer light skin or peaches and cream skin.  This blush is like appearing ink...when you first brush it on ,it looks as if there is no colour whatsoever. But give it a chance (and some layers) and you will see it glowing.  This blush absolutely gives the most natural flush. It's impossible to apply Dandelion to strong. The key is layers! Lastly, if you dab some on the bridge of your nose, chin, a sweep across your forehead and a stroke on each side of your neck will make your face radiate. Not to mention that the powder SMELLS so darn good!
Great blush, looks totally natural, like a little flush of the face, and stays on all day. Small enough to carry in your bag with an included brush that applies easily and is soft on the face.

This 1 is worth the money! I have always liked it but tried to buy other less expensive products instead. I ended up wasting more money than if I had bought this the 1st time. Just the right color and sheerness to give you a little subtle lift and color without looking like blush.

reviews.review_title: When you want a youthful glow!
reviews.review_text: I don't wear blush every day, but love using Dandelion! It gives me the wonderful, healthy glow of youth. Very subtle...not a made up look. I may become a daily user.
This left a nice, subtle pink sheen on my fair skin. Nothing earth-shattering, but a pretty flush. It has a light rose scent and pretty packaging.

This powder is beautiful! I use it everyday because the color is simply gorgeous. It works well on my medium summer skin and my light winter skin. Surprisingly the I kept the little brush it came with because it is great for touch ups! Its soft and applies the powder well if your on the go, even though the box of powder is really not designed for travel, but oh well. I hate regular pink blushes. Hate them. But this is so pretty with the pinks, mauves, and slight gold shimmer in it. Give it a chance.
I had to send this back. It was a great powder and I tried it several times in different ways. But it did not show up on my lighter medium skin. I sent it back.
I really like the elegant light pink color. Not too coral, or too purple. Sheer and pearl textured.
Love this product, it leaves a nice natural glow. and I can use it with and without foundation. I use a different brush for better coverage.
i love this blush. it can be worn everyday and it is a perfect shade of pink.
I love this - it gives a nice pink glow, and is lightweight and the brush is nice and soft! I use it sometimes alone or sometimes over the top of blush.

I really like this product. Definitly for people with light to medium-light skin tones. I used to use Georgia but found that it was way too dark for me, that one is more for darker or medium-dark skin tones.

I've had great luck with this blush! It is very natural and it smells great! I use it with the brush that it came with, I think its great quality, even though you could use your own blush brush. I like this color best in the winter when my skin is lighter because it seems to show up better. Now I use it above my blush as more of a highlighter for summer.

I like this product a lot. It really does make your complexion look smoother, more even, more rosy. It also has a nice light/clean perfume to it. Sometimes I'll put it on and right afterwards my boyfriend will come hug me, and I'm paranoid I'm going to get pink powder all over his shirt but it hasn't happened yet so it definitely stays put. Not exactly an essential for me, though.

I think I might be too medium-skinned to use this, because it doesn't even show up on my skin. I don't like the formula either, because it makes my skin feel heavy and greasy after awhile (probably because I had to keep layering it on to even see some semblance of it).
I adore most Benefit products, and this is great for day wear. Lovely color, light, and long lasting. One of my favorites!

reviews.review_title: perfect blush for natural looking finish !
reviews.review_text: you MUST have this blush if you want natural looking make up. I never put heavy make up. I usually use Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer with this blush. It gives natural look. It's not too pink pink, but it just blends in with my skin color and even look like it's a natural cheek pinkish color! :) It's a MUST if you want natural finish look. :)
didn't like this product at all. I have an olive skin tone and the color disappears only leaving this milky white matte residue..not feeling it at all...
LOVE this product! It truly does take my complexion from dull to delightful...

When I first bought Dandelion I was not impressed. It totally escapes me the reasons why now, but it may have been because I had some bad experiences with Perfect 10. Anyways, it sat in my make up drawer for a few months before I used it again and voila! It was amazing! How did I ever live without this before!?  I use this as an all over powder more than anything. I swipe it first on my cheeks and forehead and then sort of blend it out from there. This gives me an absolute glow! My skin goes from sallow to incredible with a few strokes of the brush! If I don't feel like applying blush, I just sweep this a few more times on my cheeks and it looks great. The other thing I find wonderful about this is how well it blends into my skin. For some reason, powders of any kind make me look cakey, but not this! It is flawless!  The only problem I would have is that the brush is not my favorite (although, at least it actually came with a brush) nor the boxy packaging. It totally is a part of the Benefit style, but can be clunky in the makeup bag.  I hope Benefit never discontinues this!!! (Lol...have I used enought exclamation marks on this review? :P )
I love the color this powder makes my face!!

reviews.review_title: Pretty, pretty, pretty... this one changed my life
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I went from fashion intervention girl to Hey, were you at a spa this weekend? This is the magic that took ten years away and gave me a real, lovely glow. Also: it lasts for a long time. Just get it.

I think this is a lovely shade of 'ballerina pink.' It really does have tiny hints of lavender, etc, and just the right amount of teensy shimmer. Unfortunately, it just doesn't show up too much on my medium-light skin. It's good as an all over powder for subtly and sneakily making me look less sallow, but as a blush.. I have to apply TONS in order for it to register. And then my skin texture looks all powdery because I've put so much on. But on my whiter friends just a Touch of this and their cheeks have a gorgeous pinky pink natural pretty just been pinched color.
i like the color. it looks very natural. i like it!!
I love this product. It is barely there but yet it give my face freshness and glow. Not like I tried really hard to bring color to my tired face.
i have olive tanned skin. this doesn't even show. it looks better on fair skinned people.

This looks really good on my skin. When I wear it, I use it all over then a bit more on my cheeks at the end. It is subtle yet flattering, and I prefer this to the Georgia powder. I would repurchase if I ever ran out of this, even though I've had it for nearly a year and have barely scraped the bottom. Also, I like the brush that comes with the powder.

I am so in love with Dandelion by Benefit Cosmetics... A few strokes in the morning and I look refreshed and ready to go. I love that it's not a garish pink color, and very flattering to my light skin tone. A definite keeper in my beauty aresnal. I am becoming a Benefit girl.

I am very fair, so this is a perfect shade for me. It makes me look healthy and well rested. This, along with EyeBright and a sweep of BADgal Lash, is all I need for a quick pick-me-up. It's easy to incorporate into a more dramatic look, too. I get a great deal of value from this product, so I'm willing to pay a slightly higher price for something that works so well.

I was pretty skeptical about buying this blush, but it has seriously been one of my best purchases to date. I've always used a round brush for blush, so that was a little difficult for me to get used to, but other than that it was so easy to use. My complexion looked so much brighter, and I made sure to test it out by putting it on after about six hours of sleep and it still looked great. The color is almost sheer, just so that it looks completely natural. Dandelion is definitely now a huge part of my morning routine.
fair skinned. yes have to use more to really show, but is very sheer and looks natural. shows up great on pictures as glowy..slight sparkle so night time is great
It's a really pretty pink on me, but does nothing on my more tan friends. And It's little product for the price!

reviews.review_title: Great when used w/ a liquid cheek stain
reviews.review_text: I am only giving it 3 stars because i have fair to light skin yet it barely shows up on my cheeks when applied by itself. Even if I try to apply it more thickly to get more color, the color does not really build, instead I just end up with a lot of powder on my face which I end up brushing off because I don't like walking around looking like I have 3 cm of makeup on.  That being said, it's actually quite pretty when used over a red cheek stain. You get the prettiest soft pink glow. I'd recommend anyone interested in using this product as a blush to try it in-store first or be prepared to use it in conjunction with a liquid cheek stain.

reviews.review_title: Has zero effect on fair skin.
reviews.review_text: Neither brightens nor highlights. Not worth the money honestly.

I really want to love benefit but it keeps letting me down. Fairskin plus this blush look bad... you can't see the blush color on your skin. Maybe I did not apply enough but i was not impressed. I find their blushes are either too dark or too light for fair skin tones.

Dandelion is part of my secret arsenal. I don't like to look like I wear a lot of make up, but I do. I lightly brush it over tinted moisturizer to set it. It brightens my complexion. I'm on my second box.
I have very sensitive skin and this made me break out, which is unfortunate because it's such a pretty color.

This is another product that I will always keep with me. I love the scent and often use this as a touch up powder during the day. I use Benetint underneath and then highlight with the Dandelion powder. I'm on my third box now.  If I had to make any suggestions for improvement, I would say that it would be nice if they also made a more compact (flatter) packaging that you could carry in your purse a little easier... minor though

I am very pale and this product barely leaves any color on my face, however I bought it as more of a highlighter than a blush. It does a great job of giving you that dewy glow without looking glittery or shiny. When you look straight on you can't really tell, but when you turn your head the light will catch the product and your cheekbones will pop. I really like it -- i use it alone or over matte blush to give the dewy look. I'd recommend it.

Dandelion works really well with my very pale complexion. It's so natural looking, like a healthy flush. It's matte formula is very soft and just sheer enough (not too sheer that you don't see it, but sheer enough that your skin shows through and it looks natural). I love that Dandelion is a cool toned pink, it works so well with my skin tone. It's such a pretty pink!
barely shows up on my medium skintone

reviews.review_title: I fall in love with Benefit
reviews.review_text: Yes, it's lovely, it's famous, every girl loves pink color and so do I and that's why I chose this product without any consideration. Well...maybe my skin tone is not quite bright nor white so this sweet color doesn't fit me very well. Next time I will try another color. Anyway it's a good stuff.

I love this product and am on my third box. just what it says. sheer, light, and just enough color to make your face brighter but not look made up. impossible to use too much. just the best blush ever, no contest. and it lasts forever.
I have super fair skin and this is a very natural pink blush for me. In the summer, it gives kind of a pale shimmery look, but in the winter, it's a great pink glow.
Very sheer-perfect for summer. My daughter introduced me to Benefit Cosmetics, she's 34. I'm 61, and think they're super too.
people always tell me my skin looks flawless. ever since i got dandelion people are always asking if my flush is natural or not. many of them say i should lie and say it is!!!
This was a little light for my skin tone, but it's a really pretty pale pink.

I use Dandelion as a blush everyday. I sweep it down on my cheekbones to contour and then put a little on my nose and forehead to brighten my skin. It's not too shimmery, but it's just right. Also, Dandelion smells delicious.
lovely color very universal color, I dont like the box though it get dirty easily.

This one is probably my favorite everyday blush. After using many of the infamous Nars blushes I still think this one is perfect for that natural flush. It's very subtle and it gives me a look of healthy glowy skin! i highly recommend this one because not only is the packaging super cute, but it smells really nice too.

I started loving Benefit cosmetics for their nice packages, but quickly realized that this brand was so much more! I use this powder as a blush and it's amazing! It seems like you could never put too much; it always looks so pretty and natural! And the brush... so SOFT, and the perfect size to put just the right amount to the right places. Love this product!

When looking at this product, one may mistake it for a blusher. Upon application however, it is barely perceptible and does exactly what the description says it does: turns the complexion from dull to radiant. It is applied over the entire face.

I've used this blush for years and I still can't get over how awesome it is. : ) It makes me look naturally flushed (but not too pink/red) and it's virtually goof proof. I sometimes put too much blush on my brush and it looks too bright, but I've never had that problem with Dandelion! It's amazing, I swear it's truly goof proof. Plus, it looks fresh all day long.
I like this product. It is more subtle than I expected, but gives me a little bit of radiance! It wakes me up in the morning.
Pretty much my top favorite blush of all time. I'm a bare escentuals person, but there will always be a place in my makeup bag for Dandelion blush!!!
This is a lovely blush, the colour is highly pigmented . It gives you a beautiful flush. This is a staple for your everyday routine.
This is a fabulous light pink that I feel is ideal for fair skin. It gives me the most natural flush and I love it!

I love this product because it brights my skin instantly. The package is so cute and it smells great!!! btw, I think this powder works better for lighter skin tones as it might be too dark for those who have med/deep skin tones.
it really goes a long way..soft, bright. a good finishing touch.

reviews.review_title: A beautiful shade...but too light for me!
reviews.review_text: This is a great shade of pink but my skin is a bit too tan. iIt didn't show up on me! The Coralista is great!!!! and stays all day...so if your skin is lighter this item is perfect. Enjoy!!!!
Some people are pink. This is pink. it feels good on pink people.

I bought this the other day and at first I didn't notice anything. I never wear blush, but it looked pretty and I loved the box, so I figured I would try it. Then I was out with a friend (one who I spend everyday with) and she asked me if I was wearing blush. I told her I didn't think it showed, but when I looked at it in a different light I realized that it was REALLY pretty. It feels so soft to put on and it just looks really natural. This was my first benefit product and I went and bought more after this....I can not say enough good things about it!!!

This blush is the perfect color of pink to bring dimension to my face, but also look very natural. The powder is super fine and is seamless on the skin. Just one brush onto the cheeks and the color makes my face look fresh and illuminated.

This powder really is perfect. It gives me the right touch of pink. I use it as a hilighter and a blush on my makeup free days. It creates a beautiful fresh face. The color is also true to the picture with a hint of shimmer. Beautiful
Beautiful, natural pink blush. I love the color and the texture. No tweeny sparkles in this blush; very sophisticated!

reviews.review_title: Dandelion & Thrrrob - Lovely but too pricey
reviews.review_text: I am fair/light-skinned with a bit of red/pink in my face with a tendency toward dryness, so I have to be careful not to use blush that makes me look like I'm having a hot flash. The Dandelion is a fabulous color for fair lasses and you can build up the color to your desired depth. Surprisingly, the Thrrrob was not as intensely pink as I had expected, and this is another color that I can wear well. I like the fact that the box packaging keeps the extra powder inside without losing any product while you use a *real* long-handled blush brush to swirl over the powder cake. The boxes are only approx. 2 x 2 inches, so they are smaller than I expected. While I love the colors and consistency, I do not feel this is worth almost $30! I feel they are too expensive for what you get, so I will not be re-purchasing retail. I love Benefit's retro-type packaging, however.
This product does everything the description says. I have fair skin with pink undertones and this product doesn't make me look too pink and it doesn't have any glitter. Yay!
This product is amazing!! I can put it on with some mascara and look totally put together. I've been using it for 4 or 5 years, and it is the one thing I make sure I put on everyday.
Such a nice color of pink - makes me look refreshed
I like the fresh look I get when I apply this over my my make up. It does seem to brighten my face for a rested look and is not glittery -- just natural.

This is my second pot of the Dandelion. The first lasted almost a year with nearly daily application. It is the perfect shade of pink for brightening my skin tone. I wear it as blush. However, I have fair skin and it might not do as well on darker skin. They have changed the brish and it is not as nice as the brush the first time around.
this makes your skin look more luminous but it does not give much color- it worked better on me when I had a tan

reviews.review_title: Such a pretty color; too bad it does nothing.
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this blush because the color was so pretty in the box, but unless you have extremely fair, porcelain skin (and I am quite fair), this blush might disappear. The brush is convenient but only if you want a stripe of color on your cheeks.

I love this product. In the description, it says it's a highlighting powder, but I use it as a blush. It has a scent, but NOT a strong one. and it smells good. I like the fact that it's really lightweight so it doesnt feel heavy. it does not cake on your skin. it is buildable which is fantastic! the bristles of the brush is alright. it's senthetic but it feels really soft on your skin so no worries. whenever i use the product, i do get compliments such as, you look different today, i just dont know what it is or your skin looks healthy and not pale. I deff recommend this product to anyone who wants to give their look a little warmth. I have oily/combo skin and it does not clog my pores/irritate/breakout my skin. All skin types can prolly use this.
Have been using this product for 3 month, wonderful highliting for your cheeks!
a little goes a long way with this product! one stroke on each cheek and you're ready to go!  i believe this is better with fair complexions, though.  smells really good too~

The Benefit Dandelion now is my favorite cosmetics and I use it everyday, it's so natural and brings my lovely looking!  I've recommended it to my friend, and she bought one last week, she also loves it!
Very cute, very pink. Maybe a little too pink for my skintone... Not as shimmery as I thought it would be. I think I should have gone with coralista. But still, very cute.
I am very like this pink color, It makes me looks beautiful when i use it. I like it

I have pale skin, and this color really showed up on my skin. It's more of blush for me than anything. Very cute and it smells nice! The brush is sort of lame because if you leave it in the box, it gets all dusty with the powder and can be a little messy.

I love this product. I was very hesitent to go for it because I seriously doubted that it could do a better job than a drugstore blush. I was wrong because this powder is amazing. It's just the right amount of color so I look alive and glowing, but not like I have blush on. This is now an everyday product that I will repurchase for the rest of eternity. Of course it doesn't hurt that the packaging is so completely adorable.

I've used this blush for 7 years now... I'm positively addicted to Dandelion and Georgia. It's never overwhelming and I never have an oh-my-god-was-i-not-looking-at-a-mirror moment with benefit blushes - you just can't over-do it. Always looks perfect. I'm looking forward to trying their new coral-colored blush!
Love this blush for fair skin. It's got a great soft color that is natural. I've been using this for about 3 years and I don't think i'll be switching anytime soon!
This brightens as an all over face powder or a blush. I layer it over tarte cheek stain (in tickled). The two colors look great together and the powder makes the blush last longer.

Adorable packaging, great color! Totally recommend this product to fair skinned girls. Gives a nice, natural pink flush to cheeks and is even appropriate for young girls wanting to start wearing makeup. I even wear it on my eyes!
Too pale even for my very fair skin. Needs tons of layering to show up and doesn't last long. Overall very dissapointed. Not worth the price.

It's hard to choose a powder blushy color online.... this one is very light, and didn't really show up at all on my untanned skin... so will be unuseable in summer months for sure.
