I did try it as an overall touch... but really can't see it on my face. Product is good, my color choice was off. I am not a dark complected person... probably average caucasion skin tone.

This product didn't do too much for me. It barely showed up on my skin, and it was quite expensive for something that you cannot even see. Does smell nice though and the container is cute. A lot smaller than I expected.
This is a great product for an afternoon pick up. Love it!!!
Perfect color and texture. Nice over cream blush to set it. Gives skin a soft glow without over doing it.
I absolutely looooove this blush. It is so subtle and natural looking. It even smells lovely. I would def recommend to anyone with fair/light skin.
very pretty color and nice smell.
This color was too light for my skin. It is a great color...just not for me...

I just reorded ths blush and have been using it for years. It is just the right shade of pink...not too bright or bubblegum, but just enough flush to look great day or night. I am fair skinned with dark hair.
I love this blush! It smells great and blends so well. It stays on all day.
awesome product, compliments my fair skin and blue eyes.

This powder takes your face from sad to happy in one sweep. The pink powder blends all your makeup together and makes your skin glow. I love this powder and I have been using this for quite a number of years. I always let my friends try this powder and they always end up ordering it. There is no better product on the market.

Bought it as a blush--mistake--it's a highlighting powder. It's very light--does provide highlights temporarily; but I found the color did not have any staying powder (I used it on top of my bare minerals powder foundation. All in all, it's a pretty color and a pretty package; but that's about all I can say about it.
I have fair skin and I love this stuff. It's very light so it's easy to control the color you want.

I have heard so many good things about THE dandelion. Recently bought one, just tried twice, not too crazy about it. It may be just a highlighter for people have fair skin, not really show up with one or two stroke. And when you put on more, along with the pink, I also see some bronze like undertone, ? Maybe I need to play with it to make the good out of this famous stuff.

The blush in Danlion smells really good and every time I put it on, my boyfriend always says that my cheeks look pretty and natural. The only thing I can't bear is that it breaks me out like crazy.. I didn't realize it until I stopped using it for a week and all my breakouts went away. I don't like the fact that it made me break out and I had to end up returning it.

Their boxes tend to look old quickly when you have it in a makeup bag. The color was waaaay to light for me and I had to use alot to even see the color, but by then you noticed I had powder on my cheek. I liked some of their other blushes better then this one which I didn't notice when I put it on. It does smell nice though.

I have been enjoying this blush so much. It' just perfect for spring. The color is very natural looking. I use NARS Orgasm in the winter months but I prefer this for spring and summer. There is no shimmer or glitter which I am happy with. I am now anxious to try Hoola for bronzing. I really like Benefit products and this has taken the #1 spot. Try it, you won't be sorry!
I adore this blush. Best make-up purchase I've made in awhile (and I buy a lot of make-up!). It goes on perfectly and it's the perfect shade. Benefit makes superb products.
This shade is very subtle, but pretty. It looks as though you have a glowing, natural flush, and it is very flattering on my fair skin. Perfect for the spring and summertime!

reviews.review_title: love it, but fades a little
reviews.review_text: i think this is a great product - i love it and wear it almost every day. smells really good! it does fade a little throughout the day, but that's not a deal-breaker for me! i recommend it.

This brightens up my face and smells really good. I've received a few compliments and have been asked what new product I've been using. A little really goes a long way so this will last you quite a long time. On days when my skin is a bit oilier, I'll use a face brush to apply this.

This blush is perfect for my fair skin, its not too much and its so light and pinky it leaves a perfect rosy glow that looks natural! my mom hates the way it is in a box, but I dont mind! its just kind of big in your bag

this powder is sooo gorgeous. i wouldn't call it a blush, but it's not a highlighter, either...more of a luminizing powder. on my fair skin, it makes me look fresh and glowy. it is sheer, though, not too highly pigmented, but i like things that allow for buildable color. no dull skin here.

I really like this powder. It goes on smoothly---no cakey--and gives my face a youthful glow. It can also double as blush. I put a couple of strokes on over my basic blush. It also smells really good and comes with a great brush.
very pretty color, makes you look healthy pink, not blush pink
great powder, very sheer color but does brighten the cheeks.
Love the color and smell! It's a great product! I will definitely buy it again.
I have been using the Dandelion pressed powder for years, and I love the smooth feeling when I apply it to my face.

I think this is the perfect blush for my pale skintone. It provides a perfect healthy glow. I use it alone, but more often I use it to top off Benetint or any other darker blush.  It has a WONDERFUL smell. I love the little box it comes in (It lasts FOREVER). The brush is PERFECT for either a long side-sweep or a short little stroke.

The SA recommended Dandelion for my coloring - medium yellow skin tone with black hair, brown eyes (Asian). I thought it would be too pale, but it goes on beautifully. I look glowing and not overly flushed, as red is generally recommended for my coloring. The color in the box is deceiving... it goes on lightly but with a very very slight shimmer that makes you look radiant and youthful. LOVE THIS COLOR!

I do not, and would not use this as a blush. For highlighting and luminizing purposes, it is excellent. I use this instead of translucent powder to set my make up and give a little bit of 'oomph' to my face. It is not overly sparkly or shimmery when on, and you would have to be very heavy-handed in your application to achieve that sort of effect.
best and only blush I ever use!! build-able color, and perfect shade of pink for fair/light skin. instantly makes me look awake and fresh. it smells soo good too!

i've been using dandelion for about 3 years now and am still hooked! i'm one of those fair (kinda PALE) asians with dark hair - i use this as a blush, and i also dust a little on my forehead and chin to give me more color. it gives me an awesome natural glow!!  Also, sometimes i dust on a few extra layers and put on loads of black mascara for a real 'dolly' look. its very versatile as a complexion brightener and a blush!  and although i usually toss out pre-packaged applicator brushes, this one by benefit is GREAT!  a word of caution though - its probably best to use Dallas when you're tan. i once got myself uber brown on holiday in thailand and dandelion looked almost silly. Dallas is all kinds of awesome too!

I absolutely love this product. The powder can be used as blush alone if you have fair skin (you may have to layer a little), and it looks amazing overtop of any pinky blush. I have fair skin and I can use it all over my face to achieve a nice glow. Everyone always tells me how beautiful I look when I wear this product. Definitely worth any amount of money, and the powder lasts for a LONG time.

I really love how this product looks on my skin. It's the most amazing color of pink! Makes me look healthier and more awake in the morning when applied to the apples of my cheeks.  I'm a little confused by those who say they use this as a highlighting powder all over the face, though. It's very pink and to me would only work as a blush. I mean...would you put blush all over your face?

Best powder out there - gives you even coverage with a hint of sparkle and pink. I use it all over and then throw throb on there for a blush and it is great. Most days it's just mascara, dandelion and lipgloss...very simple and easy!
very natural and very cute
Wonderful color...great consistency. Lasts all day long. Love it!
VERY NATURE COLOR! MY FACE LOOKS VERY HEALTHY

I love Dandelion; it always makes me look much more refreshed than I feel with 3 little toddlers running around! My 2 year old daughter also craves Dandelion! It is the only makeup I let her try on. I just bought this for my friend with same age children, too!

I'm fair skinned with freckles, typical irish skin and I LOVE this product! It does exactly what it says, makes your skin look more awake and refreshed with a nice glow ... in the summer once my face has a bit of a suntan I layer this over Dallas face powder and the result is great, try it!

The best! Dandelion is the perfect pick-me-up after a sleepless night (or that extra glass of vino the night before). A great highlighter and actually minimizes undereye circles. I've purchased this several times and won't let it run out!
love it! perks up my fair skin and it lasts forever. Great buy!

I absolutly love this product! The product gives you a healthy beautiful glow. It doesn't make you feel like you a wearing a TON of makeup, but rather gives you a natural glow. I will continue to buy this product and I suggest you do too!
This blush is perfect for us fair skinned girls- but can also be layered to stand out more on darker tones- one of my favorite blushes.
i love it. the color was so cute and the smell was great.

i absolutely love the sheer color of this blush, i tried it on for the first time today, the sheer pink looks amazing on my cheeks, very spring like, gives me that natural pink looks like it came from within my skin, the smell is also good very fresh and pretty
This brightened my face up, i just love this product. The color was perfect, it was recommended by one of the workers there.
This is so understated that it's perfect for someone who doesn't want to look like they are wearing much makeup. Just a quick swipe and you look a bit more refreshed and glowing.
A very easy going blush for fair skinned people like me. It's light enough that it won't make you look like a clown. A nice soft pink, reminds me of a pinker orgasm, but without sparkle
this is my favorite blush. It gives a pretty glow that makes you look well rested. It also smells nice, which lifts my spirits every time I put it on.

I love this product. I have very fair skin and it works really well as a blush for me. I tried so many colors and brands of blush and nothing compares to this...and the scent is AMAZING!!! Also the brush works well for the product, I wouldn't use a different brush it doesn't work as well.

reviews.review_title: Too light for my light to medium skintone
reviews.review_text: The packaging is lovely and the scent as well... unfortunately the dandelion did not show up on me at all so I returned it!
This is another good one from Benefit. It is a very subtle powder/blush. Good for an understated frsh face look. I use as a blush and then just a single sweep as a setting powder. Very nice.
This is a fun powder to use for an all over highlighter without the overly shimmery effect you get with other highlight-powders. The pink plays up my dull fair skin.
I love the color and it looked great on my skin. Its great for days when I don't feel like putting on foundation, I just put this on and it brightens my face up.

I love this product so much! The powder is such a delicate and adorable shade of pink. It's just enough. It screams springtime, too. I love the brush...it's just the right bristle length, just the right size. I have very fair skin and it doesn't look as obvious as some products I have tried. I use it on my cheekbones with one little swipe on the bridge of my nose. I have some little broken capillaries starting to show up on the apples of my cheeks, and this stuff will actually hide them without putting on a huge layer of it. The color is light and sheer, but the coverage is not. This product is scented...it smells great, but for those who are sensitive to perfumes, you should be aware of that. I'm so glad I purchased this, though. It's wonderful!

I've been a fan of this blush for 5 years now. I have fair skin, and it give my cheeks just a hint of color to make me look more awake. I also love that the powder has a subtle sparkle to it. However, I wouldn't recommend it to people with darker skin because the powder would probably be too pale to have much of an effect.
This product is amazing! Dandelion is the perfect shade to highlight anywhere on your face. I use it on my cheeks and dab a bit on my forehead and nose. It brightens my face right up!
I have a lot of blushes at home but no product looks as good on me as the benefit dandelion blush. I highly recommend it to anyone with fair/light skin.
Very beautiful and very natural

I bought this because I wanted to try blush, but my skin tends to be pretty rosy already and I didn't want to overdo it. I had heard that this blush was flattering for all skin types, and thus far, I LOVE it! Also long lasting, and well worth the price. A small amount goes a long way for a very subtle glow. Light for my oily skin too. Sometimes I mix a little with powder bronzer as well.

I have somewhat medium skin. I have tried this on my cheek but they do not show up. They are not very pigmented. If you have fair skin, I highly recommend this. However, if you have medium or dark skin, i do not recomment this.
really cute color and makes your skin look healthy~~

I loveeee this blush ! Adds just enough color to my skin for that beautiful blushing glow. Worth every cent; I have had it for over 6 months & I still have enough to last me another month or two. Benefit has amazing boxed powders with the cutest packaging. Haha. :]
This is perfect for people with fair skin. You can even wear it alone to look bright and rested.

Even though this can be used as a blush, I have been using this as a finishing powder. It is luminous and provides this beautiful natural color of happiness. It smells great too. I would definitely buy this again.
Even if this is the only thing I put on after washing my face in the morning it gives me a look like I am fresh and alive!

I like it a lot. I was worried it would be a little strong for me, but it was very subtle. I have just slightly above fair skin that tans nice wit dark blone hair and blue eyes and this worked well for me. Was not let down.

Apply lightly with a different blush brush and this will look really pretty on pale skin as a blush or a highlighter on darker skin. It does smell nice! I got this as a present a few years ago and these things last forever, I do wish they had a compact that was more travel ready with a mirror. This is one of the prettiest pinks ever though, give it a try especially if you are light-medium skinned.
I was hoping for a little more out of this product..but overall i do like it. It smells really good!!
Maybe too subtle. Barely noticeable even on my very fair skin.
i love dandelion!!! this is the perfect base blush and then you mix with your fav blush. it's gives me an amazing glow.
I have very fair skin and this is the perfect light pink shade for a little brightening and blush for every day.
This doesn't provide much coverage but I do like the scent of this powder, and the soft, smooth finish it gives.
I have very fair skin and I had to put on 8-10 coats of dandelion to notice any color. It gave me a rosy glow, but not enough color.
It's a perfect shade of rosy pink for my cheeks. My new favorite color!

It took me a while to find a blush that didn't make me look like a clown. I have fair skin and just wanted a soft looking blush. This gives just a hint of pink color to make your cheeks pop. This container travles well too and comes with its a good brush.

I have very fair skin and in the winter I use this as a blush and in the summer as a highlighter. It also is very nice as a base eyeshadow color in pink. It is a perfect pink flush. If you have darker skin it might be a bit light.
This powder is very natural and looks like you just woke up with rosy cheeks. I thought the color was too light and wouldn't show but it does!

I have never been able to find the right blush or highlighter until I discovered this Usually blush looks like way to much on my face but not with this dandelion! Its so natural and makes me look vibrant. I only need a very little amount to achieve the desired effects. Plus it smells good and comes in pretty packaging :)

I do love this powder. It's a perfect shade of blush for my fair skin, and I like the brush, too. One sweep of the brush and I'm done! I find I don't need to reapply later in the day.  The size is very generous, so I know it will take a long time to use up. That makes Dandelion a great value. Unfortunately, the paper box is a poor container for a product that will last so long. Because of the frail container, I do not carry this item in my purse. The good thing is that the color lasts long on me so I don't really need to have it with me.  It's described as a luminizer, but I don't think that is very accurate. It is a blush.  I really don't think this would work on all complexions, but it's terrific on mine.  It is a product I would recommend as a great starter for a teenager who is beginning to use make up, because it would take a lot of effort to put too much on--it's that sheer.  Very natural and doesn't seem to be either warm or cool, so it probably works with a full range of eye/lip colors. One of my favorites.
I am in love with this. it smells awsome and it really does give me that ive had 8 hours of sleep glow. with or without any other makeup it still looks great :)

This is the best product I've found to fake awake on those mornings when I need it. Product can be used in a variety of ways; eyeshadow, blush, highlighter over other make-up, and lip color. I only give it 4 stars because the packaging is bulky and doesn't fit into a makeup bag.
This is gorgeous on fair skin, it really gives me a lovely soft glow. Definitely recommend.

I use this product on a daily basis and it always brightens up my complexion. Sometimes I will use it as my blush and others I will apply it to the top of my cheekbones and a darker shade just beneath for sculpting my features. This product usually lasts me about 8 months.

Evens out your complexion when used alone; leaves a nice finish when used over make-up. I don't wear a base: just moisturizer, blush, and a tinted face gel. When I brush this over my whole face, it adds just a bit of sheen, and it is very natural. Brightens up your whole look. I don't know how I ever lived without it!

reviews.review_title: It's piiink and I love pink!
reviews.review_text: I don't think this product does much for me but it is pink...I find myself skipping it, unless I happen to see it staring back at me from my train case.

This is a great product for those days where you just want a natural I've just been out in the cold look. It's most effective when used as an all-over face colour, as a blush it's just not powerful enough. Also, I find this looks best on foundation free skin, because you can layer it more without it looking cakey.  All in all, a nice product for those days when you just want a low-maintenance and fresh faced look.

i love the sheer color; it's a perfect shade of pink, very natural looking, but best for those with light or fair skin. looks natural ,not chalky. One problem; when i recived it, there was no protective wrapper and it appeared as if soemone had tampered with the powder.
very nice subtle highlighting powder, i prefer a different brush but otherwise this is an excellent product, as are many of Benefit products

This is a great highlighting powder. It looks best when lightly layered over my everyday blush (NARS orgasm) rather than by itself. I put just one swipe on the apples of my cheeks and it gives me a slightly pinched, healthy, subtle glow. I really like that it barely has any shimmer too it unlike so many other highlighting powders. The only con is that I can‚Äôt wear it alone since its too light for my skin tone (for reference, I have medium-dark olive skin with golden undertones)‚Äîit made my skin look a bit ashy when I applied it without my blush.

absolutely love this! works great as a light brush and is subtle enough to be combined with other brighteners. it's not sparkly like other highlighters, so doesn't come off as tacky. my only complaint is that it is VERY subtle, so if you wan't something more intense try the darker shades. it even smells nice
I like this Dandelion Blush. IT'S PERFECT. I can use it properly though i am a beginner of makeup. I highly recommend this product for u!!!!

I use this as a blush only. It's great in the dead of winter when I look super pale and really flattering to my peach undertoned complexion. Not something I would use in the summer when I have slightly more color.

For those with fair skin this product does wonders to brighten up the face in a natural, heathly looking way. I wear it as blush on those days when I don't want to wear a lot of make-up. I also use it over a cream blush when I am going out. The best part about Danelion is its versatility; you can use it as blush, eyeshadow, a highlighter and even with lip gloss. However the container it comes in is not very travel friendly.
I really liked Dadelion - it adds the perfect amount of color goes on smoothly and lasts all day. Good on cheeks and eyes too.

reviews.review_title: one  really  great  powder  - awesome on fair skin
reviews.review_text: I have used dandelion for years, probaly my favorite - delivers all over soft color especially on fair skin...wears well all day - very smooth - excellent

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a Natural Glow especially for 50+
reviews.review_text: I love trying out new blush, but I always return to Benefit's Dandelion. It is sheer and natural with a subtle glow. For my age bracket, it is great as it is so sheer it does not settle into or cake on the 'fine lines'. Nor does it leave those tell-tale blush blotches. The only downside is that it tends to fade and needs to be reapplied at least 2 times during the work day. For evening I apply this over a cream blush.

reviews.review_title: Smells good but not very visible
reviews.review_text: I wanted to use to use this product as a highlighter. I have olive toned skin and it doesn't show all that much. The packaging and description is a bit misleading. It is not at all a highlighter and it doesn't have any shimmer but it smells delicious and its airiness and and soft blush is pleasant.

reviews.review_title: Great Blush for Creating a Subtle Glow
reviews.review_text: I started using Dandelion a few years ago when benefit discontinued my favorite loose powder blush. This is one of the only blush colors that gives my fair skin a soft glow without looking garrish. I recommend layering it with the Benefit fan-brush. My only complaint is that I have to use quite a bit to achieve a visible flush and that causes the $28 price tag to be a bit steep as I have to replace the product every 3-6 months (more emolient blushes last me for years). That aside, the color is a dream and the product has never caused me to break-out. I'd especialy recommend it to blushing brides to be looking for a luminese glow.

I bought this years ago and I still use it. It's a wonderful sheer color with a subtle shimmer that makes me face look wide awake while I'm definitely not feeling it. It's also awesome to dust over your eyelids for an extra pop.
This is one of my favorite Benefit products. I use this everyday. After I put my blush on I sweep it over my cheeks, forehead, nose and chin.
believe all the hype about Benefit's powders. it's just utterly gorgeous, light, and shimmery, and the way it beautifies your skin and entire face is something amazing. totally worth every penny.

I am very, very pale with brown eyes and blonde hair and have a hard time buying blush. I never get a good color. The pinks look so fake and the plums/wines are way too dark. Peach and coral doesn't flatter me at all. I found this one from Benefit and it's almost perfect. The color is a great, neutral, natural-looking blush color. My only problem is that I cannot stand the brush that comes with it...tends to make a wide streak. Secondly, I wish it was just a tad darker. It's so light, I have to apply and apply and apply to get the color to show. I tried the Throb by Benefit as well, but that is way too pinky. This one is a better color.

When I found this...I was in heaven. I have very light skin and this is the perfect blush for my skin tone. If you have light or fair skin, like me, you should pick this up. It doesn't even look like you are wearing anything, it looks totally natural. :)
maybe my skin color is too weird for this powder. i am somewhat between medium toned and olive. i don't notice anything when i apply it. but it smells delicious!!

I like that this powder makes my face look soft and feel soft but it didn't really make me look awake or highlight at all. I bought it because it said it was a highlighting powder, I don't use it for that at all, but I do use it as an all over powder.
This blush is by far my favourite! I use it when I want some colour on my cheeks for day.
This shows up really really pink on my skin, when what i wanted a silver highlighter, the product itself wasnt bad, i just expected it to be a little more sheer.

I absolutely love this product! I've used it for about 5 years and it's my go-to product when I recommend a great blush/face brightener. It's perfect for that no-make-up look. You can use this alone, or use with a highlighter or another shade of blush. It's just too good to pass up! <3
love this! would definitely recommend it.. not as pigmented as NARS blushes, but it gives such a natural look!
I love the formulation of this powder, I just dont think the dandelion color was quite right for me. I do wear it, but it doesnt do a whole lot for me.
I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product. I put it on last over my foundation and everything else and it really gives you that healthy, well rested glow. It also smells amazing!
wonderdul! natural beauty

Dandelion makes my face brighton up. My friends never cease to remind me how good my complexion looks after I use it. I recommend it to everyone who wants to have a cheerful smooth looking complexion.
I love this product! My skin is very fair and it is just the right shade to use as a blush.
Love this powder-tried it on a whim-and continue to love it because it looks so natural and brightens my complexion without looking too pink or fake
i love this blush! it's the perfect pink for me & its the only blush i use. i will probably try the other blushes benefit has.

This is a great blush/highlighter, but it does go on very sheer which is both a positive if you're going for a natural daytime look, and a negative for a nighttime pop. I really like that it gives you that just flushed look, and it's so light that it doesn't go on thick or cakey. The brush is easy to use also for maximum cheekbone accentting.
Men commented on how great I looked the first morning I was back wearing this! Gives a great non-makeup fresh glow!!!
Soft, subtle, girly, pretty pink color, wear it as a blush, and as a highlighter, then i use high beam for a soft glow.. I LOVE BENEFIT!!

This blush is very light and baby soft. Perfect for people who wear light makeup. I add a bit of bronzer to my cheeks when going out, but overall im hooked. Makes your cheeks look soft and young. I love it!

I love Benefit products in general, but this is one of my favorites. I am quite fair, and most blushes look like...well...blush, and not like rosy, healthy skin. This product looks great on me, stays put, isn't overly pigmented for us fair gals, and lasts FOREVER. Admittedly, I only apply twice or three times a week (I very rarely wear much makeup), but it's lasted me for more than eight months!
Gorgeous, made my skin shimmer and glow. Just enough to color my cheeks lightly pink.
LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!! This is a great product and it really works to make the skin even. I wear this to work and it keeps me looking good for my 10 hour shifts.

I use Benefit Dandelion as a blush on my extremely pale complexion and it just illuminates my face completely. I use it daily since July and just now in December that I can start seeing the bottom of the case. It also has a slight shimmer to it and lasts the whole day, thus looking very natural.

I heard so many good things about dandelion, even as i checked out the gal at the register was telling me how awesome it was. I don't notice any luminescent quality in it. It can't even be used as a blush cause there's barely any pigment.

reviews.review_title: Not for the pale and interesting!
reviews.review_text: Terrible for fair skin types, I didn't see any color at all or any highlighting effect!

I have been using this light pink blush for several years now. It is a great color to accent your cheekbones with. It makes me feel more awake and works well as your skin color changes with the seasons.
I've been using Dandelion for years, and it's definitely a staple! It's such a great, soft color that anyone can use to brighten up their face.
Nice color and the smell is nice, but pigment doesn't stay on your cheek very long. Overall, it is a good product for people who want a fresh and natural look.
Powder is too sheer and does not stay on very long at all. I'm returning mine.

it is pale--so I wonder how it works for those of you fortunate enough to have darker skin--but it brightens nicely without looking (gasp!)Pink; just gives a nice subtle lightening effect. Not a blush, really--more a highlighter. I like it on my upper cheek bones, temples, and a little on the outer, fatty edge of my upper eyelids.

This product is wonderful! It's one of those things where you don't really see much difference when initially putting it on, but I get tons of compliments when using this on how pretty my face looks. (Isn't that the point of make-up?) I also LOVE how good my face/skin look in photos taken while wearing this. It's amazing. This product is worth the money. I haven't tried it with any of the tints, but after reading some of these reviews I will have to try it.

This is a good product. Don't think it is really worth the price, but I am a compulsive makeup junkie so thought I would try it. I think it makes me look younger and I wear it over my foundation and mineral veil. It gives a pretty innocent looking glow.

I kept reading reviews about this product and thought what the heck! I'm so glad i bought it. It is very sheer, and I could not see much color. however, if i wear it alone all over my face, everyone keeps saying wow! you look so porcelain-y today! or you look different! and the most : your face is glowing! i didn't expect for it to work for me immediately, but it did. the moment i walked out the door, the comments keep on coming.  but for night i want a little bit more dramatic, so i swipe on only 2 small dots of BENETINT, and then i swiped on the dandelion a few times till i get some color, andd the color is is just beautiful. It's not the horrid bright pink but the sheer-but-its-there pink. It almost looked like the kind of flush you get when you're in love. this time, the compliments were whose the guy? or wow, your face is really pretty tonight or the one i get most: your face is really attractive nowadays, what's your secret? I KID YOU NOT.  i know it may not work for everyone, but it did for me. and it's so great that i just felt like i had to share with everyone. try it on first and see whether you like it!
I don't see a difference on my skin when I use this product. It's a nice powder but it doesn't do much for my over all look.
Beautiful color!! and very convenient to use because the brush is included! I've been using this product for years and it is my absolute favorite!! Highly recommend this product!!
This gives my cheeks a rosey hue. I go from pale to pretty in one stroke! I love it!

reviews.review_title: Cannot live with out this powder!
reviews.review_text: I adore this product. I use it every day for a tiny bit of color, and when I want to play up my cheeks I layer it on top of Benefit's Posie Tint. It creates the perfect flush that lasts forever! Plus the box is adorable.
Very subtle brightening. I have dark circles under my eyes and this helps lighten them.
I love this product - it's perfect for my very fair skin. I use it everyday as a blush and highlighter. Looks great and really wakes up my face.
I use this as a blush. gives a very natural pink glow to my fair skin. It looks like the natural flush I get. It makes my face look softer.
great for pale skin and people who don't want to look like they are wearing blush, but still want a natural glow. it's just gorgeous. definitely my favorite blush.

I originally bought this product as a blush but when the time came to use it, I was fairly disappointed that the product was too light to be used as a blush. It is however great for an all over pick me up.

reviews.review_title: Warning: this is really fairy dust in disguise
reviews.review_text: I'll admit it... initially, I was drawn to Dandelion because the box just looked so gorgeous. The fact that it's made out of a durable cardboard doesn't bother me at all. So I immediately snatched it up and excitedly took it home to see what kind of wonders it would do on my face. Once I was finished taking in the beauty of the lid, I lifted it up to reveal a square-ish, stiff brush that's included for sweeping your cheeks with. It's seperated from the highlighting powder by a clear plastic liner so that you don't need to stick your hands in powder every time you need to use the brush. One sweep of this magic substance made me feel just like a princess, I'm not kidding you. The brush is very structured & packed together and quite truthfully, not exactly the best face brush out there, but I have no significant complaints about it because it applies the perfect amount of shimmer to my cheeks. It's not luxuriously soft, but not scratchy and course either, so my face doesn't get irritated by it. A couple loose strands of hair may fall out of the brush in the first couple of uses, but it's not really a problem because you can just brush them off of your face. Even though I'm asian, my skin is still exposed to a lot of sunlight, so I'm actually quite tan, which makes this powder not show up as well. However, I'm satisfied with the subtle glow it gives me, because I'm not the type of person who likes to go over-the-top for day makeup, and even then, I don't even have make up on 99% of the time. If I layer this over a little blush, it shows up more and makes my face look like it's BEAMING WITH SUNSHINE! :D Try it, it looks utterly gorgeous over blush, and doesn't look glittery or tacky at all. It takes only a second to sweep this almost-translucent pink powder over my cheeks, and I should add that it smells absolutely delicious as well. I'm not sure how to describe it; the scent is not too sweet but still pleasant, has a floral tinge to it, and smells a little like fresh lemons on a breezy day. Its fragrance isn't overpowering though; you only notice it when you're brushing it on. Even though this highlighting powder does not show up dramatically on my face, I still take joy in sweeping a bit of this on my cheeks whenever I need a mood lift. The boost of happiness that I get whenever I brush on this powder is itself enough to make my purchase more than worth it. Benefit's Dandelion is love in a box.

Benefit's Dandelion luminizer is excellent. I usually shy away from luminizers because I have very oily skin and go for more of a matte look, but the shimmer is very subtle in Dandelion so that even I can use it. Dandelion is one of my favorite colors in the Benefit boxed powders collection. Superb product!

I bought Dandelion after I purchased Bluff Dust, Benetint, bo-ing concealer, and Some kinda gorgeous foundation faker. I use Bluff dust all over and benetint on the apples and I dust Dandelion over the Benetint from the nose to the temple in a sweep across the cheek. It looks so pretty from the instant I tried it. It sparkles and shimmers and it's a light wash of pink. Just the blush I was looking for. I gave it 4 stars because of the price and the packaging. I agree that the packaging needs to be more durable. I like the brush but it did shed bristles on my cheek at first application. But I wanted it so bad that the price didn't matter so much. I did expect the container to be larger but it was very small. I'll keep using it and looking pretty for as long as I can!

This is my everyday go to blush. I have light to medium skin. I'm italian so depending on the season I am either light or medium. I do put a bronzer on as well prior to this. It gives a perfect hint of pink. It's not to much but it gives you a nice glow. It is really great for Brunettes while the Georgia is best for blondes.

I never used to wear blush, but since I tried this product I wear it every day. I used to think blush looked faked. However, this blush gives a perfect natural glow that adds tons of feminine flair. I tend to have oily skin but this matte blush lasts all day without a smudge.

Packaging: This product comes with a nice brush that I wouold say isn't too great or soft and the shape of the brush makes it difficult to apply the blush properly ont he cheeks.  It comes in a cute box as well with a top lid. The box is made of higher quality (paper?)  Product: The product may look gorgeous in the box, but it defintiely does not show up on the skin. Unless you are lookign for something that is very subtle, barely even there, then this is not the product (also, I am fair skin just for reference).  This product does however smell great. that is just about it
Beautiful color. May not work well for darker skin tones.
My friend always use this when they come over. Looks pretty in the box and gorgeous on skin

I've been using this product for years as a face powder to give my skin a nice brighter glow. It's subtle enough to use all over, and provides a nice shimmer and color balance on my face. It's too light for blush, in my opinion.
Couldn't even see it when I put it on. I wanted pink, rosy cheeks. I could not even tell that I had it on.
this blush is light,has a shimmer to it. i have light to medium skin and it definately does what it says it does ( for me anyways)

Very happy with this blush/hilighter. I have a very fair complexion and find that this product is perfect for my skin tone. Use a little dusting all over the entire face for a quick pick-me-up or concentrate on the cheeks for a nice light pink blush. I bought mine about a month or so ago, and have easily used it everyday. The only thing I'm not too thrilled with is the brush, doesn't serve much purpose, I prefer to use my blush or powder brush for better effect.

I'm a very fair-skinned person (often companies don't make concealer light enough for me!!) and I've happily used this blush for years. It actually is as close to a bronzey look as I'll ever get. That said, if you're not light-skinned this might be a nice luminizer. Either way, the stuff lasts forever - I'm still using the one I bought ages ago.
I have been using Dandelion for years. I don't like to look like I am wearing very much makeup and this is the perfect blush for that. It gives the perfect glow to the cheeks.

This is pretty in the box, but I didn't really see the benefits (haha) of it. I even have light skin. I guess there was a little bit of a light, sparkly pink, but not nice enough that I would repurchase.
This is a prefect blending and brightening powder. The soft color helps blush look natural and brightens the face just so.
This is a great, subtle shade that is perfect for pale skin.

I first bought this product a few years ago, and loved it instantly! I wear just a light sweep all over my face after I apply my foundation. It gives my skin a very natural glow, without caking, streaking or fading.

Dandelion is a perfect name for this! It's soft and perfect and completely brings my face alive...even when it's not. The only complaint is that during the summer I have to switch because it is too light.
Dandelion is a light and natural looking cheek color, or its great for an all over finish. Although I feel when i use it as cheek color I have to use a lot of it in order to get the color I like.
I love this on top on my cream blush. Also, it wakes my eyes up and everything, especially if I don't sleep much. I love this item. I'm on my 3rd one!
This little box of shimmer goes a long way...Just don't use it anywhere other than your cheeks if your skin isn't fair toned.
It looks so natural on my asian tan skin. I love it! However, I think the package could be improved to be at least moist-proof. I just do not like the papery kind.

Dandelion gives you a very nature looking. It is very good for natural looking. And it is so light you never need worried about you put too much on you face. I use it to give me a natural and healthy looking, when I am too lazy to do some makeup. But, you can't use it with your smokey eyes.

reviews.review_title: Just what I was looking for
reviews.review_text: Perfect to keep me from looking too pale as I have no color on my cheeks normally. Even though I have light skin, I still need to sweep a couple of layers for the color to show if I use it as a cheek blush. Otherwise I just use it lightly all over for a subtle glow.

I love the benefit powders and this one just looked sooo pretty in the box so I had to try it. It didn't blend as nicely into my skin as I hoped but maybe it's just my skintone (I'm a pale warm shade) but a little bit in the right angles on my face goes along way. It easily gives you a flirty, polished look so you won't need much else on your face.
Very subtle and light looking. It also makes you look more awake, I find.
This is the first blush I've found in many years that I am absolutely in love with! Makes your skin look bright and fresh, and is a beautiful color!
Soft,sutle,Hightlights beautiful to wear
I absolutely love this blush. It is so natural looking and the brush design makes it so easy to apply it perfectly. I highly recommend this product!

I've been using Benefit products for about 8 years and this is one of my staples. I simply LOVE this powder. A sweep of Dandelion on the apples of your cheeks, a couple of coats of mascara, some lipbalm and you're ready to seize the day!

This blush is good for everyday use. It has a nice subtle pink color that looks good all year round. You might want to step it up a notch if your going out at night and use something like Dallas or Hula bronzer. I use mine all the time and it lasts a while too!
Very pretty and subtle. I am a new fan of Benefit cosmetics.
During the winter, my skin is really pale. I use this as a blush and it gives a glow to my face

reviews.review_title: the perfect powder to set your makeup
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin and this is the perfect fine powder for me to use to set my makeup. It has a slight color but only enough to provide a bright effect. I can not see it but ti does set my foundation nicely. It also lasts forever and is easy to Carry with you . The only reason it is not a five is price. No power is worth $30 no mater how nice a glow it provides.
I think its too sheer for my medium skin tone. I have to layer it more than once. Its a very nice subtle natural glow though. Not for me, but would be great on someone else.
Really soft light color. I use it on the apples and lids. Perfect for everyday make up. Would also be really nice on young girls just starting to exp with makeup

I love this. I'm not my best in the morning, and applying blush in my half-asleep state is really not a great idea. so the fact that this is so subtle and foolproof is perfect, and i use it as my blush to waken up my face. it is VERY subtle and i'm not sure how it would work w/ darker skin, but it's the perfect subtle enhancement for my fair skin.

Maybe I am too fair for this....I read other reviews and thought this would be a beautiful color on me but it is pretty blah. I do think that this would be lovely on medium complexions. I need a bit more pop than ballerina-pink.

This product gives you a nice, polished finish over your makeup. You can use it as a blush if you apply more on your cheeks. It gives you a nice overall look, but my only complaint would be the brush. Its cute, but not too great for applying. You might have to switch for a regular brush.

reviews.review_title: not for anyone with yellow undertones
reviews.review_text: Love the smell! Love the brush and package! This is a sheer wash of colour so you shouldn't expect high impact; it is designed to be subtle. I have light skin so it shows up fine on me, but I have yellow undertones and thus this is just not a good colour on me. I wish they made it in two shades - one warm and one cool.
I have very pale skn, so I frequently use this as blush. It's a breeze to use and I never look overdone. Plus, the packaging is adorable, the little box looks great on my vanity!
I love this stuff! I put it all over my face, then put a little extra on my cheeks because I don't own any blush.
Love the natural color of this blusher. I use this alot in the winter when I'm a extra pale. Love the way it feels on my skin
I like this powder, it's natural looking and the brush is great

I use this product mainly as blush and it looks very pretty on my fair skin. It does boost the complexion if applied lightly all over with a little extra on cheeks. The only thing I don't like is the packaging....yes it is cute but a compact would be much more practical. As it is, I cannot travel with this product because the container is too chunky and doesn't close securely.
I love Benefit and I have always loved this product. I use it as a blush most of the time because if I used it all over it creates a peachy look to my olive skin tone.
this is so pretty on, it gives a natural glow with a little shimmer that makes you look awake, t smells pretty good too!

I absolutely LOVE Dandelion! It is hard to find powder like this, I swipe it on and instantly I look young and vibrant! It is so subtle, I can use it alone for a glow no one knows comes from makeup, or use it with other colors to highlight subtly!
I use this as blush, and less often as an all-over face color. It looks lovely on my pale skin tone. I like to put it on if I'm not feeling well, it gives me a natural-looking, healthy glow.

reviews.review_title: works well as a blush for me
reviews.review_text: I am using Dandelion as a blush -- for daytime or nighttime. I know that it's supposed to be an all over face color product, but I was looking for nice quality, natural-looking pink blush. This product has gotten mixed reviews as a blush, but I am really liking it! I am not used to blush products staying in cardboard boxes, but I do like that the higher sides help to contain the blush dust (which really is not much). I don't like the brush that comes with the product. I tried using it a few times -- bristles came off on my face. Although the brush did help me to apply the product a little heavier, I thought it removed some of my underlying makeup in the process. I switched to my fiber optic/skunk blush brush and it works great! I can build the blush coverage wtihout overdoing it, or go lighter for a more natural look. I think the product quality of Dandelion is nice and I do not need to re-apply during the day to keep the color on my cheeks; it holds up well on me. I don't know how to describe my skin tone except to say that I'm a pale-ish warm. I do like this product/shade and would consider repurchasing.
one of my favorites to dust on for a quick go! i love all of the benefit dusters such as Dallas and Hoola.

This was my first purchase from the Benefit line, and I absolutely LOVE the natural color. I apply it in the morning, and makes my skin look radiant! I love it! Will never go without it....buy this one!

This is great for really subtle looks or when you just want to look cute. I have really fair, combination skin and I just look adorable with it and it doesn't harm my skin at all. My sister, with significantly darker skin than me, even looked cute with this.

This is absolutely the perfect blush for me. I adore the sheer coverage. It's light enough that it is comfortable, but has enough pigment that just a little bit goes a long way. Generous size.  BUT, Benefit, please please please lose the paper cartons! At these prices, I want durable containers.

this has been my favorite product for years! LOVE how it instantly makes my face look fresh and vibrant. a great matte highlighter to be worn alone or with blush. not shimmery, so not fakey fake looking. you've must try it!

A sheer, soft pink that looks totally natural and gives a nice, pretty, natural alive-ness to your face. Can be applied lightly all over as a highlighter or layered a little for a sheer blush. A beautiful shade of pink that's easy to wear, even if you're not a pink person.

I am a bit of a Benefit Junkie! this was one of the first products I tried, and I fell in love with it. I have minimal oil, and this helps keep it at bay, also adding a little pick me up to my face. It also works as a blush for anyone who is very light.
this item does nothing its just a sheer sheer sheer sheer pink powder which does not brighten my face or any of my friends faces ! dont waste ur money and dont be fooled about the packaging
I love all the Benefit finishing powders but the Dandelion is my favorite. Its light and just gives enough spunk to finish the look.

I have tried 3 of Benefit's powder boxed blushes, including Dandelion which was my first. The product has a really soft rose scent that I enjoyed a lot, which made me keep it longer than I should have. I found the color payoff on my light to medium skin to be very minimal. The box is not practical for me to carry it around, and the little brush made me feel quite dainty. I had to apply the powder several times, but I am positive it did nothing to enhance my complexion or add any color.

reviews.review_title: How to look great before eight!
reviews.review_text: I was first introduced to this product while working in the UK while browsing at a very posh shop! And I have to say that I will always be grateful that I stopped to look. I am up at 3am to begin work at 5am. And it is hard to look bright and beautiful at that hour. With Dandelion, I never miss. Even though I am over 50, looking good is important to me..probably always will be. Almost every day, someone says something about how happy and refreshed I look. Believe me, a little brush of Dandelion over the apples of the cheeks is all it really takes! I love this product! Dandelion and a good cup of green tea and I am ready to go!

This powder is great. I have very fair skin so most blushes make me look like a streetwalker, but this one is awesome. It's delicate and pretty and I look like I have some color but in a natural way. Totally recommend it!

I use this every day to illumnate my skin. It's sheer and has a great smell! This is a daily staple. If I don't feel like doing my makeup, I just sweep this across my cheeks and I'm set. My only complaint is that its almost too sheer for my complexion.
I have very fair skin, and I could barely see this product. also, like Get Even, the texture was oddly gritty and the color is muddy with filler. not for me.
Very pretty blush especially for light skintones. You definantly want to use a different brush but it really is a beautiful color.

i have about 100 blushes and i can't come across the one like this. i absolutely LOVE it. it's sort of powdery pink, not too bright so it doesn't look awkward on your cheeks. it has a bit of shimmer inside so it won't look too dry.. omg i have so much to say. it's an easy wear. smells terrific.
This is a really pretty color. Instead of using this as a blush I found that mixing it together on the brush with my bronzer it perks up my all over face color.

This is a very pretty blush. I don't know why I don't reach for it more often, but it is beautiful. I'm not a fan of the enclosed brush, as it's a little scratchy for my sensitive cheeks, but overall this is a really good product.
great brightener for fair skin--i definietly got a lot of compliments when i first tried it. very natural looking-smells great too
I love this product. It gives me a really nice glow.
love this color, very natural, like your own skin color
I love this stuff, its subtle enough that I can just brush it on all over, or use it just on my cheeks for a little rosy glow. It lasts a good long time, too.
This is a very pretty and very soft blush alternative. It's very subtle and fresh-looking.
This makes your face look so soft and luminous. It's really great, a must-have.
I love the color and the feeling when I brush it on my cheekbones. It looks natural on my light complexion. Very shimmery and soft pink. Smells really pleasant!
THIS IS AN INSTANT FACE LIFT FOR ME!THE COLOR IS SO NICE SPECIALLY ON FAIR TO LIGHT SKIN TONES.ITS VERY COMPLIMENTING.ITS A PERK ME UP POWDER!
This is a great and universally-flattering shade. It gives just the right combination of shimmer and color. It also has a nice springy scent.

This doesn't work as a blush for me - but then, it's not meant to be a blush. I use a light dusting of Dandelion as a highlighter over gel blush, and it looks lovely and fixes the colour on my face for hours. I also enjoy the light, flowery scent.
a little powdery looking, but the color was shimmery and a very beautiful pink.

This was probably the first product I ever purchased from benefit. I love the sheer pink look it gives me. I have light skin and bought it during the winter, so for girls with fair skin, this totally gives the snow bunny look. If you want a more deeper flushed look, I would reccomend rubbing some benetint on your cheek before you put dandelion all over your face for a pinky glow. This is good for those days you just want to wear light make up.

This blush is perfect in every way. It's the perfect shade for cute, rosy cheeks, and it doesn't give off too much color to make you look like munchkin of Oz. For me, with naturally tomato-colored cheeks, with the right foundation and this blush, my face looks naturally rosy and pink.

this is a great powder. it's soft and natural, and gives your cheeks kind of a halo-look. i wear it over my bare escentuals warmth to add a little hint of sheer pink - and it jsut makes me glow! i love it in the summer, or during the winter time when you want a less-is-more look. one of my favorites int the benefit line. the box is a little hard to carry around in a purse, it gets a little banged up, but is still very sturdy and doesn't leak or make a mess.

This is a great, long lasting blush. I had mine for about 2 years and loved it. I went back to buy more, but bought the Dallas blush instead to give me more of a bronzed look. But for more of a traditional pink blush, this works and looks great.

i have lighter skin that is hard to tan, and using bronzer blush just look sa little fake for my skin, but this Dandelion pink blush fits me perfectly. it blens with my lighter skin and adds jsut the right amount of natural color that i need

reviews.review_title: long-lasting smells great and fun to use
reviews.review_text: I love the smell in this product! It smells so good! And the brush is cute and the powder is so light and sheer. It gives my face an awake look and it feels soft and comfortable too! The color is very sweet but sheer and is truly a lumizer you can use all over your face. Did I say it smells great!?
I really like this shade the best, it not too much, it is just right. Easy to put on, very light weight.
This gives you a quick pickup.
This is an absolute classic for me. It's the perfect natural-looking, all-purpose blush. It gives a natural pink flush and is suitable for most skin tones.

Very cute packaging and looks subtle and pretty on fair skin, as everyone says.  I love the box design, however only problem with is if you happen to throw out the plastic insert that comes with the packaging, then you're left with the brush floating along in the powder when you want to take this along in your handbag. Also the brush is extremely coarse.  I end up just using my own brush blush to put this on, but if it came with a better brush and packaging I would be 1000x happier and it would definitely be 5 stars for me.

I have very fair skin and this product is only subtly detectable. I would recommend this blush for winter or for a no makeup makeup look. It has a perfume like fragrance but is very gentle on the skin. This product does have a subtle shimmer to it. The shimmer is NOT like the pearlescent products that are luminizing without shimmer.

You're going to think I'm weird, but I've developed a sentimental love for the smell of this! The color isn't really strong, but I believe it does give the skin an overall glow, which is worth it in the long run.

This is one of the few products I have purchased again after using it up. There is not substitution for it. I have fair shin and red hair. It looks great on me. I agree with one other reviewer who said it was a great go-to product when you are in a hurry. I can just swpie Dandelion on with that nice and easy brush put on some eyeliner and Clinique Black Honey Almost Lipstick(another must-have) and go.
This is one of my staples. I use it with or without foundation. Swept across my cheeks, it gives me a soft, pink radiance. It really does wake up my face in the morning.

This is very pretty in the pan, but it unfortunately does not work for me as a highlighter. I'm a pretty pale person, but my skin tone is yellow enough that I need something darker than this pale pink. It didn't show up for me at all, but I can see how this would give some a lovely fresh faced glow. I did like the smell, though.

reviews.review_title: quality pigment makes all the difference
reviews.review_text: Who hasnt gone to their local drugstore and seen some over the counter blush and thought wow... $5... that color is cute too. Then gone home and not been entirely thrilled? We all have... the problem isnt what catches your eyes ladies... the problem is in the quality of the pigment color being used. I got this blush/highlighter in store and have loved how subtle the color is yet it doesnt fade away. I put a little on in the morning and at the end of the day (with the help of a quality primer) its right where it should be. YAY!

I'm very pale, and when I'm done applying my foundation and finishing powder, I like to do a quick brush with Dandelion just to give my skin a little more glow. It really brightens my face up. As a bonus, one box goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: It's the prefect shade of pink!
reviews.review_text: I have blonde hair and blue eyes and this is the perfect shade of pink for my skin tone. It's one of my favorite blushes.

This is a whisper pink color that brushes on sheer and pretty. It give a barely there glow that is fresh and soft. I like to wear it when I'm going out for breakfast or lunch and want to look fresh and awake but not done up.

I like this as a very subtle look, but sometimes I'm not sure it even shows up on my face. In the summer when I'm tan, definitely not. I do like the light scent and I feel like this is the only pink blush I've been able to wear that didn't make me look too flushed, just natural.
gives the skin a lovely glow that just wakes you up. love the smell, love the effect even more. makes an extremely sheer blush in a hurry.

Just a great way to brighten your face, especially on those days your face is looking particularly dull. I just put a light layer over my foundation before I put on Dallas and Hoola. LOVE IT!!! Makes me feel better and younge r I think it makes me look healthier and more awake.!

This product is great for perking up my skin. If I look tired in the morning and have little time to get ready, I reach for this box. The light pink powder adds just enough shimmer to make you look radiant. And don't be deceived by the small box. There is a lot of product in there and one box will last a good while.

reviews.review_title: Really delicate and can be used daily
reviews.review_text: This pink blush can be used daily as it is subtle enough to not overpower your complexion, but still gives noticeable color. I have light skin and it's so easy since you don't really have to worry about going overboard.
this stuff is okay but the best if your using it as a blush. its very suble and has a nice shimmer and it smells great. but When i wear it i can't tell its on.
this product is great for fair skin, i like to use it and then top it off with hoola by benefit so it shines through slighty.
Benefit's Dandelion blush goes on so smooth and blends so well! It's one of their softest tone and it compliments lighter to fair skins just great.
Smells nice and gives a nice finishing touch.
I never wore blush until I tried this product. The color is soft and pretty and it looks natural. It is easy to apply and it just makes you look fresh.

Benefit Dandelion is the perfect pretty pink pick-me-up! It gives a soft, rosy glow to even the palest complexion. Whether a blush or a highlighter, this powder gets me glowing. I look so sweet and innocent that no one can guess what I'm really up to!

This looks really good on my skin. When I wear it, I use it all over then a bit more on my cheeks at the end. It is subtle yet flattering, and I prefer this to the Georgia powder. I would repurchase if I ever ran out of this, even though I've had it for nearly a year and have barely scraped the bottom. Also, I like the brush that comes with the powder.

I have been in love with with *blush*b ever since I tried it on my fair/light skin two years ago. It looks great whether or not I have been in the sun. Gives me a fresh-faced look every time. I just love this product. I say blush because I use it as such, not as a luminizer. The shimmer is not very strong.
This is a beautiful natural colored blush that looks great on any skin tone. I have tanned skin & it adds that subtle glow... brightening up my complexion.

I highly recommend this brush to anyone with a lighter face complexion. I love the pinky colour that makes my face look dewy and gives me a great glow. I got so many compliments on it. The colour is perfect if you want to stay on the sensual side and don't end up looking like a barbie...

I love love love this pink powder/blush. I like to apply this powder right on the apple of my cheeks when I want a perky pink look. The powder looks great on your skin with a hint of a pretty flowery scent. This is a great way to start your day. You'll not only look perked up when you put this on but you'll feel it too.
The product description from Benefit is spot-on...adds radiance to your complexion, and subtle enough to still be appropriate for my conservative work-place.
Just a bit too light for my skintone. It disappears on my face. I think it is better suited for a person with more fair skin who would like a very discreet glow.
i've used this product for years and haven't ran out, but i can't decide if it works or not. I have medium-beige skin, so i think the color may be too light for my skin

I really love this color. It's delicate and sweet, and the intensity depends on the amount applied. I use it all over and not just on cheeks to look refreshed and healthy. Awesome texture and smells great!

reviews.review_title: Barely Shows Up on My Skin : (
reviews.review_text: Another cult product disappointment. I used this for a month before finally giving up and returning it. The pink color is very natural-looking and finely milled, but it takes a long time to build up to the color I want. The powder is just too light for my olive skin tone. For those with lighter skin tones, I would imagine that this product would lovely on them, and the box last forever.

Dandelion is a smooth soft powder and the brush is so soft! I love the color and its a perfect pick me up! The only thing I don't LOVE about this product is it's a bit awkward. It's compact so you can throw it in your purse and go, but the brush is a weird shape, it's almost too small...

This was recommended to me by my daughter and I was reluctant to try it at first. She kept telling me that this blush worked on everyone. All I could think was if you are 20, of course it makes you look great! But I finally broke don't and purchased it. Every time I wear It I get comments from people telling me how great I look. I am sold on Benefit Dandelion Blush!
Just the right amount of subtle color. Great for daytime.

I love all of the powder-in-a-box from Benefit, but I absolutely adore Dandelion. It's very fresh and soft, and being a fair skinned gal, I like to use this in lieu of blush sometimes for a softer more natural feel. It looks awesome if you use their 10 first (contouring highlighter/bronzer) underneath and then this on top.

i adore this product, really. its the perfect addition to throw on before heading off to work to make me look as if i actually had a full 8 hours of rest (when my body knows better). its flattering to my super pale skin tone and i would imagine it would be so on most skintones.
This blush is so pretty and so soft it looks great on everyone! It gives me a nice rosy glow without being too overdone.
This is great I am very fair so it gives me that just from the beach look.

Very nice color gives a perfect glow. Another user mentioned that the brush was difficult to use and I would agree with that - I used a different one as well. But overall, this is a fun, pretty blush.

reviews.review_title: Very light and fresh cheek color
reviews.review_text: This is very sheer,adds just a little touch of color to the cheeks or eyes this looks best on fair to med skin tones.On darker skin tones it might appear ashy

Benefit's powders are great--they are very sheer and make your skin look so smooth. This powder is nice for when you don't want to add color to your makeup, but it still gives your skin a nice finish.
This is an awesome blush! You can use it anytime of the year and it would still look amazing. The application is super easy and there is no way to botch it up. Enjoy!
The color is perfect for me, and I use it year round. It looks natural anytime of the year.
I thought this powder looked way too pink for me -- but I love it on! It's not bright or fake-looking: just a nice, natural-looking brightener. I think it would work for most skin tones.

Been using this since I was 14! I love it and no other blush compares! It really does last all day! It looks so natural. People don't even know I'm wearing blush. It gives you those cheeks that look like you just got finished working out. The pink is so beautiful and you'll always look pretty :) I will never trade this blush! There is so much product in here that it's definitely worth the price! The subtle shimmer in here is perfect! I love it

This blush is excellent for those with lighter complexions - it blends perfectly into the skin tone, making it look really flawless. It looks incredibly natural, and goes on really well. This blush is great during the day when you want color but not too much, and it lasts a long time.

reviews.review_title: the only blush I'll ever love...
reviews.review_text: I adore this blush. It's truly lovely. I'm very fair and it looks completely natural on me. It perks up my pallor with healthy color without looking 'made up'.

reviews.review_title: love it, love it, love it!!!
reviews.review_text: i really love this product. i use it over my benetint for a softer look, over my bronzer, or just by itself on the days that i don't wear as much makeup. It's perfect for my fair skin because it doesn't leave an orange cast like some pinks do, and to top it off it smells great. i'm so happy with it. i can't imagine not having it in my makeup bag.

I like using this product as a quick touch up through the day. Its very subtle but gives your skin an amazing glow. And its easy to brush on, I'm not very talented with makeup but this ones a hard one to mess up.
This is the most beautiful pink color. It is perfect for my fair skin. It gives it a really natural glow and I just love the cute little boxes these Benefit powders come in!

I sometimes work 26 hours in row, but I can still swipe a little of this over my cheekbones and look bright and refreshed. I use Benefit Dallas as a blush then swirl the Dandelion over my cheekbones. It looks great and really brightens up a tired face!! This product also smells good.
I am very pale and use this as a natural-looking blush. Not clownish at all. I've gotten compliments on my glowing complexion with this. One box will last me years. My favorite.

I purchased this after reading so many good reviews online and because I've had such success with Benefit in the past. It's very subtle with my extremely pale skin which I've realized after looking at photos makes me look washed out.
I really like Benefit's Dandelion Blush. It gives soft coverage in a lovely light blush shade. I think this blush is best suited to those with fair to medium skin tones.
This product always gives me a perfect, healthy glow and makes me look awake and refreshed. Love it!
Nice light smell, shimmer, and it's so very natural. This blush doesn't make anyone look way 2 over done. And the brush is good for on the go touch ups.
I adore this product! I keep buying it over and over again, it gives you this great better than natural glow. It's something that I can use everyday.

I have used this powder since 2004. It is the only powder that gives my olive complexion a tru highlight that makes me glow. It does not cake if used again and again. I carry it in my purse instead of a compact.
Great color, and has just a hint of shimmer to give you that glow! I rarely wear blush because of my fair skin, but this gives me just the right amount of color!
Love this! My favorite makeup product ever. It works so well, and is so easy! I use it as eyeshadow when I don't want to fully apply any, and it gives me a bright eyed, natural look

This would be a great blush for very fair girls. I have light olive skin and have to layer this for it to show up as anything, even a hint of pink. For my skintone this works better as an allover highlighting powder. I just sweep it lightly all over or sometimes I will put it on my cheekbones on top of blush for a nice little boost.

I have quite a few blushes but they never look right on me. I am devoted to this product and will never buy another! This product lasts very long and is truly a perk me up powder. The brush is perfect for this product as well, I never use a blush brush with this, even though I have many.
I LOVE this product. For someone with fair skin, it gives me just enough color on my cheeks without looking unnatural. And it smells amazing!

I didn't really care for this luminizer, as it didn't really do anything for my skin--perhaps that was due to my tone, but I wasn't really impressed. The texture was nice, but there wasn't any marked difference for me.

reviews.review_title: for a cool pretty pink look
reviews.review_text: i have a light warm skin tone, so this product wasn't to 'cool' for me, so if you have a cool skin tone try this pressed powder, otherwise go with georgia.
Love, love, love this powder. Worn over bare skin, or over foundation it makes your skin look young and alive. It goes on very sheer, but really perks up your complexion.

This is a MUST HAVE! I am a makeup artist who has been in the beauty industry for 10 years and I have yet to find a ballerina-pink highlighting powder of this caliber. Not only does it balance the perfect about of shimmer and satin-finish, but it's subtle without disappearing even on the palest of skin. Whether I'm doing full makeup, or just wanting radiant skin, Dandelion by Benefit Cosmetics is a must-have for a gal that wants pretty skin.

A couple swipes of this pretty pink color and I look awake! You can't put it on too heavily (so if you happen to have a heavy hand, this is perfect), and I love to apply it after my bronzer on just the apples of my cheeks for a pretty and natural look. Love the smooth formula.

I am currently undergoing chemotherapy for breast cancer and the drugs have really done a number on my skin and my coloring. This product makes me look alive again! The difference is unbelievable! And even when I'm feeling terrible, people always comment on how healthy my skin and coloring look.
This is the best blush that I have come across. I've used it for years. It has a wonderful fragrance, looks perfect on the skin and has the slightest glimmer. It's perfect.

Of all the benefit powders, this one is my favorite. It makes me look healthy and flushed, a perfect fit for my fair-to-medium skin tone. It gives me rosy cheeks in a way that no other product does - not over the top, but just pink enough to make me feel five years younger.

One of my favorite Benefit products. I love how sheer and natural looking this is. When I'm not tanned, I use it as a highlighter, and sometimes as a blush. Lovely results and as usual by Benefit-cute packaging!

not the biggest fan of this- i have a yellow-based complexion, and i felt like this always made me look washed-out. though it is silky feeling, the powder, even used minimally, was visible on my skin.

This is the perfect blush for those with fair skin. It gives just the right amount of pink and shimmer to make skin glow without looking like you actually used blush. It also works fantastically as a highlighter and it lasts forever too. It is well worth its price. I wouldn't go without this product.
This is the only blush I use. I swear by it because it matches any skin tone- particularly mine- and I love it.

This is my go-to blush. I have fair skin, and just a small swipe enlivens my complexion. It has a subtle, pleasing scent, and just a hint of shimmer - no need to worry about a glitter overload. I would recommend using a different brush, but otherwise, it's pretty perfect.

I have to say that this powder smells wonderful. It has a soft floral smell that only enhances the look of this bright pink powder. Over mineral make up Dandelion can look too chalky and over done, but over a nice liquid foundation it makes you glow. I prefer it in the summer when I want a subtle hint of happiness on my cheeks.

reviews.review_title: Gives new life to pale faces
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product!! I am very pale (all year round) and the subtle pink glow it adds to my complexion makes me look fresh and vibrant, as opposed to dull and pale.  I will buy this again & again, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a natural look to brighten up their face.

this is a staple in my makeup bag. The best light, fresh, and dewy faker, on the market. Look like you've just gotten done on your run or just had a cocktail. You'll fool them all. And it has just enuf sparkle!

And I do enjoy it, goes on well, smells nice, very fresh and fun. I often forget about it though...great product but not as memorable as some of the other Benefit products. Great for those barely there makeup days!
This product give a very nice, light natural flush to my very fair skin (but without looking fake). For extra OMPH use this product across the cheek bones, and use Benetint on just the apples.
love this product-especially during the winter months. gives my face a subtle 'rosey' brightness. i apply it OVER my regular blush to soften it a bit for that natural glow.
I love all of benefit's blushes because of the light scent. This pink is perfect and I got it to replace Stila's tutu blush color. It's a nice pink with a peachy undertone so it's not so barbie pink.
I love how soft itfelt,the smell is nice and it was such a nice soft pink color. It definitely brightened my look and lasted a really long time!

I have to work all day long -- about 10 hour days. I have to look presentable but dont have time to reapply makeup. My foundation stays on all day, but by the end of the day my cheeks had always lost there tint...until now. Dandelion stays well but doesn't give me a look like I applied a pound of blush. A client of mine actually asked me how my cheeks keep that soft pink glow... DANDELION OF COURSE!! :)

reviews.review_title: Beautiful but no the best on all skin types
reviews.review_text: My sister wears this and it looks amazing on her but when I've tried it, it looked nice but not the impact that it had on my sister. I'm half mexican with an olive tan complexion and my sister has more porcelain skin.. It just pops on her but not really on me...

This is the best, most flattering shade and is my daily go-to staple. Light to apply, easy to layer darker, and goof proof. No racing stripes! Last for ages, can be used anywhere, and a must have in my opinion
It's a very light pink color...a pretty touch of color that gives dull skin a little something extra. perfect for daytime use.
I have been using this Benefit finishing powder for years...very light and good for sensitive skin

I love this product! I have used the dallas and georgia peach powders before but this is my 1st time for the Dandelion! its great! just the perfect amount of color! and it has a great fragrance to it too!

This pink powder is sooo pretty! I'm not usually one for pink and girly but this Dandelion powder is awesome. Just the right color and light shimmer to wake up your face and the brush that comes with it picks up the perfect amount of powder so you don't over do it. The packaging is so cute that I leave this out on the bathroom counter too...

reviews.review_title: More of a luminizer, not a blush
reviews.review_text: I mistakenly bought this to use as a blush, and it works on days when I want to look like I'm not wearing blush at all. If you like the no-blush, bright skin look, this is for you. However, if you, like me, were looking for a blush for fair skin after trying blushes that were too dark, you may be dissapointed with the color payoff.

reviews.review_title: If you don't want to go dramatic...
reviews.review_text: This product was suggested to me by Sephora for my fair skin. It has a little shimmer to it and in a nice color pink. I love the brush that comes with it. So soft and easy to apply. You could almost use this blush like a quick powder when running out the house. It brightens my face and make me have a soft and pretty look. I use it on my cheeks and across my forehead and chin lightly. If you are looking for a more natural looks, this is what you want.

I like this blush. I am fairly pale in skin color. It gave me a nice subtle color. It's good in the summer when I don't want to wear too much makeup. It has a nice subtle scent and the color compliments the skin nicely. This color provides just enough without being too noticeable.
Haha, okay I know that title is lame.. I just swipe it on my cheeks to get that rosy glow. It has subtle shimmer and looks great.
this product goes on easily, smells good, feels light on my face, and give me a rosy and natural look. i highly recommend it to someone who has rosy hues.
This bluch i great! it brightens my complexion and is very natural and fabulous for all skin tones!
I love the sheer shimmer in this products-it isn't to glittery, and the color is nice and it adds a natural glow to any skin color- I am light to medium and all year round this is great.
it didnt do much for me but maybe because i have a darker complexion....should probably try hoola....

i'll be honest: i hate wearing the same prodcuts everyday. it bores me. however- when i am in a hurry, it is so nice to have the go-to products that make my morning routine a snap and leave me gorgeous (or just better looking than i was upon waking).  dandelion powder is perfect for the standby-everyday powder- it isnt overwhelming and yes, it really does give you a just a hint of color. love it.
It gives your lot of shimmer in the sunlight, but when I'm out of the sun just looks like average blush.
